0.name: Furnicraft 3D Block Addon
0.author: ROBERTGAMER69
0.description: Furnicraft 3D Block Addon (1.21, 1.20) adds over 500 pieces of furniture to the game and a simplified Comes Alive feature. The diverse range of items spans categories such as kitchenware, bathroom utilities, appliances like stoves and shower essentials, and even entertainment items, including a pool table and a gaming PC. It’s an excellent enhancement for diversifying your home decoration options. All the furniture pieces are solid 3D blocks, allowing you to rotate and place them in any orientation effortlessly. Certain items, like chairs and sofas, come with added functionality – you can actually sit on them. All the furniture can be crafted using the new Furnicraft Bench. Crafting Recipes: First, you will have to obtain the clay for the furniture, its elaboration is the following: When you have furniture clay, you will have to go to the furniture bench. Here is an example of how the furniture is obtained on the furniture bench: and with that done you can get all the furniture in survival. First, he will have to look for his future wife to be able to marry her or he will have to give her an engagement ring, by giving it to him now he will follow you everywhere and will let you open his inventory there you can store things, apart from the inventory there is also a space for a lock with it you can make it stay still. The lock is crafted with 4 rose gold ingots, to have a son or daughter there are 2 ways to obtain them (have it with your wife or adopt it), to have a child you will have to give your wife a cake and hearts will come out and she will give you a baby To adopt a child you will have to give your wife a paper and she will give you a marriage certificate and then you will have to look for a priest and with him, you will be able to get the child by giving her the marriage certificate and 2 diamonds. The NPCs that look like guards will attack the enemy mobs thus protecting the villages. For the content creator NPCs, they are tamed with 1 diamond and they will follow you and attack the enemy mobs, and even with a lock, you can make them stay still. NPCs are found in the villages. Here is an example of how the NPC inventory looks: How to get the ring? You will need to get the rose gold ore which can be found in mines or caves all over the world. Its probability of appearing is average But if you go to a town below them you can find a lot of rose gold ore. With the Caves update, you can now also find rose gold in the depths, it can appear from layer -56 to layer 60 approximately. Here is an example of how the ring is crafted: How to get the tools? You can crackle them with the rose gold ore that you find in mines and below the villages. The Rose Gold apple and the Enchanted Rose Gold Apple were also added Here is an example of how they craft: How do the new Cherry trees work? Cherry Trees will appear throughout your world Its probability of appearing is average Trees work the same as normal Minecraft trees By breaking the cherry leaves can drop cherry saplings and with scissors, it gives you the leaf block By breaking the logs you will get cherry logs with them you can craft cherry wood, You can paint cherry wood and cherry saplings By painting the cherry saplings you can plant them and a tree of the chosen color will grow Crafting Recipes: This addon does not use the player.json Block-Geo Fixer (Required) – – – – – – – – – –

1.name: Construction Addon
1.author: EpicZynth, Tazo
1.description: Construction Addon (1.21) adds many new construction tools to your world! This add-on introduces over 100 new vehicles, blocks, and items. Unlike other instant building mods, this one offers a unique approach to creating and generating structures, providing a truly distinct experience. You need to turn on the Experimental Settings if the addon does not work. mcaddon: –

2.name: More Villages Addon
2.author: EpicZynth, Tazo
2.description: With More Villages Addon (1.21), you can find new villages in your favorite biomes and even dimensions. The Nether and The End now have villages too! Trade with new villagers and collect new items, and you can even find villages underground. With infinitely generated villages and village expansion, your Minecraft adventure has never been more dynamic and engaging! You need to turn on the Experimental Settings if the addon does not work. mcaddon: –

3.name: More Custom Blocks Addon
3.author: ZorroCraft 2.O
3.description: Despite each update bringing something new to the vanilla version of Minecraft, the modding community continues to come up with increasingly creative ideas for items and blocks to add to the game. Many of these items and blocks are inspired by canceled designs for the main title, while others are entirely original. More Custom Blocks Addon (1.21) unlocks new possibilities for enhancing your creative builds or improving your survival base with various new custom blocks. This add-on includes new building blocks and numerous decorative blocks, all of which have crafting recipes and are fully compatible with survival mode! You need to turn on the Experimental Settings if the addon does not work. mcaddon: –

4.name: Another Furniture Addon
4.author: Fallen Toast
4.description: Another Furniture Addon (1.21) offers over 20 craftable vanilla+ furniture and decorations to upgrade your home. All items are craftable in survival mode, and it introduces new tools and utilities. Usable in any world, it provides the perfect touch to personalize and enhance your living space. You need to turn on the Experimental Settings if the addon does not work. mcaddon: –

5.name: Asian Craft Building Addon
5.author: billeyzambie
5.description: Asian Craft Building Addon (1.21) includes over 80 new building and decoration blocks with multiple variations, allowing you to enhance your builds with the charm of Eastern architecture and design. Discover interior decorations, new decorative plants, and much more to elevate your Minecraft creations. You need to turn on the Experimental Settings if the addon does not work. mcaddon: –

6.name: Gifts Addon
6.author: MJ ADDON
6.description: Gifts Addon (1.21) is perfect for celebrating special occasions in-game! With this add-on, you can craft gifts in 10+ different colors, store items, and give them to your friends. Your friend’s birthday coming up and want to gift them an awesome sword? Wrap it up and place it next to their house with cool open animations and particles for an added touch of excitement! You need to turn on the Experimental Settings if the addon does not work. mcaddon: –

7.name: Mob Heads Addon
7.author: ZorroCraft 2.O
7.description: Mob Heads Addon (1.21) adds an exciting new feature: when player-killed mobs (animals and monsters) die, there’s a chance they will drop their head. With over 200+ mob heads to collect and 50+ mob variants, you can wear them all and place them all! The mod also includes a wrench item to rotate, move, and scale the heads, making your collection fully wearable and placeable. You need to turn on the Experimental Settings if the addon does not work. mcaddon: –

8.name: Pop-Ups Addon
8.author: Wind's Scion
8.description: Place and explore loads of epic new structures, use new tools and transportation, and meet and trade with new Buillager NPCs. Can you defeat all three dungeon bosses? Pop-Ups Addon (1.21) features over 30 new structures, 3 new bosses to fight, and chainsaw and lifeboat utilities. Screenshots: You need to turn on the Experimental Settings. mcaddon: –

9.name: Furniture Craftable Addon
9.author: Fallen Toast
9.description: Decorate your world with more than 670 craftable furniture pieces using Furniture Craftable Addon (1.21)! Design a beautiful bedroom, bathroom, or living room, set up a campsite, or create a tropical beach setting to enjoy with friends—the possibilities are endless. Updated to 1.20, this addon offers over 670 furniture options, and all pieces are craftable! You need to turn on the Experimental Settings. mcaddon: –

10.name: Colorful Concrete Addon
10.author: Euforia
10.description: Colorful Concrete Addon (1.21) introduces all possible colors of blocks, adding over 200 new blocks with stunning patterns to elevate your base-building experience. These vibrant blocks are a fun and colorful way to enhance your base or a nearby village! You need to turn on the Experimental Settings. mcaddon: –

11.name: Colorful Glass Addon
11.author: Euforia
11.description: Colorful Glass Addon (1.21) introduces over 100 colored glass blocks and panels to Minecraft, with panels that can be placed in various positions for enhanced creativity. This addon aims to make colored glass accessible to all players without needing mods or technical expertise, enhancing the vanilla experience. Despite the belief that “colored glass isn’t possible,” this addon welcomes mods to expand its possibilities further. You need to turn on the Experimental Settings. mcaddon: –

12.name: Plenty of Blocks Addon
12.author: ZorroCraft 2.O
12.description: Plenty of Blocks Addon (1.21) brings over 1000 unique blocks to Minecraft, all craftable and functioning just like the default blocks. They seamlessly integrate into your gameplay experience, offering a vast array of new building possibilities! You need to turn on the Experimental Settings. mcaddon: –

13.name: DM Dungeons Addon
13.author: Dinomasther
13.description: DM Dungeons Addon (1.20, 1.19) addon for Minecraft PE is a fantastic addition for players seeking a more challenging experience. This addon introduces new dungeons to the game, each one offering a unique challenge. Currently, it adds three new dungeons that are randomly generated around the world, each one containing loot that corresponds to the level of challenge it presents. The dungeons include a castle, an Illagers base, and a pyramid. “DM Dungeons” addon is a great choice for players who are looking for a more challenging and immersive Minecraft experience. The addition of new dungeons brings a fresh element to the game, and the promise of future updates makes this addon an exciting choice for adventurous players. Each dungeon is designed to test your skills and equipment, so it’s recommended to be well-prepared before venturing into them. The structures can be viewed with the vanilla Minecraft texture pack or with your own preferred texture pack. Zip: – Zip: –

14.name: Natural Structures Addon
14.author: Manu GG
14.description: Natural Structures Addon (1.20) introduces over 20 unique structures to the Minecraft world. These structures are filled with interesting loot, making exploration even more rewarding. From hidden caves to ancient temples, this addon adds a touch of adventure to your survival mode experience. Fallen trees: Petrolium tower: Meteorite: Bohio: Night Shelter: Submarine: Treehouse: Abandoned house (taiga): Skull (Desert): Refuge (Savanna): Tower (Medieval): Crater (nether): Abandoned portal: Ruins of seawater: House of sacrifice in the desert: Abandoned ruins on the plains: Refuge in the desert: Camp in the dark forest: Graveyard: Mini ice dungeon: Invocation of the wither: Peaceful tower of the blazes: Make sure you turn on the Experimental Gameplay. mcaddon: –

15.name: The Forgotten Legends Addon
15.author: Smaug049
15.description: The Forgotten Legends Addon (1.19) seeks to introduce a fantastic realm filled with mythical creatures, including Dragons, orcs, and elves. Set in a fantasy world, this addon enriches the player experience with a plethora of new entities. While some features are exclusive to creative mode during this beta phase, those playing in survival mode can still venture into the deepest caves and encounter dangerous new creatures. Moreover, players can engage in epic battles against orcs and ghastly ghosts in the overworld. Orc ringleader Located in the Extreme Hills, Savanna, and Dessert Biomes, these spawn with 2 more Orc warriors covering them, WAAAGHH! Orc warrior They spawn with the orc ringleader, they are very dangerous. Nekros Colossus An abomination of Bones that came to “life” they are considered as mini-bosses, so, be very careful when you find one in the darkest caves of Minecraft. Ochi Nekros Similar to the Nekros Colossus, they spawn in caves. Ghost They use to spawn in the overworld when the night arrives, very spooky creatures that will be very happy to see you running and screaming while they chase you. Juggernaut A monster made out of flesh and blood, spawns in the deepest caves by the moment. Nether Boss This creature is in a Beta state, isn’t finished, and presents A LOT of bugs, will not spawn in your survival worlds. Satirimus – The Final Legend This creature is in a Beta state, isn’t finished, and presents A LOT of bugs, will not spawn in your survival worlds. Ebony gear The ebony is a new ore you’ll be able to find in the deepest caves, is stronger than the netherite but harder to find. Totems There are just 2 totems in this version, the healing and protection totems, but the second one cannot be obtained in survival, to get the totems you need to “decraft” the totems of undying and then combine the empty totem with some elements: Necromancy Table and Magical Objects Table: Here you’ll be able to craft some cool stuff related to the necromancy, such as conjuration books and totems (exclusive for the Magical Objects Table) Tomes Make sure you activated the Experimental Gameplay. – –

16.name: Woodcutter Addon
16.author: ZallTheChair
16.description: Do you ever feel you waste a lot of your planks because you want to make a wooden roof? Or do you just need 2 slabs but you got 6? If so this addon is for you! Woodcutter Addon (1.20, 1.19) basically just adds a wooden recipe to a normal stonecutter. (The recipe work for all type of wood) Log Planks= 4 Slab= 8 Stair= 4 Trapdoor= 8 Door= 4 Fence= 4 Fence Gate= 4 Pressure Plate= 12 Button= 16 Sign= 4 Wood= 1 Stripped Wood= 1 Stripped Log= 1 Stick= 8 Stripped Log Planks= 4 Slab= 8 Stair= 4 Trapdoor= 8 Door= 4 Fence= 4 Fence Gate= 4 Pressure Plate= 12 Button= 16 Sign= 4 Wood= 1 Stripped Wood= 1 Log= 1 Stick= 8 Wood Planks= 4 Slab= 8 Stair= 4 Trapdoor= 8 Door= 4 Fence= 4 Fence Gate= 4 Pressure Plate= 12 Button= 16 Sign= 4 Log= 1 Stripped Wood=1 Stripped Log= 1 Stick= 8 Stripped Wood Planks= 4 Slab= 8 Stair= 4 Trapdoor= 8 Door= 4 Fence= 4 Fence Gate= 4 Pressure Plate= 12 Button= 16 Sign= 4 Log= 1 Wood= 1 Stripped Log= 1 Planks Slab= 2 Stair= 1 Trapdoor= 2 Door= 1 Fence= 1 Fence Gate= 1 Pressure Plate= 3 Button= 4 Sign= 1 Stick= 2 Recycle 2 wooden stairs for 3 wooden slabs 2 wooden slabs for 1 plank – –

17.name: Minecraft Overhaul Addon
17.author: TheBestGamerEver
17.description: Minecraft Overhaul Addon (1.21, 1.20) attempts to recreate the familiar landscapes in Minecraft in a more realistic and atmospheric way. Vanilla Minecraft survival is an enjoyable experience, but many changes can be made to it. The game has removed or unused content that can be brought back, and many quality-of-life features can be added. Additionally, the End content can be expanded. The goal of this addon is to improve the player’s experience across all three dimensions by introducing new blocks, mobs, ores, structures, and more. Each dimension has its own section to make it easier to navigate through the content. Get ready for a deep dive! Overworld Change: Nether Change: End Change: Make sure you turn on the Experimental Gameplay. End Package: – Nether Package: – Overworld Package: – Full Package: – Zip: –

18.name: 1000+ Furniture Addon
18.author: Fallen Toast
18.description: With 1000+ Furniture Addon (1.21), you can now decorate your townhouse, mansion, or skyscraper with virtually unlimited furniture options! From living rooms and bathrooms to gyms, man caves, and beautiful kitchens, you can design everything you can dream of. This addon features over 1000 furniture variants, all craftable, and is multiplayer-friendly, allowing you to transform your Minecraft world with unparalleled creativity and detail. You need to turn on the Experimental Settings. mcaddon: –

19.name: World Builder Addon
19.author: The_PlayeR
19.description: World Builder Addon (1.21) is a game-changing addon that enhances world editing within the game. Join us as we delve into its features and functionalities, demonstrating how it can revolutionize your building experience. This addon is a must-have if you’re a player eager to elevate your creations! Stay tuned for our comprehensive review and add-on demonstration. Make sure you turn on the Experimental Gameplay. mcaddon: –

20.name: Decocraft Addon
20.author: EpicZynth, Tazo
20.description: Decocraft Addon (1.21) adds over 600 decorative items to the game, making it the largest furniture mod for MCPE. This addon brings a variety of furnishings and decorations, from silverware and lamps to yard, garden, and home décor for every occasion. Many items are fully functional and fulfill their intended purposes. DecoCraft transforms your game by offering a rich array of FurniCraft mods, making it the ultimate decoration mod for MCPE. Make sure you turn on the Experimental Gameplay. mcaddon:

21.name: Modern Furniture Addon
21.author: TrueCowboy
21.description: Modern Furniture Addon (1.21) introduces hundreds of unique and stylish pieces of furniture to enhance your builds. With this addon, you can transform your Minecraft world with modern, aesthetically pleasing furniture items, making it easier to create realistic and beautiful spaces. No longer will you have to pretend that a stair block is a chair or a pressure plate is a table! Make sure you turn on the Experimental Gameplay. mcaddon: –

22.name: DecoFlex Furniture Addon
22.author: Fallen Toast
22.description: DecoFlex Furniture Addon (1.21) adds new modern furniture to the game, as well as a paintbrush and paint bucket to paint the Add-On blocks. It also adds a new table and a new interface. To get all the items place the new crafting table, interact with some vanilla dye, and then interact with an iron ingot, the interface will appear. Make sure you turn on the Experimental Gameplay. mcaddon: –

23.name: RLCraft Dregora Modpack
23.author: MOKALAX
23.description: RLCraft Dregora Modpack (1.21) is a challenging and immersive modpack for Bedrock Edition that combines the elements of RLCraft with the unique world generation of Dregora. It features over 300 new biomes, new bosses, mobs, structures, and a whole new game loop designed to pull players into its expansive lore and story. Hundred of new handcrafted biomes Persistent regions mixed with procedural generation Unique set locations 300+ new structures Custom mob variants Custom dungeon and locations A ton of hidden secrets A ton of unique loot Make sure you turn on the Experimental Gameplay. This addon only works for the 1.21.0 version. mcaddon: –

24.name: Builder Pro Addon
24.author: Sanjo
24.description: Unleash your creativity with Builder Pro Addon (1.21), featuring over 2000 custom block variants that match most resource packs! Perfect for the most imaginative builders, this addon includes Rotate, Painter, Copy, and Variant tools, along with easy Stonecutter recipes for survival. Make sure you turn on the Experimental Gameplay. mcaddon: –

25.name: Saint Seiyamf Addon
25.author: KingMf
25.description: Saint Seiyamf Addon (1.19) is a 100% survival and multiplayer addon for fans of the Saint Seiya series. This addon includes features such as bronze armor, powers, quests, structures, and much more. “Are you tired of the many addons available now? Have you experienced the cosmos yet with this addon?” “Moedas” are additional items in this update that serve as a form of currency for exchanges. “Cosmo” is another currency used for exchanges with NPCs and obtained from mobs in the addon. “Random_cosmo” is an item that functions like a roulette wheel, where it randomly swaps for another item. With this item, you can obtain any armor, regardless of what item you won in the roulette. “items that will be in your inventory when entering the map” You will be born with 3 items in your inventory: “Constellation roulette” with this roulette you will win a random constellation. These are the icons of the silver and bronze constellations, you may have a chance to get silver or bronze armor. Quest item “you will have 17 quests to do in Survival mode, ps: quests are from the galactia war saga The item that spawns the structure arena will have 3npcs, the first NPC the grandmaster. Grandmaster Grandmaster, he will exchange the constellation item you won from this “constellation roulette” for your armor. Crystal knight Crystal knight, this NPC is responsible to give you silver armor if you win s silver constellation. Dohko Pound dohko with a new feature. Dohko npc exchanges the reset item. Reset of the cosmos: In case you don’t like your luck that you took on the constellation roulette, you can get a reset item by placing the constellation you wonon the work table. EX: constellations Demonstration Demonstration, if you take the constellation that you win at the beginning of the game and put on the work table, you get the item reset, exchange item, careful because you can only make this exchange with this item reset +64coins. If you don’t like the constellation you picked up by placing it on the work table, you get an item called reset, this item works as an exchange item, so you can roll your constellation again. BOX “Box” “Holding it on the cell phone screen or with the mouse, you will place the box on the ground and you will have an option for you to equip the armor, you equipping it you will gain character power along with the armor equipped on your character”. MU Npc Mu de Jamiel, this npc will exchange fragments of armor and knight blood, for gold armor. How to get fragments? Defeating boss: He drops a fragment of his armor and knight’s blood, each Boss has its fragment separate from the other armor fragments. If you combine 64 Armor Fragment + 64 Knight’s Blood, you get a Golden Armor. JAMIEL Jamiel structure that spawna on your map randomly, npc mu esta la within the prediocuidado because inside jamiel the skeletons that were already knights of athena. BEWARE: Beware, skeletons, they attack you and throw projections that cause damage…. think long and hard before going to jamiel! Holy Amppoint Holy Amppoint is a jar where the golden knights are sealed, you find this bottle around the map, it spawns randomly, and if you break it generates a random boss. Gold armor Armor of golden saints protectors and defenders of Athena Some of the skills of the golden saints: Bronze armor: Armor of bronze saints protectors and defenders of athena Silver armor: Armor of silver saints protectors and defenders of Athena Mobs, will drop items for exchange and craft……. Normal mobs that spawns on the 100 health map. 200 silver knights of life. 360 bronze knights of life. knights gold-boss 1500 life. all these mobs tacam project BOSS MOBS These mobs drop cosmos and coins, the shina mob and the kassius mob appear on the map frequently, the other mobs are spawned by quests. – –

26.name: Fantasy Creatures Addon
26.author: Y4NK_G4M3R
26.description: Fantasy Creatures Addon (1.19) is an amazing addon that adds several mythological creatures to your Minecraft such as Medusa, Mermaids, Yeti, Fairy, Hippocampus, Goblins, Ent, Fairies, Lhamacorn, and Death Worms among others with generations around the world. MEDUSA Life❤-100 Attack⚔-7 The medusa can be found in temples along the beaches. When defeated, it can drop its head, which has the ability to kill any creature. YETI Life❤-70 Attack⚔-18 Can be found in frozen spike biomes DEATH WORM Life❤-15 Attack⚔-5 Death Worms can be found in the scorching sands of the desert, making their huge leaps towards the player, when dead they will drop rotten meat. LHAMACORN Life❤-20 Llamacorn is a creature that mixes llama with unicorn, which can be found in flowering biomes and can serve as a mount, for a prolonged time, when killed they can drop meat and leather. SIREN|MERMAID Life❤-30 Attack⚔-6 Mermaids can rarely be found in oceans, coral biomes, and warm oceans, when dead they can drop 1 to 3 scales. KOI Life❤-5 Koi can be found easily in rivers and dead can drop cod. FAIRY Life❤-8 Fairies are cute and playful creatures that can be found in forests and flowering biomes, they can trade and when dead they can drop fairy dust Fairy House: Crafting recipe: Fairy rainbow flower: (Spawn in flower forest, drop diamond) Flower tiara: GOBLINS Life ❤-10 Attack⚔-5 The goblins are contracted in mountains in groups of 1 to 9 and when dead they can drop their spear. ENT Life❤-50 Attack⚔-10 The Ents they pass through leave a path with tree saplings, drop tree trunks, and spawn in the forest. DIRT GOLEM Life❤-500 Attack⚔-26 The dirt golem is an earth guard that can be found easily on plains, which will only attack if someone hits it, it can drop earth and flowers when killed. HIPPOCAMPUS Life❤-20 Can be found in oceans in groups of 2 to 4 and can serve as a mount for players and drowned. mcaddon: –

27.name: Randomized Everything Addon
27.author: SUBERNER STAR
27.description: Do you want to be in a world where everything is unpredictable and makes no sense? Then this addon is perfect for you. Randomized Everything Addon (1.19) comes with 3,625 RANDOMIZED FILES, randomly altering entities, loot tables, textures, colors, and much more. Imagine playing Minecraft where every time you log in, you experience something new and unexpected. With this addon installed, you and your friends can have a time of your life with the randomization of at least one aspect from every category in the Minecraft code, with the promise of even more randomization in the future. This addon doesn’t provide complete randomization, as that would result in a visually unappealing and unenjoyable gaming experience. Instead, certain categories are randomized within their respective groups, such as all wood types in one category and all ores in another. Not every aspect of each category will be randomized, but with time, the aim is to include more random elements while still maintaining a polished and enjoyable game. The priority is to provide a fun and polished gaming experience, so please be patient as the addon continues to improve and become more randomized. Below is an example of not putting files in categories: How many files are randomized: 3,625 files are randomized 5,000-6,000 total things randomized Entities Behavior pack: Projectiles Boats Minecarts Fishes Squids Slimes Other entities ETC. Resource pack: Entity textures Bed color Boats Signs Armor Banners Shuker colors ETC. Loot Tables Behavior pack: Chests Entities Equipment Fishing Bartering/giving ETC. Recipes Behavior pack: Brewing stand Crafting Smelting Smithing Table Stonecutter ETC. Items Behavior pack: Food Seeds ETC. Resource pack: Flame light sources Dyes Compasses Eggs Warped/crimson fungus Maps ___ on a stick Ores Tools Wood Spider eyes Leather/hide Coal/charcoal Armor Glowstone dust Records ink sacs Books Bows/crossbow Uncooked/cooked meats Elytra Ender pearl/ender eye Gold/normal food Potions Soups Barries ETC. Blocks Resource pack: Alternate grass Alternate dirt Alternate stone Amethyst crystal sizes Anvil condition Azalea leaves Barrel top Basalt Bee nest Flames/fire Breaking ice Ice Chests Chorus flower Compost Coral Crops Daylight sensors Droppers/dispensers Dyed based blocks Turtle eggs: Farmland Flowers Food blocks Furnaces Warped/crimson fungus Leaves Mushrooms Netherrack/blackstone Obsidian Ores Rails Respawn anchors Sand Snow Soul blocks Sponges Stones Wood Crafting stations Mud/dry mud Glowstone/shroomlights Prismarine/dark prismarine Calcite/tuff Bamboo Bamboo leaf TNT Barriers Cactus Cake Chains Cobble Dripstone/lush Endstone/purpur Skulk vines Skulk Mob Spawner Frog lights Sandstone designs ETC. UI / GUI Resource pack: Heart icons Hunger icons Armor icons Experience bars Effect icons Beacon levels Cartography table UI Recipe icons Map icons Crosshair Armor inventory icons Beacon buttons Hunger icons borders Controller Enchantment table dust icons Enchantment table bar icons Hammer icon Hotbar Background Panels Progress bars Saving icons Spyglass Side panel button Enchantment glint Pumpkins blur ETC. Text Resource pack: Enchantment names Enchantment roman numerals Potion roman numerals Death messages Block names Item names Potion names Arrow names Action names ETC. Environment Resource pack: Fog color Watercolor Grass/foliage color Sun/moon Nether ambient particles End portal ETC. Sound Resource pack: Pitch Blocks Records Cartography table results Drinking Beacon Conduit Barrel Player hurt Filling/empty Bubbling up/down Warden close Composter Spyglass Armor equipping Dripstone Mob converting Waxing copper Horn calls Bubble columns Leash Chorus plant Screaming Respawn anchor Milking Sensors Shears Beehive Squid ink Breaking wood Thunder Table usage Swimming Splashing Shulkerbox Player Falling Chests Pistons Fireworks Liquids Fire Drip leaf Mob celebration Eating Sonic Boom Crackles Eggs breaking Flopping Roaring Biting Nether Ambient moods Music weight Bow hit Levels/experience Shooting Cubes jumping Ambient music Portal Clicking Crossbow charging Popping player attack Preparing attack Iron golem repair and crack Entities hurt and death Breaking ETC. Particles Resource pack: Campfire smoke Falling dust Flames/fire Villager emotions Evaporation Bubble columns Sonic explosions Souls Vibrations Sculk pop Static particles Mini animation particles Big animation particles ETC. Feature Rules Behavior pack: Desert spawn locations Overworld spawn locations Nether spawn locations Iterations Extent Distribution Placement pass ETC. Functions Behavior pack: Spawn radius Starting time Tick speed Starting weather Game rules Game events ETC. Seeds and changing Seeds What are seeds: Seeds hold a combination of random attributes with the addon Each seed has a different combination of random attributes, allowing you to pick the randomized combination you want to play with and makes it so you don’t have to play the same randomizer over and over again. Both the resource pack and behavior pack consist of 23 seeds. You do not have to use both the resource pack and the behavior pack be on the same seed. You could have the behavior pack on seed 7, the resource pack can be on seed 18. Required experimental features must be enabled for the addon to work properly. 25 Seed Packs: –

28.name: Factory 100 Plus Mod Pack
28.author: sky_fare
28.description: Factory 100 Plus Mod Pack (1.19) focuses on equipment, locomotions, flora, fauna, technology, energy, and automation by combining more than 100 mods/addons. Your Minecraft world will never be the same again! The modpack is compatible with windows 10/Xbox and mobile. If you get any lag, you should turn off all things on your video settings. Here are some screenshots of a few addons, but there are way more addons than you can imagine: Some 3d mods. There are more for you to find: Main starter island, future version will have many guide books plus many islands, future version will allow players to obtain items, that they normally cant in survival. Few screenshots of some items taken in creative mode: Starter Chest: This modpack is compatible with windows 10/Xbox and mobile. For Xbox: You can not download this on Xbox, due to Xbox issues, if u wish to play on Xbox, download this on your phone, then join off of Xbox to that world, which is hosted on your phone. mcpack: –

29.name: Fallen-Toast’s Crumbs Addon
29.author: Fallen Toast
29.description: Fallen-Toast’s Crumbs Addon (1.19) provides you with the opportunity to obtain specific features from Natural Structure or Man-Made Structures without the remaining parts. This addon breaks down into smaller addons, which include unique customizations for each feature. Note: Please read all the following addons information. Foliage Bundle Includes the sticks, bushes, and rocks! Includes all drop of the bushes (Leaves). Bush Only Contains the Dried Bush and the Bush. Sticks Contain the sticks and there 4 levels. Rocks Contains a variety of rocks and snowy variants! Foliage Bundle Includes Sticks, Bushes, and rocks! As well as leaf, Dried leaf, and its associating blocks (No options) Sticks Include Sticks! Spawns more commonly on the beach (No options) Rocks Includes Rocks, Beach Pebbles, and Volcanic Rocks. As well as throwable pebbles Options: Beach Pebbles On/Off Bushes Includes Bushes, Dried Bushes, Leaves, Dried Leaves New from the original ~Put leaves/bushes into furnaces to create their dried variants. (Since there is no drying rack) Options Leave Furnace Recipe (On/Off) Buildable Campfires Includes buildable campfire, campfire base, and kindling. Changes from the original: New kindling recipe Options Vanilla Campfire Recipes (On/Off) Chopping Blocks Includes Chopping Blocks, Flint Axe, and the loss of ability to craft wood in the crafting table! Supports Nature Spirit, Strat’s Food Expansion, Bumble Crops Make Sure to STRIP logs to chop them! Also Changed the Flint Axe Recipe! (For Addonpack Makers) There is a wood upgrade item that’ll allow for the reuse of making wood through the chopping board! Make sure you activated all the Experimental Gameplay Options. Sticks (Natural Structures Redone): – Rocks (Natural Structures Redone): – Bushes (Natural Structures Redone): – Foliage Bundle (Natural Structures Redone): – Buildable Campfire BP: – Buildable Campfire RP: – Chopping Block BP: – Chopping Block RP: –

30.name: Steel Age Addon
30.author: Digital Gaming Studios
30.description: Ready to embark on thrilling adventures set in the dark ages? Whether you’re building your own civilization or fighting to protect it, this experience is sure to captivate you. Discover new civilizations, engage in epic boss fights, explore intricate structures, and wield 3D weapons like never before with Steel Age Addon (1.19). Don’t miss out on all the excitement! There Are 5 Different Civilizations In This Addon. Kingdom Of France The Kingdom of France is at War with the Kingdom of England Soldiers Use “French Sword” Kingdom Of England The Kingdom of England is at War with the Kingdom of France Soldiers Use “English Sword” Ottoman Empire Ottoman Empire is at War with Byzantine Empire Soldiers Use “Ottoman Shamsir” Byzantine Empire Byzantine Empire is at War with Ottoman Empire Soldiers Use “Byzantine Sword” Bandits Bandits May Intercept You, They Attack Villagers And Soldiers For Coins. They Have 4 Different Types They Use Bandit Dagger. Military Districts Castle (4 Different Variations) Camp (4 Different Variations) Villages (4 Different Variations) Villages Do Not Appear Naturally You Have to Craft them. You Can Build The Village Of Any Civilization You Want, You Can Establish Your Own Civilization! Craft: Windmill The Windmill Is A Huge And Impressive Structure (Place It On A Flat Area) Craft: Outposts Bandit Outpost: Bandits’ Hideout : Prepare for Battle to Reach Their Treasure The bandit leader Craft: Colosseum: A Battlefield Containing a Terrifying Prehistoric Creature The Rabies Craft: Ruins: Coins: Makes the In-Game Economy Work They Can Be Found in High/Medium/Low Quantity Around the World: Villagers/Blacksmith/Chef Civilizations Have Villagers You Can Get All Swords From Blacksmith! You Can Eat A Nice Meal From the Chef! Thorns Be careful, It Hurts! Make sure you activated all the Experimental Gameplay Options. – –

31.name: 6th Century Addon
31.author: Kyuu Desperation
31.description: 6th Century Addon (1.20, 1.19) includes many new types of dragons that will live in the open spaces of Minecraft Bedrock. In addition, several types of armor will appear so that the player can resist such powerful creatures. 6th Century is a Mod created by Kyuu Desperation to recreate a Classified File from the Britannia Government of the 7th World. Such information for him to access is unknown, but Yu stated that he uses Anticipation, and his Dreams (which is weird) to find pieces and clues for the Classified Information. 6th Century is a Series where a long-dead Sceptre named Anthony Concord was assigned by the Lordships, Virtues, and Authorities to stop an “Unexplainable” Event and Mysterious Activities in the 6th Century AD. After his descent to 7645 years in the past, he must find the source of “The Event” and stop it. Little did he know, he must continue the rest of 100 years up until the beginning of the next Century. As “The Event” was only part of “The Catastrophe”. In which 4 Realities of Fantasy, Reality, Dreams, and The Divine will Merge into Chaos. Scientific Class A Class of Entities that were Originally from the World of Reality, they’re Scientific and follow the Rules of a RealityRealm Universe. Such Entities usually can Adapt or become Extinct if on a Fantasy World. Alchemy Class A Class of Entities that were Originally from the World of Fantasy, they’re Magic based and follow the Rules of their FantasyRealm Universe. Such Entities can Overpower a RealityRealm Universe or even get Affected by the Harsh Rules of the Real World. Universal Class A Class of Entities that can Exist in Both Realms, the World of Fantasy and Reality. These Entities are Scientifically Accurate but also Magically Powerful, though some can get Affected by the Rules of Reality, they can still Adapt and use their skills if they return to Fantasy. If target is flying above water. Sea serpent can jump from the water straight to the flying target. Max Jumping Height: 20.0 Metres. Alchemy Table Alchemy Table is a Setup of 3 Different Blocks. The Alchemy Desk, Alchemy Books, and Alchemy Book Table. Placement Conditions: One each is needed and 2 of each aren’t allowed. The main Block is the Desk, where half of the Magic Equipment is crafted. You need to place the one Book Table at the side of it and it’s facing the same axis as the Desk should. For example: If you placed the Desk facing 0 (or south) you must place the Book Table on its side which is either the Desk’s Left or Right. It must also be facing 0 (or south). The Book Table also needs Alchemy Decorations or Alchemy Books, simply place the Accessory above the Book Table and it also doesn’t need any Faces. Ender Lantern Description: Ender Lantern is a Light Source that is Primarily Lit by a Pearl filled with Stone Magic. It can be Placed in All Directions and all Faces. Crafting Recipe: 6 Steel Rods, 1 Lapis Lazuli, 1 Pearl, and 1 Redstone. Located in: Crafting Table. 7th Wrld Ermanaric Description: Currently cannot be obtained in survival. (Work In Progress) Health: 100 Speed: 0.1 Speed is actually a little faster than Draconia. Collision Box: Width: 1.8 Height: 3.0 Hit Box: Width: 1.5 Height: 2.0 Pivot: 0.0, 1 5, 0.0 Sounds: Emits High pitched ring, followed by Rotor Sounds when helicopter is readying flight. Warden can detect vibrations and sounds of a helicopter but does not get agitated (for some reason). Basic Facts: This Helicopter is similar to your world’s Mosquito Helicopters, though some parts are noticeably different. One example of the difference is Seat Capacity, most of your world’s Mosquito Helicopters have only 1 Seat which is for the Pilot. Ermanaric A1 has 2 seats cause instead of having its purpose being just a Personal Helicopter (which fun fact you can get in America for the minimum of $2K), it is also used by the Germanics (Imperial Germans) as a Scout Helicopter to use whilst Trench Warfare was still manageable in the 2nd Great War. Operating System: Starting Helicopter: A helicopter can be started or Stopped if the Rider is riding it and the Helicopter is on the ground. You can only stop its engine and the whole helicopter itself on the ground as this avoids the sudden death of falling from the sky. When Aboard the Helicopter, you can turn on its power and engine to start. But it can take a maximum of 25 Seconds until you can fly. Flight Controls: You can change the helicopter’s Altitude by looking up or down. You can also make the helicopter stay on its current Altitude by wearing a special type of head equipment. Head Item Controller: 7th World Helicopter Pilot Helmet. This Flight Altitude Stabilizer is only available for Machines and the Flying Animal, Hippogriff. Recommended: It is recommended that only the Pilot shall wear the Item controller. Visual Animations: Main Rotors: Main Rotors when helicopter is going up has its Main Rotors tilt 30+ degrees. Main Rotors will return to 0 degrees if helicopter is going down. Lights: Lights will start blinking on the Tail Boom, cockpit, and Cabin. Tail Rotors: It spins faster than the main Rotors. Cyclic: Cyclic moves forward, and sideways, just like how real helicopters are operated. All Rotors: All Rotors Spin so fast that you can visually see it is spinning in the Opposite Direction. Whole Helicopter: It Tilts a little when it goes Forward, or sideways movements. Cockpit: Buttons for certain Actions can light up to darken, and some lights show the Engine, Fuel, Health, and States of the Helicopter. Dracan Eggs The normal and virgin ones are the same. Eggs are Stackable but they’re also Easily Breakable. Damage breaks egg: This list shows kinds of damage that can break the Egg into Bone Meal. Anvil, Block Explosions, Charging, Fall, Fire, Fire Tick, Fireworks, Fly into Wall, Override, Projectile, Stalactites, Stalagmites, Suicide, and Thorns. Damage drops egg: This list shows kinds of damage that’ll make the egg drop itself. Contact, Entity Attack, Falling Block, Freezing, Lava, Lightning, Magma, Starve, Suffocation, Temperature, Void, and Wither. Damage immune: This list shows kinds of damage that’ll do no damage or effect, or doesn’t do anything at all life fully Immune. Drowning, Magic, None, Piston, Sweet Berry Bush. Egg Conditions: Hatching Eggs: Dracan eggs must be on Ground with the Light Level of 11+ needed. They take 5 minutes to hatch in total. Putting it underwater won’t make it start hatching. If it’s in Water, not on the ground, or the light level is below 11, the egg will not hatch and the Time will reset. Virgin Eggs: These Eggs are found on Dracans that you killed, as they have carried eggs inside them. But they don’t have a mate right? Indeed they don’t, as the mother created these Virgin Eggs had undergone Parthenogenesis. Draconia Eggs All Draconia Eggs are the same but their Colour comes from the Dominant Parent representing their Race. Eggs are Stackable but they’re also Easily Breakable. Damage breaks egg: This list shows kinds of damage that can break the Egg into Bone Meal. Anvil, Block Explosions, Charging, Fall, Fire, Fire Tick, Fireworks, Fly into Wall, Override, Projectile, Stalactites, Stalagmites, Suicide, and Thorns. Damage drops egg: This list shows kinds of damage that’ll make the egg drop itself. Contact, Entity Attack, Falling Block, Freezing, Lava, Lightning, Magma, Starve, Suffocation, Temperature, Void, and Wither. Damage immune: This list shows kinds of damage that’ll do no damage or effect, or doesn’t do anything at all life fully Immune. Drowning, Magic, None, Piston, Sweet Berry Bush. Egg Conditions: Hatching Eggs Draconia eggs must be on Ground with the Light Level of 7+ needed. They take 2 minutes to hatch in total. Putting it underwater won’t make it start hatching. If it’s in Water, not on the ground, or the light level is below 7, the egg will not hatch and the Time will reset. Virgin Eggs These Eggs are found on Dracons that you killed, as they have carried eggs inside them. But they don’t have a mate right? Indeed they don’t, as the mother created these Virgin Eggs had undergone Parthenogenesis. Fire Dragon Eggs All Fire Dragon Eggs are different and their Colour comes from the Dominant Parent. Eggs are Stackable but they’re also Breakable. Currently the information is being worked on. To hatch the Egg put in in Fire for 10 Minutes. Maus Description: Currently cannot be built in Survival. Work in Progress. Lore: Since World War II never Existed, this tank was not built and designed by Porsche. Instead this Maus Tank was built and designed for the sole purpose of Scaring the enemy that has never seen such Monster. One instance of a sighting of the Maus before the 2nd Great War of 2039 to 2045 was in Die Goldene Herrenhaus, a Mansion that’s deeply Protected and Forbidden Public Tours by the Britainnia Government. In which a popular secret detective named Evelyn Depression manages to visit the Mansion of which her Older Sister that worked there allowed her to stay in the Mansion, as the following event that happened to their home on September 21, 2034 was Arson Attacked and their house Burned Down Claiming the Lives of 2 individuals which was their Parents. Sadly the suspect was not found and only his appearance was identified by witnesses. Health: 3000 Projectile Damage: 490 to 630 Speed: 0.1 or (0.067 if not ridden by player) Max Crew: 6 Max Shell Capacity: 68 Rounds. Elevation: 24 Depression: 12 Collision Box: Width: 4.0 Height: 4.0 Hit Box: Width: 4.0 Height: 5.2 (4.0 if not ridden by player) Information: Firing: You need at least one Round Ready in the Maus. When Interacting with Maus if it’s loaded and your riding it, it takes a second to load Shell in the gun before Firing after a second. It’ll take some time after firing. It takes 3 Hits to Kill an Adult Fire Dragon by firing at it. 4 if you missed once and hit nearby. Operation: It is recommended that this Tank is NOT used in the front lines, but rather use this Tank as far away as possible to the Enemy, especially if the enemy is Fast and Dangerous. This Tank is not suitable for most operations as its Slow Speed, Slow Aim & Fire, and Big Structure could make it a Target to the Enemy that knows the pros and cons. Pros: Tremendous Damage that can 3 hit an adult Fire Dragon. Enormous HP. Cons: Slow Speed. Slow Load and Reload. Big Structure. Cost of Resources. Bigger isn’t Better. MG42 Currently Unobtainable in survival. MG42 is a gun used by Imperial Germans in the 2nd Great War of 2039 to 2045. Shooting Capabilities: This weapon can shoot 25 rounds per second. It can shoot very far but will be more inaccurate the farther the target is. Round Capacity: 250 It can take MG42 Ammunition Box. It uses Mauser 7.92×57mm Rounds. Reload Time: 3.0 seconds. To reload you must need to equip the Ammunition Box onto your offhand, if you have an Ammunition Box in your inventory it’ll Choose to use that first and the offhand as last. Oak Wyvern Eggs Word Placeholder. Currently the information is being worked on, to hatch the Egg. Put it in any Hydrangea Bush for a minute or two. Winchester 1895 Currently Unobtainable in survival. Winchester 1895 is a gun used by the Britainnia Soldiers and Imperial Germans in the 2nd Great War of 2039 to 2045. Shooting Capabilities: This weapon can shoot 1 round per second. It can shoot very far away. Round Capacity: 5.0 It can take .Winchester 405 Clips. It uses .Winchester 405 Rounds. Reload time: 2.0 seconds. To reload you must need to equip the Clip onto your offhand, if you have an Clip in your inventory it’ll Choose to use that first and the offhand as last. Mage Towers Generation: Mage Towers can be found in Meadows. They have 2 different Chests and the Structure Spawns with 2 Mob Spawner of Witches. This can also be a Home for anyone who wants it. Secrets: There’s 1 Secret Loot in this Structure. Turn on the following Experimentals. Vanilla Experimentals (If this is deleted in newer versions then it doesn't affect anything). Turn on KeepInventory below, as it is needed unless you like Hardcore Challenges. 6th Century (mcaddon): 6th Century (Zip): American Alligator (mcaddon): - American Alligator (Zip): - mcaddon: -

32.name: Cursed By Herobrine Addon
32.author: Digital Gaming Studios
32.description: Cursed By Herobrine Addon (1.19) introduces a host of cursed elements to the game, including cursed creatures, structures, and stories. Players will be able to experience a new Herobrine encounter, complete with boss fights, mobs, structures, biomes, music, paintings, and adventures. The addon boasts a range of new features, including mobs, biomes, music, buildings, and blocks. Herobrine (Boss) He Can Be Summoned Using Herobrine Totem. It Is A Very Dangerous Creature And It Is Very Powerful. After being summoned with a totem, he will always watch you and communicates with you via chat, and tries to trap you. Drops Only XP And 50% Chance Diamond Pickaxe for now. Herobrine Totem Can only be placed on gold block. If the totem is placed as in the picture, when you click on the totem, you will see the “Herobrine joined the game” message in the chat. Then Herobrine will appear near you, running away from her is useless (Activated Herobrine Totem) Crafting Of Herobrine Totem For now, there are 3 Mobs in Addon: Cursed Farmer A Farmer Cursed By Herobrine Can Be Found Around And Inside The “Barn” Structure Cursed Pig A Pig Cursed by Herobrine, Can Be Summoned by Herobrine During Battle Also Can Be Found Inside “Pig Farm” And “Barn” Structure Cursed Cow A Cow Cursed by Herobrine, Can Be Summoned by Herobrine During Battle Also Can Be Found Inside the “Cow Farm” And “Barn” Structure We Have Structures That Will Give The Feeling Of Liminal Space, It All Has Plenty of Details And Easter Eggs In It Cemetery Barn Arena Throne Burning House Cursed Roller Coaster Dirt House Camp Castle Herobrine Trap Redstone Experiment Area Survival House Random Signs Cow/Pig Farm Woods Lava Fountain Leafless Oak and Birch Biomes Could Be Found You Can Also Witness A Scary Story Inside One Of These Biomes Cursed Jukebox New Jukebox Can Be Obtained Through Craft Or Found In The Attic Of The “Barn” Structure. Clicking on Plays “Narcotic – Horror” Track Crafting Of Cursed Jukebox: New Paintings Make sure you activated all the Experimental Gameplay Options. mcaddon: –

33.name: Niel’s Culinary Addon
33.author: Niel Peach
33.description: With Niel’s Culinary Addon (1.20, 1.19), you can create farms, restaurants, ice cream parlors, and more! The addon includes a variety of blocks, including the Toaster, Fermentator, Pasteurizer, Pestle, Freezer, Mixer, Teapot, Plate, Frying pan, and Casserole. Each block has its own unique function, allowing you to create a wide range of dishes and drinks. The addon also includes a list of all possible interactions with these blocks in “Atypical Recipes”. This list provides a comprehensive guide to using the addon’s blocks to create a variety of dishes and drinks. In addition to the culinary blocks, the addon also adds new trees, bushes, vines, and ores to the game. These include Apples, Pineapples, Acorns, Peanuts, Mangos, Strawberries, Pears, Tomatoes, Jackfruits, and Oregano. Each of these items can be found in different biomes, so be sure to explore the world to find them all! Hands saying “positive” means to interact without any restrictions. In place of “?”, put the item of the respective flavor you want to make. Make sure you turn on the Experimental Gameplay. mcaddon: – mcaddon: –

34.name: Elingo’s Lucky Blocks Addon
34.author: Captain_Elingo
34.description: Elingo’s Lucky Blocks Addon (1.20, 1.19) adds a lot of Lucky Blocks that can naturally be generated in the world just like the normal ores. The lucky blocks can also drop/spawn stuff like items, blocks, mobs, and structures and give you effects. You can also find some of the Lucky Blocks underground like ores. Lucky Block Underground [❌] Craftable [✔️] In Chests [❌] Dirt Lucky Block Underground [✔️] Craftable [✔️] In Chests [❌] Wood Lucky Block Underground [❌] Craftable [✔️] In Chests [❌] Stone Lucky Block Underground [✔️] Craftable [✔️] In Chests [❌] Gold Lucky Block Underground [✔️] Craftable [✔️] In Chests [❌] Diamond Lucky Block Underground [✔️] Craftable [✔️] In Chests [❌] Netherite Lucky Block Underground [✔️] Craftable [✔️] In Chests [❌] Redstone Lucky Block Underground [✔️] Craftable [✔️] In Chests [❌] Lapis Lucky Block Underground [✔️] Craftable [✔️] In Chests [❌] Nether Lucky Block Underground [❌] Craftable [✔️] In Chests [✔️] Endstone Lucky Block Underground [✔️] Craftable [✔️] In Chests [❌] Rainbow Lucky Block Underground [✔️] Craftable [❌] In Chests [❌] Iron Lucky Block Underground [✔️] Craftable [✔️] In Chests [❌] Coal Lucky Block Underground [✔️] Craftable [✔️] In Chests [❌] Sand Lucky Block Underground [✔️] Craftable [✔️] In Chests [✔️] Soul Sand Lucky Block Underground [✔️] Craftable [✔️] In Chests [❌] Copper Lucky Block Underground [✔️] Craftable [✔️] In Chests [❌] Forest Well Lucky Block Portal Lucky Block Spruce Tree Lucky Block House Nether Well Special Wells Make sure you activate Experimental Gameplay. – – – –

35.name: Minecraft Battlegrounds Addon
35.author: Four Worlds Studios
35.description: The main objective of Minecraft Battlegrounds Addon (1.19) is to enable you and your friends to play a Battlegrounds-style game. This addon includes guns and involves searching for structures, looting, and trying to get kills. Minecraft Battlegrounds is an addon that involves kill-or-be-killed gameplay, where you can play with your friends. The objective is to loot structures, collect weapons, and eliminate each other! The First thing you will notice when starting up a world is the Structures, The Structures will hold Loot Crates which you break to collect the Loot inside, the Rarer the loot the better the item! (More Structures will be added in future updates) Loot Crates are found within the generated Structures Break open the Loot Crates to collect the Items Guns are found inside Loot Crates, the Rarer the Gun the better it is! (More Guns will be added in future updates) P1911 P92 DBS M416 VSS RPG 26 Instead of Sneaking, you will go prone, which basically means you lay on your front hiding from the enemy! Sneak to go prone and jump to stand back up again, if you have a Gun that has a Scope, sneak while prone to use it. Inside Loot Crates you will find Body Armor and Helmets: Level 1 Body Armor and Helmet has the same durability and Protection as Iron Level 2 Body Armor and Helmet has the same durability and Protection as Diamond Level 3 Body Armor and Helmet has the same durability and Protection as Netherite Medical Gear can be found inside Loot Crates, use them to heal yourself in battle Energy Drink Energy Drinks will give you a three-second Regeneration boost and a ten-second Speed boost Bandages Bandages will give you a five-second Regeneration boost Throwables can be found inside Loot Crates Grenade Spray Paint Place one down, step back, and shoot it to make it go BOOM! You can use the Spray Paint Cans to change the Colour of your Guns, Just in case the default Black was a bit plain for you! Wooden Walls can be crafted using most wooden planks, they will give you some quick protection when battling an enemy, they will not have much HP but can withstand a few bullets Wooden Wall Crafting Recipes: Ghillie Suits can be found inside Loot Crates, use them to receive Ghillie Armo Experimental Features will need to be active for this addon to run. – –

36.name: Dungeon Raiders Structures Addon
36.author: G4
36.description: Dungeon Raiders Structures Addon (1.19) brings 44 new structures to your survival world, adding variety and interest to your adventures. These structures, which are taken from the main addon called Dungeon Raiders, range in size and design, including small ruins, ruined houses, and battle towers. Each structure is unique and has been carefully crafted with attention to detail. They can be found in all biomes and contain loot such as pots and crates. This addon is compatible with all other addons and is meant to help your world feel less empty and add excitement to your gameplay. The screenshots were taken on a newly generated world. There will be plenty of structures to explore and your world won’t longer feel empty. Pots and crates can be broken to get basic loot for now but the author may add chests if the addon is liked. This works with all other addons! – –

37.name: Panda Structures Addon
37.author: Panda Craft Gaming2023
37.description: Panda Structures Addon (1.20, 1.19) introduces 20+ new structures to your world, these structures can vary in size, shape, and design. This addon was created by Panda Craft Gaming2023 to add more variety and excitement to the Minecraft gameplay experience. Simple Cherry House Spawn in: Cherry Grove Loot: Yes presentation spawn:40,1% Cherry House Spawn in: Cherry Grove Loot: Yes presentation spawn:85% Jungle Tower House Spawn in: Jungle & Bamboo Jungle Loot: Yes presentation spawn:90,2% Bamboo House Spawn in: Jungle Bamboo Loot: Yes presentation spawn:60,2% Bamboo Cafe Spawn in: Jungle Bamboo Loot: Yes presentation spawn:55% Jungle Well Spawn in: Jungle Loot: Yes presentation spawn:55% Castile Tower Spawn in: Plains Savanna &Meadow Loot: Yes presentation spawn:92,9% Castile House Spawn in: Plains, Forest, Birch Forest Loot: Yes presentation spawn:80% Grave Spawn in: Overworld (except in cold biome and desert biome) Loot: Yes presentation spawn:90℅ Berry Farm Spawn in: Taiga Loot: Yes presentation spawn:98% Aether Portal Spawn in: Overworld Loot: Yes presentation spawn:39% Mangrove House Spawn in: Mangrove Forest Loot: Yes presentation spawn:70% Ruins Mangrove House Spawn in: Mangrove Forest Loot: Yes presentation spawn:77,2% Jungle Ruins House Spawn in: jungle Loot: Yes presentation spawn:38,9% Panda Statue Spawn in: Jungle Loot: Yes presentation spawn:26,7% Temple Of Portal End Spawn in: Jungle Loot: Yes presentation spawn:78,9% Mesa Temple Spawn in: Mesa Loot: Yes presentation spawn:90% Oasis Spawn in: Desert Loot: No presentation spawn:10% End House Spawn in: End Loot: Yes presentation spawn:80% Make sure you turn on the Experimental Gameplay. mcaddon: –

38.name: Better Adventures Expansion Addon
38.author: KZBMM
38.description: Better Adventures Expansion Addon (1.20, 1.19) aims to diversify the game’s world and make it less repetitive, this addon introduces new biomes, variations to vanilla biomes, new cultures and people, structures, ruins, fixed structures, animals, and even new bosses. The focus is not on realism but on fantasy, with many magical items and creatures capable of performing magic. The Better Adventures Mod is a massive project that aims to diversify Minecraft by adding many more biomes and biome variants, along with new trees, blocks, ores, mobs, and even new cultures. It also reworks many of Minecraft’s basic features, such as Villagers, to provide a fresh new experience. However, due to the aforementioned bug, the new full version of the add-on can’t be released until the bug gets resolved, as a vast quantity of the mod’s content relies on custom biomes. Until then, the developers will be posting betas leading to the full release. Please note that this mod is mainly about exploration, and this page only covers the basics of the add-on. For a more detailed understanding, you are encouraged to read the sections containing information on new features added with every update. The mod is compatible with Minecraft versions up to 1.17.40 and the current newest version, but due to a bug (MCPE-100700), custom biomes do not generate in versions 1.18 or higher. This issue has led to the mod being split into two versions: the Full version and the Beta version. The Full version works on MC versions up to 1.17.40, while the Beta versions have all the new features and work on the current newest version of Minecraft. Full version: Beta version:

39.name: Recurrent Complex Addon
39.author: NQHUNG
39.description: Recurrent Complex Addon (1.19) is the Bedrock version of Recurrent Complex Mod that adds new structures to Minecraft’s Java Edition, this addon also lets you travel a huge world and uncover its blocky secrets. The new village has many buildings and chests with loot for you to find. Make sure you activated all the Experimental Gameplay. mcaddon: –

40.name: Minecraft Gloomy Update Addon
40.author: TUTEL_
40.description: Minecraft Gloomy Update Addon (1.20) is a fan-made modification that adds new features and changes to the game, inspired by the rumored Gloomy Update that was supposed to be released by Mojang in 2021. The add-on aims to make the game more challenging and immersive, by introducing new mobs, items, biomes, structures, and mechanics. New mobs : The add-on adds four new hostile mobs that will spawn in different biomes and situations. These are the Gloomy Zombie, the Gloomy Skeleton, the Gloomy Creeper, and the Gloomy Spider. These mobs have different abilities and behaviors than their normal counterparts, such as being faster, stronger, smarter, or more explosive. They also have a dark and gloomy appearance, with glowing eyes and particles. New items : The add-on also adds two new items that can be obtained from the new mobs. These are the Gloomy Bone and the Gloomy Gunpowder. These items can be used to craft new weapons and tools, such as the Gloomy Sword, the Gloomy Bow, the Gloomy Arrow, and the Gloomy TNT. These weapons and tools have special effects and advantages over their normal versions, such as dealing more damage, having longer ranges, or causing bigger explosions. New biomes : The add-on also modifies some of the existing biomes in the game, making them more gloomy and spooky. These are the Gloomy Forest, the Gloomy Swamp, the Gloomy Desert, and the Gloomy Plains. These biomes have different colors, vegetation, structures, and sounds than their normal versions, creating a more eerie and mysterious atmosphere. They also have a higher chance of spawning new mobs, making them more dangerous to explore. New structure s: The add-on also adds some new structures that can be found in the modified biomes. These are the Gloomy Mansion, the Gloomy Temple, the Gloomy Pyramid, and the Gloomy Village. These structures have different designs, loot, traps, and secrets than their normal versions, offering more rewards and challenges for adventurous players. They also have a higher chance of spawning new mobs, making them more risky to enter. New mechanics : The add-on also changes some of the existing mechanics in the game, making them more realistic and immersive. These are the Day-Night Cycle, the Weather System, the Lighting System, and the Sound System. These mechanics have different effects and impacts on the gameplay than their normal versions, such as making the nights longer and darker, making the weather more unpredictable and dynamic, making the lighting more realistic and dramatic, and making the sound more immersive and directional. The Minecraft Gloomy Update Mini Add-on is a great way to spice up your Minecraft world with some horror and mystery. It is compatible with both Minecraft Bedrock Edition and Minecraft Java Edition, and it can be downloaded from this link. The add-on is easy to install and use, and it does not require any additional mods or resource packs. However, it is recommended to play with a high difficulty level and a low brightness setting for a better experience. If you are looking for a new challenge and adventure in your Minecraft world, then you should definitely try out the Minecraft Gloomy Update Mini Add-on. It will make your game more fun and exciting, but also more scary and creepy. Are you brave enough to face the gloom? Make sure you turn on the Experimental Gameplay. mcaddon: – Zip: –

41.name: TeotlCraft Addon
41.author: Fraku92
41.description: TeotlCraft Addon (1.20, 1.19) is a captivating extension that infuses the game with rich elements of Mexico’s pre-Hispanic culture. This add-on is perfect for history and culture enthusiasts, as well as players who desire a fresh and enlightening Minecraft experience. This innovative add-on adds numerous unique elements to the game, inspired by the ancient civilizations that once inhabited Mexico. From new mobs and bosses to fascinating structures and artifacts, “TeotlCraft” transports players to a time long past, providing an immersive and educational gaming experience. The add-on introduces a wide variety of new entities, many inspired by mythical creatures from pre-Hispanic folklore. These creatures not only add diversity and challenge to the game but also serve to deepen player engagement with the cultural themes present throughout the add-on. Olmecas: Biomes: Desert, Mesa. Loot: Jade Fragment. Craftable Weapons: Stone, Apear, Axe. Aztec: Biomes: Jungle, Swamp. Loot: Silicon Fragment. Craftable Weapons: Spear, Mace. Teotihuacan: Biomes: Taiga, Birch Forests Loot: Obsidian fragment. Craftable Weapons: Mace, Dagger, Macuahuitl Maya: Biomes: Plains, Savanna Loot: Stone fragment. Craftable Weapons: Axe, Macuahuitl. Jaguar Warrior: Biomes: Overworld Loot: Jaguar Fang. Craftable Weapons: Jaguar Macuahuitl. Xoloitzcuintle It is a breed of dog endemic to Mexico, in addition, it spawns naturally on Mushroom Islands and Extreme Hills. It is tamed, fed, and reproduces with Jaguar fangs, it is immune to fire and a great battle companion, it will be very useful if you take it to the nether. Nether Entities: The spider and the nether bat are hostile entities that you will find in the nether. The bat is very fast, be careful. Cipactli Lizard: It is a primitive lizard in the creation of Mexican pre-Hispanic cultures. It is a boss that the world manager can spawn near water for players to fight against. Killing him will unlock his helmet which gives unlimited night vision and aquatic breathing to the player who wears it. You will find 4 structures that are generated naturally throughout the overworld, you must chop them to find vases in which when you break them you will find ashes of the gods. These ashes will be used to make the summoning blocks, necessary to later summon each god of the addon. TLALOC: In the history of Mexican culture, he was the god of water and natural phenomena. When spawning the god the storm will start, if you get too close it will bury some blocks underground. How to summon it? The Tlaloc altar block is found only in the creative inventory, the world manager can place it in the area they like. Players must craft the Tlaloc summoner block, with items they gather from structures that spawn in the world. Then the player must place the summoner block on the altar block and must touch it, then the god Tlaloc will spawn. Upon death Tlaloc will drop his weapon. TONATIUH: He is the god of the sun, if you get close to him lightning will fall on you, but he also summons blazes, you must kill him soon. How to summon it? Tonatiuh’s altar block is found only in the creative inventory, the world manager can place it in the area they like. Players must craft the summoning block of Tonatiuh, with items they gather from the structures that spawn in the world and with the fragment that Tlaloc left behind when he died. Then the player must place the summoner block on top of the altar block and must touch it, then the god Tonatiuh will spawn. Upon death he will drop his weapon. MICTLANTECUHTLI: He is the god of the underworld, if you get close to him you will have a dark effect, but he also summons bats from the nether and teleports like an enderman. How to summon it? Mictlantecuhtli’s altar block is found only in the creative inventory, the world manager can place it in the area they like. Players must craft the summoner block of this god, with items they gather from the structures that spawn in the world and with the fragment that Tonatiuh left behind when he died. Then the player must place the summoner block on the altar block and must touch it, then the god will spawn. Upon death, he will drop his helmet which will give you night vision and fire resistance. QUETZALCOATL: It is the feathered serpent, if you get close to it you will have a levitation effect, but it also summons jaguar warriors. Throw dragon balls. How to summon it? The altar block of this god is found only in the creative inventory, the world administrator can place it in the area they like. Players must craft the summoning block of this god, with items that they gather from the structures that are generated in the world and with the fragment that Tonatiuh, Tlaloc and Mictlan left when they died. Then the player must place the summoner block on the altar block and must touch it, then the god will spawn. When he dies he will drop his helmet that will give you a slow fall effect. It is recommended to spawn this god in the end. There are 3 functions that you can activate one by one while Quetzalcoatl is alive. Each function will resurrect the spirit of the gods you have killed before. You must write in a command block or in the chat the functions: /function q1      [Resurrect Tlaloc] /function q2       [Resurrect Tonatiuh] /function q3        [Resurrect Mictlantecuhtli] You can generate a pyramid in the area you want with the command: /structure load mystructure:pmaya ~ ~ ~ You can find 3 types of currencies to establish your own type of commercial exchange. Make sure you turn on all the Experimental Gameplay. – –

42.name: God of War Addon
42.author: Alysson_Lord_D
42.description: God of War Addon (1.19) enhances your adventure in a Nordic world with the legendary ghost of Sparta, a man from a different land. The addon introduces new threats to the game with mythical creatures, but you can fight them with classic magic weapons crafted by expert dwarves. Another challenge is the arena of gods, where you can face powerful gods with unique abilities. More gods will be added soon. KRATOS ATREUS/Loki BEAR SINDRI/Brook OLD ARES HEIMDALL Thor Odin/three phases 1 & 2 3 Ogre Drake Troll Draugr Blades of Chaos Leviathan Draupnir Mijonir All weapons have abilities discover them Dwarf dwarf  forge In this structure, you find the dwarves who exchange weapons and armor for silver dropped by monsters of chest Portal A portal that leads to the active end Chest In this structure, you will get vanilla and silver ores to exchange for the Addon. Arena of the Gods: In this arena, you will fight the Gods. Buy the missions from the old man who is at the entrance using Silver. Make sure you activate the Experimental Gameplay. – –

43.name: Magma Dream Addon
43.author: BeBlock
43.description: Magma Dream Addon (1.20, 1.19) – Nether Update is an intriguing MCPE addon that brings a fresh and exciting twist to the Nether. This addon introduces new creatures, gameplay features, and a mysterious environment filled with danger and intrigue. Created by BeBlock, this addon transforms the Nether into a new environment, complete with a new Piglin fortress, the Blaze Tower, and new scenery for the existing biomes. It also introduces new companions for your adventure, such as the Magmazard, a tame mount inspired by the Ark universe, capable of launching attacks when mounted and creating netherite ingots from pieces of netherite. The addon also includes a plant exclusive to the “warped forest” biome that can cause explosions, and a little stone pig named “Pigfer” that can help you find blocks of netherite if you feed it properly. However, beware of the magma tentacles that appear in the lava and the nether spirit that haunts every corner of the map. This pack is exclusive to Bedrock. The free version contains: 2 entities: the Magmazard and the Soul Camp. Animations, particles, and sounds are exclusive to each entity. All-new nether gameplay features mcaddon: –

44.name: Ragnarok Addon
44.author: BATBOA
44.description: Ragnarok Addon (1.20, 1.19) is an addon inspired by God of War: Ragnarok and they intend to make a universe with this addon, with the goal of eventually implementing the entire God of War universe in Minecraft. The intention of this addon is to make players feel like a God of War. The addon is designed for survival and cooperative play, and it is hoped that you will enjoy it with your friends. The intention is also to change the way of playing Minecraft, altering the gameplay and difficulty of the game, so it is hoped that you will have fun with the Ragnarok addon and appreciate this project that is being made with love. The Ragnarok addon includes weapons, armor, mobs, trades, and a combat system, all designed to give players the atmosphere of being in the God of War universe. The addon items are mainly used for the creation of weapons, armor and you can even trade with them, the items are difficult to obtain since the weapons are very powerful as well as the armor Will you be able to get all the armor and level up the weapons to the maximum level? Will you be worthy of being the god of war? Solid Mercury: Uru: Beryllium red: Fog Echo: Jormungand Essence: Jormungand Venom: Asgardian Steel: Svartalfheim Steel: Hardened Steel: Draupnir Ring: Draupnir Blade: Chaos Flame: Frozen flame: Gale flame: Lightning essence: OMEGA (This item is used to create a launchable leviathan): Thor’s gauntlets (this item is used to create a throwable Mjolnir): The addon has more than 50 armors and some armors are easy to get, but others are difficult to get because they give you unimaginable resistance and also give effects, in addition to adding a multiplayer function, in which some armors like Zeus’s breastplate has the ability to give the same effect to the players you have in a nearby radius, can you forge an armor worthy of a god of war? All the armors are designed for you to create your own combination, so design your powerful armor of the god of war. The strongest armor sets are: 1st Armor of Zeus 2nd Armor of Ares 3rd Steinbjorn Armor … There are also full body armors that serve more than anything to give an atmosphere to the addon and you sit in the god of war universe, and you decide who you want to be (These armors also give you effects related to the powers they have in God of War Ragnarok) And finally add the reference armors, which also give you effects and even some also give effects to more players close to you, these armors are inspired by the moon knight, namor or kukulkan, and thanos or the titan. These armors are also designed for you to design your appearance and make the best armor to be the most powerful god of war *All armor crafts are on the crafting table and remember that you can design your outfit yourself! Each weapon has two special attacks and two unique animations, and the addon has more than 20 animations and unique attacks Leviathan Leviathan has 6 levels, leviathan, level 3 leviathan and level 6 leviathan, each time leviathan levels up it is much stronger and its special attack is even more destructive, all attacks and special attacks were inspired by god of war ragnarok and god of war 2018. In addition, the author also added a launchable leviathan that is obtained for free by improving leviathan to level 6. To upgrade to leviathan lvl3: To upgrade to leviathan lvl6: When throwing leviathan there is a chance that it will be lost and in case it is lost you must use OMEGA for another throwable leviathan Mjölnir Mjölnir has the ability to make you fly and at the same time serves as the transportation and has the ability to summon lightning and launch them at mobs close to you, in addition to crafting it, it will also give you launchable Mjölnir and launchable Mjölnir on impact will generate lightning, but there is also a small chance of it being lost and to craft another throwable Mjölnir you need thor’s gauntlets Blades of Chaos The blades of chaos have 5 levels, being that there are the blades of chaos base, the blades of chaos of level 3, and the blades of chaos of level 5, these swords have attacks and special attacks inspired by god of war ragnarok and god of war 2018. Also add the hook-shaped blades of chaos, which serve as transportation They also added the chains and claws of Hades, these weapons are the easiest to get and have two levels: the claws of Hades and the chains of Hades. The chains of Hades are much more powerful than the claws of Hades and have a special attack, while the Hades claws have only a special attack. Draupnir Spear Draupnir Spear has 9 levels, being that we will have draupnir spear base, draupnir spear lvl6 and draupnir spear lvl9, each one has a different attack and a special attack, you can get them yourself and try them, but all of them attacks and special attacks were inspired by god of war ragnarok, hope you enjoy draupnir spear and feel like a god of war. Fury, Wrath, and Valor The spartan furies are totems that the author implemented with the intention that you can use the spartan fury just like in god of war Ragnarok but when using any fury you will have a very high cooldown since they are very powerful items VALOR regenerates you for life Wrath gives you incredible strength to amplify the damage you do with your weapon, he also gives you super speed and super jump for a very short time Fury gives you very high speed and enormous strength with which you can destroy many things * All weapons can be repaired and enchanted, other than if you have a diamond sword or netherite with enchantments you can pass them to any weapon in this addon. In the combat update, the author made each weapon have a combo, for example, leviathan has a combo at 15 hits, and when the 15 hits are completed you will make an attack, which is completely independent of the special attack. The intention of the combat update is to change the gameplay of Minecraft so that you feel in the god of war universe and you can create your attacks yourself. Each weapon has its combo and its unique attack independent of the special attack, in addition to showing in the name of the weapon how many hits you need to give to start the combo. Higher-level weapons will have a more powerful combo independent of the special attack which is also very powerful for higher-level weapons. With the new combat, you can create your own combos by combining the special attacks or attacks of your weapons, the question is, will you be as strong as Kratos? Hope you like this update designed for combat and cooperation, since when you perform some combos you will add effects to the players near you, as well as some armor that also gives effects to players near you. Sindri and Brok are the huldra brothers who are there to help you improve weapons and even trade items for the creation of your armor, they will appear around the world, but the only place where they appear together is the snow plains Brok: Sindri: The draugr are dead returned to life that will make your life more difficult, and there are several types of draugr, being that the normal draugr will only burn you with the effect of wither, while the projectile draugr will attack you from a distance by throwing fireballs at you and when it is close it will run to attack you, the explosive draugr will explode as well as the creepers when it is close to you, but the explosive draugr will make an explosion that will generate fire and do more damage, so be very careful, and lastly the empowered draugr They are bigger draugr that carry a sword that, in addition to impressing you with the effect of wither, will do you a very high damage, but once you have a good team they will not be an obstacle for you. Draugr: Draugr proyectil: Explosive Draugr: Empowered Draugr: The troll is a boss that has 1850 life and will not be generated throughout the world, only in the dungeons, when they die they will drop the dream stone that is used to craft Steinbjor’s armor, in addition to the fact that the troll will make lethal attacks, so you must be very careful, but with the correct equipment, they will not be an impediment for you. As a curious fact in God of War of Norse mythology, the troll measures 14m while Kratos is 1.9, being that the troll is practically 7 times bigger than Kratos, but in order not to give lag problems, the troll is 3.5 times bigger than Steve.
