All these changes make this version of the addon Public server-friendly. If you want a version for a single player or a public server with only PVE you can try the FULL VERSION. Behavior (Full Version): – Behavior (PvP Version): – –

65.name: BetterEnd Bedrock Addon
65.author: Halo333X, Quiqueck
65.description: BetterEnd Bedrock Addon (1.20) is a port of BetterEnd Mod for Java by Quiqueck that adds new features to the “The End” dimension in Minecraft. It includes a wide variety of biomes, vegetation, minerals, woods, and creatures. With this addon, you can create new objects such as wooden objects, armor, swords, tools, and food. It works on the Bedrock Edition platform and is compatible with cellular devices, PCs/computers, and consoles. This addon breathes new life into the game’s dimension and provides an exciting experience for players. Note: This addon is in the beta (development) phase, so it is important that you know that there may be bugs or errors. Amber Lands Amber Lands is a forest of twisting trees and tall vegetation. You can mine amber ore here. Fog Color: Amber/Orange Terrain: Amber Moss Trees: Helix Tree Plants: Amber Grass Bulb Moss Glowing Pillar Orange Charnia Red Charnia Lanceleaf Mobs: End Slime Enderman Blossoming Spires Blossoming Spires are islands and floating spires covered in lush pink and blue foliage and colorful hanging plants. Petals gently fall from above. Silk moth nests can be found here. Fog Color: Pink Terrain: Pink Moss Trees: Tenanea Tree Plants: Bulb Vine Bushy Grass Twisted Moss Blossom Berry Mobs: Enderman Silk Moth Chorus Forest Chorus Forests are islands with chorus plants and large mushroom-covered trees. Small ponds with charnia as well as violecite ruins can occasionally be found scattered through the forest. Fog Color: Purple Terrain: Chorus Nylium Trees: Pythadendron Tree Plants: Chorus Plant Chorus Grass Tail Moss Purple Polypore Purple Charnia Red Charnia Mobs: Enderman End Slime Crystal Mountains Crystal Mountains are hilly islands with colorful, glowing crystal peaks protruding from the terrain. The hills are otherwise barren but each island has a border of small meadows. Fog Color: Light Purple Terrain: Crystal Moss, End Stone Plants: Crystal Grass Mobs: Enderman Dragon Graveyards Dragon Graveyards feature glowing mushrooms of various sizes and broken pillars of mossy obsidian. Fireflies drift about in the air. Fog Color: Red Terrain: Sangnum Trees: Gigantic Amarnita Plants: Clawfern Globulagus Large Amarnita Small Amarnita Mobs: Enderman Dry Shrubland Dry Shrubland is an island covered with a variety of plants. There are no trees, but bushes can occasionally be found. Fog Color: Dark orange Terrain: Rustiscus Trees: Lucernia Plants: Aeridium Lamellarium Lucernia Bush Lutebus Orango Mobs: Enderman Dust Wastelands Dust Wastelands is a barren island with an abundance of dust. Fog Color: Pale-Yellow / Lime Terrain: End Stone Dust Mobs: Enderman Foggy Mushroomland Foggy Mushroomland is a lush biome filled with moss and giant glowing mushrooms. Lakes full of aquatic life can also occasionally be found here. Fog Color: Blue Terrain: End Moss, End Mycelium Trees: Mossy Glowshroom Plants: Blue Vine Creeping Moss Cyan Charnia Cyan Moss Dense Vine End Lily Light Blue Charnia Red Charnia Umbrella moss Mobs: Dragonfly End Fish End Slime Cubozoa Enderman Glowing Grasslands Glowing Grasslands are islands covered with various plants and large flowers that illuminate the terrain. Fireflies drift about in the air. Fog Color: Cyan Terrain: End Moss Plants: Blooming Cooksonia Creeping Moss Cyan Charnia Green Charnia Light Blue Charnia Red Charnia Salteago Twisted Umbrella Moss Umbrella Moss Vaiolush Fern Lumecorn Mobs: Enderman Lantern Woods Lantern Woods are vibrant forests with glowing flowers resembling lanterns hanging from trees and even floating in the sky. Small ponds with lilypads and anemones can occasionally be found in this biome. Fog Color: Orange Terrain: Rustiscus Trees: Lucernia Plants: Aeridium Aurant Polypore Bolux Mushroom Flamaea Lamellarium Orange Charnia Pond Anemone Red Charnia Ruscus Filalux Mobs: Enderman Megalake Megalake is a lush biome which can feature massive tiered lakes full of colorful life. Menger sponges and bubble coral can also be found in its waters. Fog Color: Light-Blue Terrain: End Moss, End Stone Dust Plants: Creeping Moss Cyan Charnia End Lily End Lotus Light Blue Charnia Menger Sponge Red Charnia Umbrella Moss Mobs: Cubozoa Dragonfly End Fish End Slime Enderman Neon Oasis Neon Oasis resembles a lush desert. It is filled with large glowing cactus plants and ponds of charnia. Fog Color: Pale-Yellow / Lime Terrain: End Stone Dust, End Moss Plants: Creeping Moss Cyan Charnia Green Charnia Red Charnia Umbrella Moss Neon Cactus Mobs: Enderman Shadow Forest Shadow Forest is a dark and dangerous forest filled with large mushroom-covered trees and hanging vines. Small ponds with charnia can occasionally be found here. Players should watch their step when traveling through this biome as it features thorny plants. Fog Color: Black Terrain: Shadow Grass Trees: Dragon Tree Plants: Murkweed Needlegrass Purple Charnia Purple Polypore Red Charnia Shadow Berry Shadow Plant Tail Moss Twisted Vine Mobs: Enderman Shadow Walker Phantom Ice Starfield Ice Starfield is an area where various stars of ice are generated in the void. Fog Color: White Terrain: Emerald Ice, Dense Snow Mobs: Enderman Empty End Cave Lush Aurora Cave Lush Smaragdant Cave Empty Smaragdant Cave Jadestone Cave Cubozoa Cubozoa are glowing jellyish-like mobs that can be found in bodies of water. Their colors vary depending on the biome they are found in. If you are careful they can be captured alive with a bucket, but beware of their poisonous touch. Drop: Gelatine Biomes: Foggy Mushroomland Megalake Megalake Grove Sulphur Springs Dragonfly Dragonfly is a glowing, ambient mob that can be found fluttering around lake biomes. Drop: None Biomes: Foggy Mushroomland Megalake Megalake Grove End Fish End Fish are colorful, glowing fish that can be found in lakes and geysers. Their colors vary based on the biome in which the fish was found. They can be captured alive with a bucket. Drop: End Fish Biomes: Foggy Mushroomland Megalake Megalake Grove Sulphur Springs End Slime End Slime is a relative of the overworld slime. They come in four variants that change depending on the biome they spawned in. Each slime has a symbiotic relationship with one of the plants growing in the same biome. Drop: Slimeball Biomes: Amber Land Chorus Forest Foggy Mushroomland Megalake Megalake Grove Shadow Walker Shadow Walker is a humanoid mob that slowly stalks you. Adventurers touched by them will suffer from temporary blindness. Drop: None Biomes: Shadow Forest Silk Moth Silk Moth is an insect that can be found fluttering among the Tenanea trees. They like to fill their nests with silk. Drop: Silk Fiber Biomes: Blossoming Spires Make sure you turn on the Experimental Gameplay. – –

66.name: Infested Parasites Addon
66.author: Willian Sixteen
66.description: Infested Parasites Addon (1.20, 1.19) transforms the survival mode of the game with new creatures, objects and buildings. It is based on Scape And Run Parasites, an addon that introduces parasites that take over other mobs. Be warned, this addon can be frightening for some players. Larva parasite: 5 life 3 damage This parasite usually appears in your world and can evolve into a crawler or a flying parasite. The crawler: 15 life 6 damage This parasite is slightly stronger than the larva and lay parasite eggs, it can also evolve into a stinger Flying parasite 7 life shoots acid that gives 6 of damage This parasite is weak but it shoots acid that causes poison and it does a lot of damage Stinger parasite: 25 life 8 damage shoots acid that gives 6 of damage This parasite lays eggs faster, shoots acid, and is the strongest of the addon for now Infected human: 30 life 9 damage This parasite is invoked when a zombie or husk is infected, He’s strong and can break doors and makes some bizarre sounds Infected villager: 30 of life 9 damage This parasite is invoked when a villager is infected, He’s strong and can break doors. Infected cow: 25 life 8 damage This parasite is quite simple, it can break some blocks. Infected pig: 20 life 5 damage Is the cow, this mob is very simple also being only the infection of a pig Infected sheep: 25 life 8 damage Like the pig and cow, this parasite is just an infection of a  sheep Infected creeper: 20 of life This parasite is like a creeper but it infects a certain area when it explodes Power Of Poisoning: This item throws acid and gives 8 damage Can be found in the laboratory Infected summoner: This block invokes a Stinger every 60 to 80 seconds Laboratory: This structure is found beneath the surface having crawler spawners and you can also find the item “Power Of Poisoning”. Infested tower: This structure can be found on the surface by having an Infested Sumoner on its Make sure you turn on the Experimental Gameplay. mcaddon: –

67.name: Kimetsu no Yaiba ST Addon
67.author: Soldado TnT
67.description: Minecraft Bedrock’s vast universe offers an epic journey for players who aspire to become true Demon Hunters. The new Demon Slayer addon transports you to the world of Kimetsu no Yaiba, where courage and training merge to face the demonic threat. Prepare yourself to confront the most terrifying demons that the Kimetsu no Yaiba universe has to offer. With the new battle system, you can use breathing techniques to enhance your skills and become a formidable opponent against the demonic legions. Beware of the terrible Blood Demons, powerful bosses that will challenge your courage and combat skills. Ready your blade, choose your Breath, and enter battle. Kimetsu no Yaiba ST Addon (1.20, 1.19) will test your bravery and determination as you become a true Hashira, facing demonic horrors and protecting humanity from evil. Are you ready to accept this challenge? Refine your weapon techniques by executing quick strikes and feel like a true master as you face Enderman enemies and protect your world from incoming threats posed by bosses. Upon birth, you will be granted access to a new menu that allows you to modify your hair and skin color, as well as view family information. After birth you will have the 3 items that will remain in your inventory, these items will be: Customization Menu, Blocked Brand, and Parchment of Missions. After choosing your family, the blacksmiths’ villa will appear: In the first house, you can remove the nichirin pieces that you got: These will be the pieces you need to build your own nichirin-to: In the second house, you can assemble your nichirin, just by clicking on the pieces you disassembled: In the last house, you can increase the damage and durability of your nichirin: To become an oni hunter, you will have to talk to Urokodaki and complete his missions: After completing the missions, you will become an oni hunter, and earn your own nichirin-to With your own nichirin-to, you will be able to use all the breaths you learn from the hunters and hashiras, who will be available throughout the overworld. Each hunter will have their own difficulty in achieving the breathing technique. These are the new nichirin-to, kekeijutsus, and clothes. Families agatsuma hashibira kamado rengoku uzui These are all demon art and nichirin-to that received modifications: Make sure you turn on the Experimental Gameplay. – –

68.name: WorldEdit Addon
68.author: SIsilicon
68.description: WorldEdit Addon (1.20, 1.19) is a popular addon for Minecraft: Bedrock, which is a port of the renowned WorldEdit Mod from Minecraft: Java Edition. This addon introduces custom commands to simplify and enhance your building experience. It also includes custom items to make it more accessible to users across different devices. The WorldEdit : Bedrock Edition is packed with a multitude of significant features that are also found in the original mod. These features encompass: Manipulation of the clipboard (Cut, Copy, Paste) A handy WorldEdit kit for easy access to prevalent features The ability to stack and move blocks and regions Functions to rotate and flip regions Robust block patterns and masks Navigation commands for ease of movement Generation of shapes, both built-in, and custom Creation of walls, lines, and outlines Terrain smoothing for a more natural look Undo and redo capabilities for correcting mistakes Filling and replacing blocks for quick modifications Painting with brushes for artistic touches Saving and loading structures, which requires an app for cross-world operations Modifying biomes, also requires an app. Some creations made with WorldEdit: Please read the quick start section in Settings > How to Play while playing in a WorldEdit-enabled world, for a short guide on how the addon works. Firstly, go to the download section link appropriate for your Minecraft version. Just go through as instructed and a file called “WorldEdit.mcaddon” should be downloaded. After downloading the addon, you open it with Minecraft, and it will be imported into your game. Android users need to use a third-party file explorer such as File Manager to open the file. iOS users should use Documents for iOS . Once there, choose a world you want to apply this addon to and add the behavior pack and resource pack together. The “Holiday Creator Features”, and “Beta APIs” experiments must also be enabled. And that’s it! Your world is now ready for WorldEdit. Third-Party Servers The version for the third-party server is “WorldEdit.server.zip” and it contains the behavior pack folder, resource pack folder, and the addon’s “variables.json” file which is used to customize the addon’s function. Installing the packs depends on the server and its method hosting, but “variables.json” must be placed in the server’s “config/default” folder or “config/<module uuid>” folder, where the UUID is the addon’s UUID defined in its behavior pack manifest file. Aternos server Note: Aternos doesn’t seem to accept JSON files, so you may need to use the normal mcaddon version of the addon with it. To properly add this addon to an Aternos server, you first need to upload an already existing world with the required experimental features enabled. Do not upload a world with the addon already applied to it! You must then install the addon separately in the server’s packs folder. WorldEdit Mod mcaddon: – mcaddon: – Zip: –

69.name: Half-Life 1 Addon
69.author: kaiboi39projects
69.description: Half-Life 1 Addon (1.20) is a Minecraft remake of Half-Life 1. Currently, it’s in its early alpha version, and more interesting mobs and weapons will be added in the future. Although the author can’t guarantee every mob, most of them will be included. You might be thinking, ‘But Kai, there’s already a Half-Life add-on.’ However, this is Half-Life 1, and he made it because he enjoyed Half-Life very much and wanted to recreate it in Minecraft. Half-Life Xen Mobs adds the Half-Life 1 xen mobs and an extra level of fun and danger to the Minecraft world. It provides a challenging experience to your Minecraft world. Currently, only six mobs are available as this add-on is still a work in progress. All mobs are unique and have different health, speed, and attack damage. When the add-on is fully completed, the intensity will increase to a whole new level. Headcrab The head crab is a parasitic species. Upon sighting a humanoid host, the head crab will leap for the victim’s head and bite for now Health: 20 Attack damage: 2 Leap Height: 9 Affiliation: Xen wildlife Headcrab Zombie The result of a headcrab attaching to the head of a suitable host and taking control of its victims body Health: 31 Attack damage: 2 Affiliation: Xen wildlife Other variants of the headcrab zombie The standard zombie security guard The standard zombie HECU grunt The standard zombie scientist Gonome The gonome is “mature” form of the standard headcrab zombie. Health: 161 Attack damage: 15 to 20 Type: Mutant headcrab zombie Affiliation: Xen wildlife Future updates: throw and chest bite Bullsquid The Bullsquid is bipedal, highly aggressive alien creature. Health: 30 Attack damage: 6 Spit distance: 2.7 Affiliation: Xen wildlife Alien Grunt Alien Grunts stand about seven feet tall and are armed with a biological weapon called the Hivehand, which fires creatures called hornets Health: 64 Attack damage: 6 Projectile damage: 2.1 Affiliation: Xen Gonarch Little is known about how and when the metamorphosis from Headcrab to Gonarch takes place, as few Headcrabs ever reach that stage Health: 200 Attack damage: 6 Projectile damage: 2.7 Affiliation: Xen Wildlife Vortiguant The Vortigaunts (taxonomic designation: Xenotherium subservient, or “Subservient Alien Beast”), formerly known as “Alien Slaves” or “Xen Slaves” Health: 64 Attack damage: 6 Projectile damage: 2.7 Affiliation: Xen Science Team Each scientist is granted a different security clearance specific to his or her duty, with an average clearance of Level 5. Like other employees, scientists have an assigned uniform, consisting of a blue shirt, white lab coat, red striped tie, and white Health: 40 Affiliation: Black-mesa personnel Security Guard Security Guards oversee security throughout the facility. They have different ranks and are granted a different security clearance specific to their duty, with an average clearance of Level 3, as well as colored shifts in specific Areas of specific Sectors, such as Red, Orange, Yellow, Green, Blue, Indigo, and Violet Shifts Health: 64 Projectile damage: 2.1 Affiliation: Black-mesa personnel Hazard Suit Gordon Freeman Health: 300 Attack damage: 6 Projectile damage: 4.7 Affiliation: Black-mesa personnel Construction Worker Health: 40 Affiliation: Black-mesa personnel Gus Health: 40 Affiliation: Black-mesa personnel H.E.C.U Marines The Marines of the HECU are specially trained to deal with a variety of indoor combat situations, particularly involving a dangerous environment and unconventional enemies. The HECU are part of a “dangerous and very efficient clean-up crew Health: 64 Attack damage: 6 Projectile damage: 2.7 Affiliation: United States Marine Corps Black ops The Black Ops, sometimes hyphenated to Black Ops and known in full as Black Operations, are a group of trained government agents Health: 64 Attack damage: 6 Projectile damage: 2.7 Affiliation: Federal government of the United States [Crowbar] Damage: 7 [Glock-17] Damage: 7 Ammunition: 9mm Loaded Magazine Round capacity: 16 [Colt python] Damage: 15 Round capacity: 6 Ammunition: Colt Python Ammo [Desert eagle] Damage: 15 Round capacity: 8 Ammunition: 50 Cal Desert Eagle Magazine [Combat Shotgun] Round capacity: 8 Ammunition: Shotgun Shell [SPAS-12] Damage: 20 Round capacity: 8 Ammunition: Shotgun Shell [MP5] Damage: 15 Round capacity: 50 Grenade Damage: 15 Ammunition: 9mm Loaded MP5 Magazine [M4A1] Damage: 15 Round capacity: 50 Grenade Damage: 15 Ammunition: 5.56 Loaded M4 Magazine [M249] Damage: 15 Round capacity: 100 Ammunition: 5.56 Loaded M249 Magazine [TAU cannon] Damage: 90.5 Round capacity: 100 Ammunition: Plasma [Satchel charge] If the player throws the satchel and does not want to detonate it they can right click or if they are on a mobile device they can hold it and they can pick it back up To detonate it use the Satchel Detonator: You can find the weapons in Equipment: You can find the spawners in items: Make sure you turn on the Experimental Gameplay. – –

70.name: Magical Warfare Addon
70.author: ZussmanKlint
70.description: Magical Warfare Addon (1.20, 1.19) for Minecraft PE offers a unique and immersive experience for players who enjoy the magical aspects of the game. This addon allows players to choose their magic type and provides them with permanent items in their inventory that contain skills. These skills will not be lost even upon death. The magic types available are Soul, Frost, and Demolition, each with its own set of passive abilities, basic attacks, and skills. For instance, the Soul type can deal wither effect damage, switch positions with mobs, summon undead zombies, and more. The Frost type can slow down enemies, freeze and trap entities, and summon an entity that shoots ice balls rapidly. The Demolition type is immune to all types of explosions, can shoot bombs, and summon explosive fireworks that track enemies. In addition to the magic system, the add-on introduces a new mana system, new items, and new structures. Players can upgrade their mana by standing on the beacon in the spawn point. New items such as Mana Bottle, Elixir, Mana Gem, and more can be found in structures and dropped by entities. These items can restore mana, enhance mana regeneration, or trigger random events when consumed. The addon also introduces new entities called “Shifted” monsters, which are tougher, faster, stronger, and do not burn in daylight. These include Shifted Zombie, Shifted Skeleton, Shifted Creeper, and Shifted Spider. Each of these monsters has unique abilities and can drop mana essence or other items upon defeat. Make sure you activated the Experimental Gameplay. – –

71.name: Mysticraft Addon
71.author: Gibbs_Mc
71.description: Have you ever felt that Minecraft was getting a bit too easy? Lacking in its more Fantastical elements? Or just want a new way to experience the game? If so then Mysticraft is for you. Mysticraft Addon (1.20, 1.19) not only adds 27 amazing addons, 150+ new structures, and over 100 unique creatures but introduces a multitude of magic items and a new way to interact with death and health, in a way that’ll hopefully make your experience fresh and evermore challenging. Mysticraft adds a slew of new creatures and enemies to face, beefing up most hostile and neutral creatures as well as making slight changes to certain mob behaviors. (This won’t be the whole list (there are over 100)) Pyre Drake , this flaming lizard is a destructive force of flame, able to reduce any adventurers that cross its domain in the plains or forests to ash and bone. Glacis Drake , this creature of frost builds its nests anywhere as icey as itself, though this makes it rare than the pyre drake, it’s just as ferocious as its flaming cousin. The Magma Tyrant , A formidable beast of the nether seas, mind your step around Laval lakes with these monsters around. The Wretched Wyvern , A legless dragon, an evolutionary offshoot of the drake and a scourge of thundering skies. Mummy , this undead spawn in the desert using scarabs to attack their enemies. Decayed zombie , A zombie on its way to becoming a skeleton, usually clad in armor they are used to defend structures Undead Miners , These zombies, unfortunately, died on the job, still clinging to the pickaxes they once used to mine Swampy , A poisonous little boi, roams the swamps looking for players to prey on The Chocobo, a majestic bird of the plains, feed it some gysahl and you may have a companion for life Fowlraptor , these semi-reptilian birds are a tad less majestic, preferring to hunt in the savanna striking down their prey with powerful claws Gargoyles , are masters of camouflage, using their stoney appearance to blend in with the underground Meatball , An aberration of nature that will spawn anywhere to wreck havoc upon the world Elves , the elves, and elven druids take to the forest to exterminate evil, they will trade you various goods but don’t get in their way Dwarfs , the  Dwarfs reside in mines atop stoney peaks, do not underestimate them for their small size; they are a powerful bunch Pirates , the pillagers have taken to the high seas, beware their jolly rancher Dragonkin , a primitive species that call the mangroves home The Wrought Sentry As well as creatures there is a multitude of new structures out there to explore, here’s just a snippet of them: But this wouldn’t be a complete addon pack with only creatures and structures, there’s a multitude of new foods, materials, armors, and items; magical or otherwise to fill your world. Some sandwiches and new food combos: New Baked goods and Pastries: And much more! To craft most of these you must first craft either the spell table or the conjuring table: Spell table Conjuring table Frostbinger staff – Casts a large ball of frost, temporarily freezing its surroundings Fireball staff – Casts a ball of fire Thunderstrike staff – Casts a bolt of lightning Instantaneous staff – Allows you to teleport through any distance or dimension Gold ring – Used as a base for crafting Amethyst ring Amethyst ring – Can be infused with Potion effects After crafting an Amethyst ring, use a brewing stand to infuse the ring with any Potion effect. (Potion must be lengthened using redstone) Blank tome – Used as a base to craft magical tomes Tome of Decay – Summons 4 zombies to aid you in battle Tome of Marrow – Summons 4 skeletons to aid you in battle Tome of Embers – Summons 4 Embers to aid you in battle Tome of Frostbite – Summons 4 Frostfire to aid you in battle Empty Scroll – Used as base to craft magic scrolls Fireball scroll – Casts an a torrent of fireballs Frostbringer Scroll – Casts large balls of frost, temporarily freezing its surroundings Thunderstrike Scroll – Casts multiple bolts of lightning Soulburst Scroll – Summons 4 imp souls to aid you in battle Soaring Scroll – Grants 25 seconds of Jump boost and slow falling to you Amethyst – Amethyst can now be used to upgrade diamond tools and armor, increasing its enchant ability and strength in terms of tools but decreasing their durability Mithril – Mithril is used to create powerful armor and weaponry as well as being an important component of most magic staffs Argent – This ore can be found deep underground, it is used to create powerful swords, and armour that can withstand knockback Drake bone – Obtained from the bones of a slain Drake this armour set is a testimony to one’s strength, the armour is as tough as diamond while the sword; even more so Moonstone – Moonstone crystals are found in the soulsand Valleys and can be used to add an aesthetic flair to diamond armour, making it glow a heavenly blue Sunstone – Sunstone crystals on the other hand are found deep within warped forests, and is used to make your diamond set glow a magnificent firey orange And one last vital nugget of information; you lose hearts as you die. Every time you die you lose 1 heart only able to gain it back by crafting and consuming it. 50 hearts being the limit. This uses totems in its crafting recipe, and if these are too difficult to obtain, simply craft them. To craft a Totem you must first obtain a Shattered totem, either from the Rotten evoker or certain structures, and mend it using gold nuggets as seen below, then just use the recipe above – – – –

72.name: Moon Knight Addon
72.author: ArathNidoGamer
72.description: With Moon Knight Addon (1.20, 1.19), you will be able to become a real Moon Knight – a superhero from the Marvel Universe. The addon implements costumes related to the character, enemies, entities that you can interact with, structures, and new objects that you can get in survival mode. Pyramids will appear in the deserts, where the statues of Honshu are located. If the statues are broken, Khonshu himself will appear, selling costumes and weapons for gold. New structures will be generated in the world of Minecraft, these pyramids can be found in the desert biomes, and within them you will find the statue of Khonshu, destroying the statue will invoke Khonshu which he will grant you the Moon Knight suits and weapons in exchange for gold. Putting on a Moon Knight suit will give you effects such as resistance, strength, jump and speed, if you wear a mask it will give you night vision. The elytra will change their design while wearing the Moon Knight outfit. Crescent darts can be used as a melee weapon or thrown at enemies He will appear in desert biomes, he will attack by shooting magic, he will summon jackal and attack melee when you defeat him he will release his vows which serves as a melee weapon and shoot magic, to shoot use the interact button. Tueris It will appear in desert biomes and you can interact with it to trade. Make sure you activate the Experimental Gameplay feature. mcaddon: – – –

73.name: Instant Houses Addon
73.author: EndXenoc MCPE
73.description: Instant Houses Addon (1.20, 1.19) is an addon that adds 14 houses and 2 mansions that you can generate with one click, it also adds lighting blocks. All of this is found in the creative inventory. This addon works on all versions after 1.17.30. This addon adds 6 new houses and 2 mansions that are fully decorated. There are also new blocks that help light up the houses. You will find all this in the creative inventory. Make a backup of your world before using this addon as some structures are very large and can crash the world and corrupt it or in case you spawn the structure in an unwanted place. House 1 House 2 House 3 House 4 House 5 Mansion 1 Crafting Recipes: Make sure you activated all the following Experimental Gameplay Options: – – – –

74.name: New Adventure Plus Addon
74.author: Guardian Deep
74.description: New Adventure Plus Addon (1.20, 1.19) fills the world of Minecraft Bedrock with a bunch of new things. Mobs, rare mobs, variations of mobs, food, old concepts, ideas, myths, and new features of old things. Literally, everything that is possible is collected in this add-on. In addition to new items, the build will also improve old features, mob behavior, and more. Chest with all things: /structure load chest_addons There are a lot of things from the addon in the chest Ender Phantom – Endermare A version of the phantoms from Ender’s world. The texture of the mob is based on the texture from the snapshot 18w07a. They appear in Ender’s world. They often become messengers of death, Thanks to a large number, they often enrage or lead to death. To survive, create a bow, armor and arrows. In ender world, you can often find their nests, endermare do not care about their offspring.. Monsters of caves depths It spawn for water deep caves Dangerous for miners who do not expect his vile deadly language ⛏ It is an analog of a creature with minecon ( Mob A ) Copper Golem This copper creature does not like silverfish, gradually oxidizes Great Hunger Glare Appears in lush caves, afraid of monsters Smoldering Soul Dwells in the world and is in search of goals, and I wonder how much it hurts not to get peace after one’s death Redstone silverfish How long have you not cleaned your equipment? (effect wither) At death, a special eye falls Red phantom Added new version of the phantoms, red phantoms! From the concepts shown by Mojang. It appears at night even if you were asleep. he can destroy a sheep farm if you are a careless player Mysterious Lighthouse A huge and very rare building found on the beaches Mangrove pyramid How long has it been hidden in the swamps Cemetery All over the world, you can find the graves of long-dead miners, farmers, and warriors. Perhaps if you start digging, you will be able to find the button from the clothes Surface ships On the ship, only new blocks… Not a ship anymore A beach house rebuilt from the wreckage of a ship Mesa tower A rare structure in the Mesa desert, the locals say that some treasures were hidden there, but we found only one chest Jungle post These posts look very old Spider dungeons Dungeons, caves, mines that will diversify gameplay Sky lanter 16 colors and some YouTubers: Nerkin, ZloyXp, Dax, Dream, Bav, Mr Pleer, Циан, Mine Dragon, SystemZee, Stepinght, and Creator Addon ⛏ Can be painted in all 16 colors. 75.name: Simple Roguelike Dungeon Addon
75.author: Kotenkuu
75.description: Simple Roguelike Dungeon Addon (1.20) introduces a fresh dimension to your Minecraft world: procedurally generated dungeons. These multi-level labyrinths are teeming with monsters and treasure. Since each dungeon layout is randomly created, you’ll likely never encounter the same design twice. Navigating these dungeons can be challenging due to their intricate network of rooms and corridors. There are five tiers, and as you descend deeper, the challenges become more formidable. Be prepared with decent gear, as things can get intense down there. Plus, the loot improves as you venture into lower tiers. While these dungeons are rare, the effort spent exploring is well worth it if you seek adventure! The Entrance: You can find these structures in your world that are generated in the overworld across most biomes, except for oceans, rivers, mushroom islands, and mountains. Inside the entrance, you will find a staircase that leads to the dungeon in the underground. Tier 1: Welcome to Tier 1, which has two categories of rooms: Monster Rooms and Feature Rooms. Monster Rooms contain spawners and loot, as the name suggests. Feature rooms, on the other hand, don’t have spawners, it can be a laboratory room, or it can be a room with a cake,… Overall, this tier is not too difficult and can be cleared with just iron armor. Tier 2: This tier is pretty much the same as Tier 1. It uses the same pool of room that Tier 1 uses. Tier 3: This is where it starts getting more intense. Feature rooms no longer generate on this tier, and the number of spawners increases. But the loot is worth the risk. Tier 4: Husks, strays, and cave spiders start spawning at this tier. And it can be very hard, you should better bring better armor and weapons. Tier 5: This tier is quite similar to Tier 4. And you can find very good loot at this tier. If you are lucky then you may stumble upon a reward room with a lot of loot. Limitations: This dungeon can currently only generate within 5×5 chunks at this moment, this is a pretty big problem. This limitation not only restricts the size of the dungeon but also limits the content and creativity that the creator can put into it. This add-on still has room for improvement so the author will try to add more in future updates. Make sure you turn on the Experimental Gameplay. mcpack: –

76.name: Project Walker Addon
76.author: Gabriel Aplok
76.description: Project Walker Addon (1.20) is an MCPE addon created by Gabriel Aplok that turns the game into a post-apocalyptic survival adventure. Players have to find food and weapons, fight zombies and other threats, and explore ruined buildings. The addon adds many new items, blocks, and mobs, as well as a thirst system. Minecraft vanilla stylized. Post-apocalyptic style. Lightweight and beautiful. No log error on the screen. A nice community. Loots. Combat and Survival. Health System (Broken leg, infection, and bleeding). Guns don’t work perfectly in multiplayer. Project Walker is a challenging and immersive addon that adds a new level of excitement to Minecraft Bedrock. If you’re looking for a new way to play the game, then Project Walker is definitely worth checking out. Items: Structures: 3D firearms: Entities: Open the .mcpack with Minecraft or extract and copy manually the folder to /Android/data/com.mojang.minecraftpe/ behavior and resources in the respective folders. Make sure you enable the experimental settings Also make sure you have enabled BOTH resources and behavior packs when creating the world. – –

77.name: Beyond the Underground Addon
77.author: HonKit26113
77.description: Beyond the Underground Addon (1.21, 1.20) adds more cave types for you to explore. Be careful of deadly mobs along the way, and you’ll be rewarded with valuable goods for you to level up your gear! This add-on currently adds 5 new cave types. These caves generate exclusively under Mushroom Islands This is a peaceful cave with no natural hostile mobs spawning The entire cave is slightly lit up with vegetation! Vegetation & Foliage Giant Luminous Mushrooms & Giant Gloomy Mushrooms generate in this cave Normal-sized mushrooms generate on the surface Radiant Vines grow from the ground These plants all emit a small amount of light! Food Luminous Mushroom Stew can be crafted with 1 Bowl, 1 Luminous Mushroom, and 1 Gloomy Mushroom Replenishes 6 hunger points (3 hunger bars) Gives you Night Vision for 15 seconds Mysterious Stew can be crafted with 1 Bowl, 1 Luminous Mushroom, 1 Gloomy Mushroom, 1 Red Mushroom, 1 Brown Mushroom, and 1 Mysterious Fungus Replenishes 3 hunger points (1.5 bars) Gives you 1-2 random effects (selecting from all positive and negative effects) Ores Luminite is a blue gemstone that can be found in Luminous Caverns Luminite Ore generates at Y levels -64 to 12 Drops 1-2 Luminite Shards when broken Combine 6 Luminite Shards and 1 Diamond in a Crafting Table to get 1 Luminite Luminite can be used to craft gear! Luminite gear can burn in the fire but is invulnerable to explosions Because of how hard to get Luminite is, Luminite gear is slightly better than Netherite gear! Mobs Shroom Elves spawn in Luminous Caverns They can be bred using Luminous Mushrooms They spawn in large groups of 4-8 They have 8 health (4 hearts) and die almost instantly from lava They run away from the player but can be lured using Luminous Mushrooms They drop 0-2 Luminous Mushrooms when killed Luminous Mooshrooms spawn in Luminous Caverns They can be bred using Wheat Interact with them using: A bucket to get milk A bowl to get Luminous Mushroom Stew Mysterious Fungus first, then a Bowl to get Mysterious Stew Shears to get Luminous Mushrooms. This will turn them into normal cows These caves generate exclusively under Swamps This is a very dangerous cave with thick green fog, limiting your rendering distance Vegetation & Foliage A layer of Slimy Stone replaces Stone on the surface, which slows you down Slime Layers cover most of the floor Slimy Blossoms and Slimy Sprouts scatter across the cave Sticky Spikes generate on the surface and hurt you when you step on them Slime drips from the ceiling Food Slime Soup can be crafted with 1 Bowl and 2 Slimeballs Replenishes 3 hunger points (1.5 bars) Gives you Jump Boost II for 8 seconds and Resistance II for 5 seconds Has a 45% chance to also give you Hunger I for 30 seconds and Nausea II for 20 seconds Mobs Slimy Zombies spawn in the Slimy Sewers They spawn in large hordes of 4 to 7 They have 20 health (10 hearts) like regular zombies They throw Hardened Slimeballs at enemies which deal 7 damage (3.5 hearts) with no armor They drop Rotten Flesh and Hardened Slimeballs when killed Vanilla Minecraft Slimes spawn more frequently here, in groups of 2 to 4 Vanilla Minecraft Witches also spawn more frequently here, in groups of 1 to 3 Structures Slime Dungeons generate under Swamps between Y=-59 and 47. There are 2 variants: Stone & Deepslate, for their respective Y levels There are 3 spawners, 1 with Slimes, and 2 with Slimy Zombies There is a treasure chest in the middle with valuable loot, including the Slime Dagger (exclusively found here!) Slime Daggers deal 6 seconds of Poison II to any mob attacked using this weapon Here is everything new you can get from Slimy Sewers. Slime Dungeons are built using Slimy Stone Bricks, Slimy Deepslate Bricks, and Slimy Deepslate Tiles. You can craft them using Slimy Stone and Slimy Deepslate! Slime Lanterns can be crafted using 1 Glowstone and 4 Hardened Slimeballs! These caves generate exclusively under Deserts This is a very dusty cave with thick yellow fog Vegetation & Foliage All stone in this cave is replaced with Limestone, Cobbled Limestone, Calcite, and Sandstone Patches of Quicksand occasionally generate Limestone Pebbles, Cobbled Limestone Pebbles, and Sand Layers can be found on the floor Sandy Roots hang from the ceiling Mob Scorpions spawn in the Limestone Caves They spawn in swarms of 2 to 4 They have 16 health (8 hearts) They inflict 10 seconds of Poison on every attack They drop Raw Scorpion items on death (or Cooked Scorpion items if died in fire or lava) Vanilla Minecraft Husks also spawn more frequently here, in hordes of 2 to 4 Food Raw Scorpion items drop from Scorpions on death Replenishes 1 hunger point (0.5 bars) Gives you Fatal Poison II for 10 seconds, Nausea III for 8 seconds, and Hunger III for 10 seconds Raw Scorpion items can be smelted in a Furnace or Smoker to make a Cooked Scorpion Replenishes 5 hunger points (2.5 bars) Raw Scorpion items can be used to brew Fatal Poison potions. Structures Limestone Dungeons generate under Deserts between Y=6 and 47. There are 4 spawners, 2 with Scorpions, and 2 with Husks There is a treasure chest in the middle with valuable loot, including diamonds, golden apples, and/or enchanted apples Limestone Ruins can be found in Limestone Caves between Y=6 and 47. All ruins have a chest, which contains useful items. There are 6 variants in total. See if you can find them all Limestone Dungeons & Limestone Ruins are built using Limestone Bricks. You can craft them using Limestone, and there are many other variants as well! These caves generate exclusively under frozen biomes Ice can be found everywhere, including dripping icicles and ice crystals Vegetation & Foliage Ice Crystals, Frosted Stone, and Frosted Deepslate replace most stone on the cave surface Crystallized Ice and Blue Ice make up the cave ceiling Pebbles can be found on the floor Icicles drip from the ceiling Mobs Penguins spawn in the Ice Caves and on the surface of frozen biomes They spawn in groups of 3 to 5 on the surface and 2 to 4 underground They have 10 health (5 hearts) They cannot be tamed but can be lured and bred using Raw Cod and Raw Salmon Vanilla Minecraft Strays also spawn more frequently here, in armies of 2 to 4 Potions Ice Crystal items can be used to brew Freezing potions, which gives you Slowness and Mining Fatigue. Structures Lost Explorer Camps generate under frozen biomes (in ice caves) between Y=-30 and 20. Lost Explorers trade your materials from the surface for things found underground Because of a Minecraft bug, Lost Explorers do not spawn along with the structure. To spawn the Lost Explorer, interact with the Suitcase when holding an Emerald. Other Blocks Packed Ice Bricks can be crafted using Packed Ice. There is also Chiseled Packed Ice with a snowflake pattern! Pebbles naturally generate here, except for Limestone variants. To craft more pebbles, simply put the respective block into a Stonecutter! These caves generate exclusively in new, giant caverns in the Nether Wastes! These caves are home to the Crooked Forest, with the new Crooked wood type Souls are present almost everywhere in this cave. Watch out for ghostly, wandering Wisps! Vegetation & Foliage Crooked Fungi and Crooked Roots generate here Giant Crooked Fungi are found everywhere Lava pits and Soul Geysers are common in this cave. Tread carefully! Mobs Wisps spawn in the Soul Caverns and in Soul Sand Valleys They spawn in groups of 2 to 3 They have 12 health (6 hearts) They shoot Souls at you, which deal a lot of damage! They drop Soul Fragments upon death, which can be used to craft the Soul Healer Soul Fragments can also be used to brew Potions of Decay, which give you the Wither effect. Food Crooked Fungus Stew can be crafted with 1 Bowl and 2 Crooked Fungi Replenishes 6 hunger points (3 bars) Gives you Fire Resistance for 20 seconds Structures Soul Castles generate in the Soul Caverns. Continue exploring, and you’ll find one eventually! There is 1 Wisp spawner There is a treasure chest filled with goodies, ranging from Soul Bricks to Diamonds, Enchanted Apples, Soul Fragments, or even the Soul Healer! Hidden underneath the lava are Broken Lava Tanks. Repair them in a Crafting Table first! Other Blocks Lava Tanks work like sponges, but for lava instead. Add either Gold Ingots or Diamonds to a Broken Lava Tank in a Crafting Table to repair them. The only source of Lava Tanks are the Soul Castles. Gold Lava Tanks remove lava from a 7x4x7 area, while Diamond Lava Tanks remove lava from a 11x6x11 area. Lava Tanks need to be cooled down after each use. Follow the in-game instructions for more details! The Soul Caverns include a new wood type: Crooked wood! Soul Stone generates in the Soul Caverns and in Soul Sand Valleys. Craft them into Soul Bricks for building! You should always back up your world once in a while when playing. Some errors may show up when generating a world. These errors do not affect gameplay in any way and can be safely ignored. To turn off the error log, go to Settings > Creator > turn off “Enable Content Log GUI”. World generation may take a bit longer when this addon is activated. This add-on may decrease performance on lower-end and weaker devices. Make sure you activated these “Experimental Settings”: – – – – mcaddon: –

78.name: ZG’s Structure Plus+ Addon
78.author: MCZackGaminG
78.description: ZG’s Structure Plus+ Addon (1.21, 1.20) enhances the Minecraft Bedrock Edition experience by adding more than 40 new structures to the game while preserving the original game’s feel. It also includes randomized loot chests for players to discover and explore. Evoker Tower | Taiga Biome Ship, & Raft | Ocean Surface Windmill, & Abandoned Ruin Dungeon | Forests, & Plain Biome Desert Pyramid, & Villager Sphinx | Desert Biome Tent, & WatchTower | Forests Biome Well | Forests, & Mesa Biome Villagers Statue | Mesa, Deep Ocean, Nether, & Jungle Biome Floating Island | Overworld Wandering Trader Wagon, & Wagon | Plain, & Forests Biome Blacksmith, & House | Plain, & Forests Biome Winter Cabin | Snowy Plain Biome Scarecrow | Taiga, Savanna, & Plain Biome Deep Sea Ruin House | Deep Ocean Palm Tree, & Oasis | Desert Biome Dead Tree | Desert, & Mesa Biome Rock | Overworld Mushroom House | Mushroom, & Swamp Biome Small Mushrooms | Mushroom Island Gravestone | Taiga Biome Skulls | Taiga, & Savanna Biome Giant Flowers, & Iron Golem Statue | Flowers Biome End Rock, & Chorus Fruit | The End Overworld Make sure you activate all the Experimental Gameplay Options. mcpack: – Zip: – mcpack: –

79.name: Building Tools Addon
79.author: Sanjo
79.description: Building Tools Addon (1.21, 1.20) adds building tools to help make buildings more productive. Tool list: Fill tool: an item with which you can fill a space with a specified block type. Fill hollow tool: an item with which you can fill the outer border of a space with a specified block type. Fill tool block selection tool: an item with which you can select the block type that is used by the other fill tools. Remove tool: an item in which you can replace a space with air. Copy tool: an item for copying a space. Cut tool: an item for cutting a space. It can be pasted multiple times, like with copy & paste for text. Paste tool: an item for pasting a copied space. Paste 180° degree rotated tool: an item for pasting a copied space rotated by 180° on the y-axis. Block retriever: an item that adds one block, of which you have used the tool, to the inventory. Roof maker: an item with which you can build roofs. Undo tool: an item that, on use, undoes the last changes made with one of the other tools. mcaddon: –

80.name: Natural Structure Redone Addon
80.author: Fallen Toast
80.description: Natural Structure Redone Addon (1.21, 1.20) enhances the atmosphere of your Minecraft world by adding subtle details like sticks and bushes scattered throughout the environment. These items are easy to spot on the ground and help locate certain materials. Unlike the original, it is compatible with version 1.19 and above and includes expanded features for each block. Biome-specific updates are also planned. This update adds desert and mesa foliage to your Minecraft World! Cactus Now there is more variety for cacti! (And a very rare secret block and structure!) The normal cacti generate in the desert and are desert exclusive! The Blue Cacti generate exclusively in the Mesa/Badlands. Dragon Fruit can drop randomly when you break the taller variants of Cacti Desert Foliage Added a multitude of plants to the arid areas! Both the Mesa and the Desert have their own specific plant sets. The plants also have varying rarities, for instance, the wildflower and the slime cacti are the rarest! Cacti Flowers Pink Cactus Flowers will spawn in 1’s while White Cactus flowers only spawn in 3’s Low Hanging Brambles Some extra dried foliage that’s fitting for arid biomes. You can now get sticks out of mangrove roots with the flint scraper Cactus can now be compressed into a Cactus Block New bone sand block that generates in the desert! Can give bones and other items… Updates to the Coarse Sifter, Can now sift sand for desert foliage if they do not spawn in your world. Has Rtx Compatability Salt Salt will now generate around the world in either stone ore form or sand ore form on the surface. You have to use a stone tool or above to get Pink Rock Salt. Create Blocks and a lamp with pink rock salt! Crush pink rock salt into powder to use on the drying table! Drying Table With Utilities come Drying Tables! Drying Tables have an upgradable item that allows the use of salt and halves the time it takes to dry items. You can dry a variety of items: Leaves Kelp Apple Rotten Flesh Meat Chunks Mortal and Pestle The author had completely redone the Mortar and Pestle! Now in order to balance the mortar and pestle you will have to use the pestle to create dyes! Craft an Andesite Mortar and a suitable pestle. Pestles will now lose durability on every use! Now Flowers will create Petals, Crush those petals inside of the mortar! Extras: You will have to create Sugar by crushing it too (Bonemeal too). Flint Scraper This is a tool that is a utility item, which is necessary for bark! Bark Can create a multitude of items, ranging from woodchips, all the way back to paper. Paper Has also been redone, You will now have to make paper pulp (the traditional way) or the (bark way) and dry it on the drying table! New Wood Fences and Branches! Created with their respective wood type, create the fence versions with 2 branches! Giving Paper more uses, the author created Paper Lanterns! The creator has added the new Coarse Sifter. Use this block to sift dirt and have access to pebbles which will enable the ability to access the flint scraper and everything necessary in finding every block. You can also find Pink Rock Salt rarely to help speed up those drying racks! General Blocks Landscape Photos Nimberry Nimberry bushes spawn in the plains and in the meadows. Each berry gives you a 3-second speed boost to help traverse the flat plains You can also make a Nimberry Bowl which will give you 10 seconds of speed and 2 and a half a bar of hunger. Stacks to 16. Ground Foliage Mushrooms are Red and Brown. Red Mushrooms are most often seen in Birch forests and in swamps. Brown Mushrooms can be most often found in Dark oak forests, mangrove swamps, and swamps, and along rivers. Leaf piles and dried leaf piles generate in their respective biomes. Bones – They spawn rarely through the entire world and sometimes at cave entrances. Branches – Currently only oak. You can strip branches to make them fit better. Bush – Dried + Snowy / Jungle Bushes drop leaves and sticks. They can also drop dried leaves if they spawn in deserts/mesas and savannahs. Bushes also can connect with each other if placed manually. There is also a jungle bush variant. Dried Bushes also can connect. They drop dried leaves. Rocks – 3 Variants + Snow Rocks can spawn everywhere, no matter the biome. They can come in snowy and different varients (Once they fix ticking) They drop pebbles which can be used to put rocks down. Sticks 4 – 4 Variants (3 Spawn Naturally) Sticks: Not much different from Natural Structures besides it working in 1.19 and that now you can stack sticks up to 4. The most common stick spawn is the 1 pile stick. 2 Stick piles: 3 Stick pile (Natural Structures one): 4 Stick pile, you have to manually place: Make sure you activated all the following Experimental Gameplay Options: mcaddon: – mcaddon: – mcaddon: –

81.name: Ores and Biomes Release Addon
81.author: FOX-YouTube
81.description: Ores and Biomes Release Addon (1.21, 1.20) enhances the game by introducing new structures, ores, and biomes. This update focuses on adding various structures that enrich the world, improve immersion, and provide new exploration and survival opportunities. It also includes changes to block textures, items, and armor, alongside bug fixes. Make sure you turn on the Experimental Gameplay. mcaddon: – mcaddon: –

82.name: Poggy’s Better on Bedrock Addon
82.author: XxPoggyisLitxX
82.description: Poggy’s Better on Bedrock Addon (1.21, 1.20) (previously known as Vanilla Plus) is a Minecraft Bedrock addon that tries to improve the overall gameplay of the base vanilla game. It aims to improve a lot of aspects by improving and adding new bosses, blocks, items, mobs, structures, biomes, and systems. In the latest update, Better on Bedrock: Nether Arise adds new creatures, bosses, and buildings to the nether. The overworld has some changes too, but the nether is the main focus. And there’s also this strange amulet the creator discovered. Created by: XxPoggyisLitxX Twitter Inside Better on Bedrock, you’ll find numerous improvements to vanilla biomes. Some of these biomes will have their own exclusive structures, mobs, and ores. Forest: Plains: Roofed Forest: Birch: Beach: Savanna: Taiga: Swamp: Jungle: Items and blocks inside of Better on Bedrock will have their own unique features to keep them fresh. Let’s start with items: Gilded Netherite Armor: Tinted Netherite Armor will save you against Piglins while keeping you protected. Using 1 Gold Armor peace to protect yourself against Piglins comes with the cons where you are losing that extra bit of protection. Tinted Netherite Armor will protect you against Piglins while being fully protected. It has the same stats as regular Netherite Armor. Obtainable via Forge Table Copper Armor: Copper Armor is stronger than Leather Armor but weaker than Iron Armor. Copper Armor is used for early combat when you go caving and a lot of mobs attack you. Lootbag: Need some quick resources? Get some Lootbags. Lootbags are found within Trader Outpost chests. To use a Lootbag, right-click (hold for mobile, LT/L2 for the controller) to use the Lootbag. Once you use a Lootbag you’ll get some sweat resources. Backpack: The inventory issue has been solved! Backpacks give you extra slots to store your goodies. Holding a BackPack and interacting (hold for mobile, LT/L2 for the controller) will open up the BackPack inventory. BackPacks can be used across all dimensions. The Regular BackPack has 9 Slots. The Medium Backpack has 24 Slots Quest Scroll: New to this amazing world? Use quests for early loot! The Quest System is a unique system within Better on Bedrock. The Quest System gives players some Quests to complete in a new world. Players will be given a Closed Quest Scroll upon loading a new world. When they interact (hold for mobile, LT/L2 for the controller) it will open up the scroll which players can interact again (hold for mobile, LT/L2 for the controller) to open the Quest UI. The Quest UI will show you 3 Tiers: New Start, Better on Bedrock, and Beyond the Overworld. Each Quest has specific goals for the player to complete. When you complete Quests you have to claim your rewards manually. Bounty Scroll: Bounty System can only be accessed by a Bounty Board The Bounty System allows players to hunt down a specific number of mobs for rewards and maybe even to progress their playthrough. It has the same use and UI as the Quest System. Overworld Waystone Key: The Overworld Waystone Key is used to save your Waystones and teleport to your Waystones When you click on a waystone (tap for mobile, LT/L2 for controller) you’ll be prompted with a UI to enter the Waystone Name. You can only add up to 10 per dimension. When you break a saved waystone you need to save it again when the block was placed. When you want to teleport to a saved waystone, right-click (tap for mobile, LT/L2 for controller) to access all saved Waystones. Click on a saved Waystone to teleport, which costs 3xp levels. Once teleported the Waystone Key will be on a 60-sec cooldown. Grapes: Grapes is a new food source found within Better on Bedrock. You can only find Grapes inside of Taiga Biomes. Grapes can be planted and grown for an infinite source of grapes. Grapes gives 4 Hunger Points and takes 1 Second to eat. Wild Carrot: The Wild Carrot is another new Food Source within Better on Bedrock. You can find Wild Carrots inside of the Plains Biome. Wild Carrots have a small chance of dropping a regular carrot. Wild Carrot gives 3 Hunger Points. Enderman Tear: The Enderman Tear is obtainable by killing an Enderman. The Enderman Tear is used to craft an Overworld Waystone Key. Forge Table: The use of the Forge Table is to forge Gold Ingots with your Netherite Armor. When you Forge your Armor, you need at least 1 Gold Ingot and 1 Netherite Armor peace to forge them together. When your Armor was enchanted, the enchants with convert over to your Forged Netherite Armor. Forged Netherite Armor will behave like Gold Armor around Piglins except you don’t have the weak protection of Golden Armor. Miner’s Bench: The use of the Miners’ Bench is to apply Vein Miner I to your pickaxes. When you want to apply the enchantment to your pickaxe, you need the Vein Miner I enchantment book and 6xp levels to enchant Overworld Waystone: The Overworld Waystone is used to save your spot! With the Overworld Waystone you can have up to 10 per dimension saved, anywhere in the world! You can travel thousands of blocks within an instant with the Overwolrd Waystone. You need an Overworld Waystone Key to Save and Teleport to save Overworld Waystones. The Overworld Waystone is crafted with 5 Iron Ingots, 1 Gold Ingot, and 1 Ender Pearl. Bounty Board: The Bounty Board is found by a unique structure called The Trader Outpost. The Bounty Board give you a Closed Bounty Scroll when you interact with the block. You can only do so ONCE per world Vein Miner: A new enchantment has seen its debut in Better on Bedrock. Vein Miner can be obtained by trading with a Goblin Trader or at the top of Battle Towers. Vein Miner includes Unbreaking 1 by default. Each ore that the Vein Miner breaks will remove 1 durability from your pickaxe. (Since you have Unbreaking it will be random.) Tree Capitator I: Another enchantment made its way to Better on Bedrock. Similar to Vein Miner, Tree Capitator will chop down trees within an instant! Your axe will take 1 durability damage per log that has been broken. Goblin Trader: This little guy has almost anything you need. You can find the cute guy anywhere in the world, but not often as he is on his own adventure gathering resources to sell you. Goblin Trader Info: 20 Health Passive The Willager: A new boss made its way in Better on Bedrock. The Willager is part of the Illager Family and he won’t be easy to get by. To find him you need to do a little adventuring. He is located at the top of a Battle Tower that is different from the others. Make sure you’re prepared because the fight won’t be easy! Willager Info: 250 Health Hostile Is Boss 4 Attacks Armor Requirements: Minimum Armor Requirements: Full Protection 4 Iron Armor Recommended Armor Requirements: Full Protection 2 Diamond Armor Drops: Willager Hat Loot Crate Trader Outpost: Found all over the overworld. Home of the Wandering Trader. Battle Tower: Found all over the Overworld. Test your combat skills with floors becoming more difficult, great rewards at the end. Waystone Tower: Home of the Overworld Waystone. Climb to the top to obtain a Waystone and some loot! Ruined Temple: Adventurer Campsite: Starter home to the lost traveler. Adventurer House: Home base of the lost traveler. Hardcore Mode Option: Upon loading up a new world you’ll be prompted with a Difficulty UI. Normal Mode is the default gamemode with infinite lives and Hardcore Mode… well it’s self-explanatory. Hardcore Hearts are enabled by default for both Modes. Waystone: Waystone Key: Backpack: Forge Table: Miners’ Bench: This addon will work with other addons. This addon won’t work with multi-player or servers. Need help or info about an item, block, structure, or mob? Check the new updated How To screen! Make sure you activated all the “Experimental Settings”. mcaddon: – mcaddon: – mcaddon: – mcaddon: – mcaddon: –

83.name: Quarry Addon
83.author: Effect99MC
83.description: Quarry Addon (1.21, 1.20) adds a quarry block that can extract ores like diamonds, iron, coal, gold, red stone, emeralds, and everything that is found, such as stone, obsidian, dirt, etc. The quarry block is placed on the ground and tapped on to show the size of the area that needs to be clear of blocks for the quarry to be built. Simply place the quarry block on the ground, tap on it and it will show you the size of the area that needs to be clear of blocks for the quarry to build. For the quarry to be built you must hit one of the four screens that will appear around that area until it turns green, if the screen remains red it means that there are blocks in the construction area. Once the quarry is built you can touch one of the four screens around the quarry to open the settings You will find four different quarry blocks: the small-packed quarry, the medium-packed quarry, the large-packed quarry, and the packed explosive quarry, each with different excavation sizes. Small Quarry: 7×7 Medium Quarry: 11×11 Large Quarry: 15×15 Quarry settings options: Destroy: Activation will destroy the quarry and return the packed quarry to you. (The drill must be retracted) Retract drill: This option will retract the drill once you have finished using the quarry. Ignore alerts: If this option is enabled the quarry will not stop if it finds indestructible blocks in the digging zone unless the blocks are directly below the drill: Max power: This option allows you to dig twice as fast in exchange for more fuel. (+3 de redstone per layer) Silk touch: This will allow you to obtain blocks such as glass, ores, chests, and many more in their original state. (+2 de redstone per layer) Quarry On/Off: It will activate and deactivate the quarry if it has fuel and there are no alerts. Redstone/Fuel: In this slider, you can add and remove redstone with a maximum storage of 999 redstone. (Above this option you can see the redstone available in your inventory) To apply all these settings you must press the save settings button. The quarry consumes one redstone per layer To retract the drill you need at least one redstone. Opening the settings of the quarry will stop it temporarily. Only one player at a time can open the settings of a quarry You can rotate the outlet tube of the items if you interact with its center. You can find the crafts on the crafting table in survival mode. You can slide down the drill pipe if you interact with it. Going up or down will depend on whether you look down or up. Water and lava won’t be a problem for the quarry but maybe it will be for you. You can find the packed quarries in the construction tab of creative mode. The explosive quarry will be available for the next update. Watch the video for the basic explanation: Make sure you turn on the Experimental Gameplay. mcaddon: – mcaddon: –

84.name: Red’s More Structures Addon
84.author: redstonegames
84.description: Red’s More Structures Addon (1.21, 1.20) adds many new structures to Minecraft, making the world a more interesting place with new places to explore. All structures contain loot, and in some you can also encounter enemies. In this first version, Red’s More Structures is still in the testing phase, since these structures can generate very close or very far from each other. Tower It will spawn in almost all biomes, containing loot and providing a good view that will help you which way to go. Beach House Will spawn on beaches and stone beaches. A small house that has a bed and loot. Creeper House Small houses abandoned by creepers. Inside you can find a barrel with loot. It can spawn in almost all biomes, and between 1 to 4 houses together. Abandoned House A big house, but destroyed. Inside you’ll find a bed, some chests, and barrels containing loot. If you like, you can renovate and live. Mini Buddha 1 Small Buddha statue that will spawn in almost all biomes. It has a chest with loot. Mini Buddha 2 Another small Buddha statue that will also spawn in almost every biome, and a chest with loot. Big Buddha A little rarer to spawn. Will spawn in almost all biomes, above a height of 80. It has 2 chests with Class A loot. Oracle of the Plain It will spawn in the plains biome and has a Class B loot barrel. Ice Oracle Will spawn in snow biomes, containing a chest with Class B loot. Flower Oracle Will spawn in Meadow, Sunflower Plain, and Blossom Forest biomes. It has a Class B loot barrel. Great Oracle A little rarer. Will spawn in almost all biomes, and contains chests with Class A loot. Dark Tower Large tower with various types of loot. However, you will be able to find Witches, Vindicators, and Pillagers in the place. Sphinx Will spawn in the desert. It has gold blocks for you to pick up. Patheon It will spawn in the Desert, and it has some barrels with C-class loot, and a chest with A-class loot. It can spawn covered by sand. Making it difficult to find the loot. Great Pyramid Will spawn in the desert. Pyramid larger than the game’s standard. Inside you should find some barrels with class C loot, tombs that when you open you can find chests with class B loot, and even a chest with class A loot. It can generate covered by sand. Making it difficult to find the loot. Jungle Pyramid Will spawn in Jungles. Pyramid larger than the game’s standard. Inside you should find some barrels with class C loot, tombs that when you open you can find chests with class B loot, and 2 chests with class A loot. Titan Sword Great Sword of Titan. It is very rare and will spawn in any biome. It can generate missing pieces. It is usually buried with the tip below 30. If the sword is whole and you dig to its tip, you can find up to 2 diamond blocks. Download the mcpack file. Double-click to install your Minecraft. Create a new world and in the addon options, find the Red’s More Structures Behavior Pack. Enable the Experimental “Creation of Custom Biomes” option. Start your world. mcpack: – mcpack: –

85.name: Forsaken Odyssey Addon
85.author: NicoTheKid
85.description: Discover and explore the world of wilderness and abandonment. Rebuild the ruins with new building blocks. Enhance your survival skills with new items. And meet the new creatures on your journey! You will see this and much more with the Forsaken Odyssey Mod. Forsaken Odyssey Addon (1.21, 1.20) is a collection of several add-ons with new mobs, blocks, items, and biomes. You will discover a completely new world for yourself. Forsaken Odyssey is a modpack that will expand your world exploration and survival experience while keeping it compatible with other mods. This modpack are the combination of NicoTheKid’s 9 add-ons plus more exclusive mobs, blocks, items, & features. Make sure that you install the both behavior and resource pack of the add-on in your world. Don’t forget to turn on all of these experimental gameplay options: Aternos server installation: You must enable all of these experimental options before entering your world: – – – – Server: – – – Server: –

86.name: Creeping Crypts: Random Dungeons Addon
86.author: ElektrikaDev
86.description: Have you ever wished for a new dungeon in your Minecraft world that resembles a Mineshaft or Stronghold? If so, you’re in luck! With Creeping Crypts: Random Dungeons Addon (1.21, 1.20), you’ll discover tower-like structures in your world that contain dungeons beneath them. These dungeons can be quite extensive, so make sure to pack an extra lunch! These dungeons are made up of several rooms. As you explore your world, you may come across structures that resemble these from time to time. If you enjoy this Addon, be sure to share it with your friends! These structures are “very rare”. They may not generate within 500-3000 blocks of you. The dungeons can get quite expansive at times, however, if you have a low-end device, your screen could potentially freeze for a few seconds while it generates. These dungeons will not cut into each other, instead, they are programmed to connect to themselves so you can avoid the eyesore of them ramming into each other nonsensically. Here is a showcase of the dungeon being generated in a flat world: Preferably you need a device that isn’t low-end. For example, we do not recommend using a Samsung A03. For iOS Installation: For Windows 10: just double-click. To use this Add-On, you must turn this experiment on. Also, note that there are TWO packs for versions 1.0.1 and higher. You must enable both for it to work. The 1.0.0 version still works as previously, but requires the “Custom Biomes” toggle to work and only works on versions below 1.20.30. Remember to delete the previous packs before installing, otherwise, the next packs will not install. mcaddon: – mcaddon: –

87.name: Fantastic Builder Wand Addon
87.author: Blayy
87.description: Fantastic Builder Wand Addon (1.21) operates seamlessly and is well-suited for survival mode. As you construct, it continuously analyzes your inventory in real-time. No experimental activation is required before using this addon in a new world. The builder wand is compatible with custom blocks: Builder Wand (mode selection): Sneak and use this item to select mode, if you don’t select mode before using, the builder wand will not work. How it works? To save the coordinate you just need to use the item in a block. This addon is based on two coordinates, the first coordinate will save the block used to build, and the second coordinate will open the confirmation UI. This addon does not require any Experimental Gameplay. mcaddon: –

88.name: bum_Crops Addon
88.author: ClouddSpiderr, Vex
88.description: bum_Crops Addon (1.21, 1.20) aims to provide more diversity and depth to your gardens. This addon introduces over 25 new crops that can be grown, harvested, and used to craft a variety of new foods, blocks, and more. Each crop has been meticulously designed with special attention to its aesthetic and utility, ensuring as much polish and vanilla parity as possible. In addition to new crops, this addon also introduces new brewing mechanics and two new mobs to your world. Some items can be found in naturally generated chests and structures, and all included content is available in both survival and creative modes. This addon works on servers and is designed to be compatible with just about everything. bum_Crops introduces 14 new crops to your worlds that can be accessed both in survival and creative modes! These crops are actual blocks and behave identically to vanilla crops; being planted with seeds, and then gradually growing over time until ready to harvest! You can also use bone meal to speed the process up. Just like vanilla crops! Each crop has been hand-crafted with special attention given to their appearances and utility; ensuring they fit with vanilla features aesthetically and mechanically. In addition to crops, this addon adds a new brewing mechanic, as well as a multitude of new craftable foods that will be sure to spice up your survival! Asparagus A delicious, healthy crop that is best served fried! Asparagus crops grow in 5 stages and are grown from Asparagus Seeds. Asparagus will ONLY grow on Sand! You can cook Asparagus in a Smoker or Furnace for Cooked Asparagus! Corn The tall, hardy corn plant; a staple of diets everywhere! Perfect for corn mazes! Corn crops grow to be two blocks tall! Growth takes longer and has 7 stages. Grown from Corn Seeds. Corn will only grow on Farmland, Dirt, or Podzol. You can cook Corn in a Smoker or Furnace for Cooked Corn! Grapes Grapes are a classic, sweet fruit grown on vines! Growth has 6 stages. Grown from Grape Seeds. Grapes will only grow on Farmland, Dirt, or Podzol. Grapes are a key ingredient in the brewing of Wine! Also can be used to craft Grape Jam! Hops Hops are an ancient crop essential in the production of beers and ales! Growth has 5 stages. Grown from Hops Seeds. Hops will only grow on Farmland or Dirt. Hops are a key ingredient in the brewing of Ale! Pepper Peppers – providing flavor and regret through the centuries! Growth has 5 stages. Grown from Pepper Seeds. Peppers will only grow on Farmland, Dirt, or Podzol. The primary ingredient for crafting Chili! Pineapple The iconic tropical fruit; delicious, healthy, and tangy! Growth has 3 stages. Grown from Pineapple Seeds. Pineapples will only grow on Farmland, Dirt, or Podzol. Can be used to craft Pineapple Jam! Red Cabbage Red Cabbage is essentially just normal cabbage, but more fabulous. Growth has 5 stages. Grown from Red Cabbage Seeds. Grapes will only grow on Farmland, or Dirt. The primary ingredient in Cabbage Stew! Rhubarb Easily one of the most delicious crops you’ve never heard of! Growth has 3 stages. Grown from Rhubarb Seeds. Rhubarb will only grow on Sand. The primary ingredient to crafting Rhubarb Pie! Shrooms Shrooms – healthy, recreational, and fascinating! Growth has 3 stages. Grown from Other Shrooms. Shrooms will only grow on Mycelium, or Podzol. Grants jump boost, slow falling, and nausea when eaten. Harvesting will sometimes also produce Yeast! Strawberry The sweet summer classic! Who doesn’t like strawberries?! Growth has 4 stages. Grown from Strawberry Seeds. Strawberries will only grow on Farmland, Dirt, or Podzol. Can be used to craft Strawberry Jam! Tomato Once thought to be poisonous; now a staple in foods from nearly every culture! Growth has 5 stages. Grown from Tomato Seeds. Tomatoes will only grow on Farmland, or Dirt. Cannot be eaten; but can be thrown! Turnip The strong and humble Turnip! Strong like Ox, comrade! Growth has 5 stages. Grown from Turnip Seeds. Turnips will only grow on Farmland, or Dirt. Can be cooked in a Smoker or Furnace to craft Cooked Turnip. Zucchini One of the most delicious vegetables there are! Second only to Squash! Growth has 5 stages. Grown from Zucchini Seeds. Zucchini will only grow from Farmland, Dirt, or Podzol. The primary ingredient to crafting Zucchini Bread! Cherries A classic, sweet berry grown on trees. Commonly seen atop Ice Cream. Grown from Cherry Trees. Cherry Saplings can be gotten from wild cherry tree leaves or the Crop Trader. … and that’s all of the crops.. so far! There’s also a whole slew of recipes you can craft using the crops, with more to come! All recipes can be found in the recipe book! All items are obtainable in survival. While some stuff can be crafted or found in the overworld, most seeds and items can be purchased from our custom Crop Trader; The Aimless Horticulturist. The Aimless Horticulturist She’s a wonderful, friendly trader who sells and buys seeds and crops! She only carries five items at a time so be sure to check up with her stock whenever you see her! She can spawn anywhere that animals can spawn and is fairly common! There are also a few structures that will generate naturally in your world. One is a small farm shack with a few of the custom crops planted outside of it. The other is just the Cherry Trees. Learn to master the brew With version newest version of this addon, the Brewing Update arrived in bum_Crops! This update brings a brand new, complex brewing mechanic that allows players to brew various types Ale, Mead, and Wine. There are currently 27 different possible brews; each with its own ingredients and effects! The process of brewing is slightly complicated and requires a few precursor ingredients, depending on what type of brew you’re trying to make. Here is a brief explanation of the process below: First of all, no matter what we’re brewing, we need to start with some water and sugar to prepare the yeast for fermentation. At a Crafting Table, use bottled water and sugar to craft Sugar Water. Once you have the Sugar Water, we’re going to move to a Brewing Stand. Put the Sugar Water into the bottom slots and for the reagent, we’re going to put Yeast. By mixing Yeast and Sugar Water, we’re priming the yeast for fermentation and producing Activated Yeast. If you don’t have any Yeast, it can be sometimes found as a byproduct when harvesting shrooms. Alternatively, you can produce Yeast with bottled water and wheat at a Brewing Stand. Now, depending on if you want to make Ale, Mead, or Wine; this next step will be different. You will want to keep your Activated Yeast in the bottom slot of the Brewing Stand, and for brewing Ale you will put in Hops as the reagent. For Wine, replace Hops with Grapes, and for Mead, use Honeycomb. This will produce a base for your final brew. With Ale, you get a Wort Base. Now that you have your Wort Base (or fermented grapes/fermented honey) you will need a Keg block. If you do not have one, you can craft a Keg with a Barrel at a Crafting Table. Once you have your Keg placed, interact with it and you will see a bunch of recipe options in your recipe book for producing “Ale”. Each recipe will produce a unique blend with unique effects. To get the most out of your brews, you’ll want to keep track of what batch is what and what effects different ingredients produce! Learn to master the brew Works great on servers and is perfect for economy roleplay! Figure out a good recipe. Brand it and sell it to other players. STONKS! Before you know it, you’ll have competing breweries on your server! *The development team has plans to expand and add even more brew types and recipes in the future so please share your opinions and ideas! *They may add a way to customize brew bottles using dye, to further customize and distinguish your batches and brands! The following is the only required experimental toggle! mcaddon: Zip: mcaddon: – Zip: – mcaddon: –

89.name: DarkAge Bizarre Addon
89.author: Petergamer XD
89.description: DarkAge Bizarre Addon (1.21) is a highly anticipated addon that has been thrillingly revamped! Prepare yourself for tougher nights, formidable bosses, loot-filled structures, superpowered items, and helpful mobs to aid you on your journey. Dive into all these exciting features and more in the addon showcased below. Mobs & Bosses: Structures: Make sure you turn on the Experimental Gameplay. mcaddon: –

90.name: Craftable Structures Addon
90.author: KekeCreations
90.description: Craftable Structures Addon (1.21, 1.20) lets you create and explore structures in Minecraft like never before. Whether you want to build them in survival mode, use them for your renders, design maps with them, or find them easily in the world, this addon has it all. Don’t miss this opportunity to enhance your Minecraft experience with structures. Temple Temple  [3d item] Spawns a temple with randomized loot The Temple doesn’t destroy the landscape The Temple also has a TNT trap How To Craft The Temple : Requires 2 planks, 3 sand, 1 chest, 3 TNT Ruined Portal Ruined Portal [3d item] Spawns a ruined portal Ruined Portal Doesn’t Destroy Landscape Ruined Portal also has randomized loot How to Craft the Ruined Portal : Requires 8 obsidian and 1 chest Pillager Outpost Pillager Outpost [3d item] Spawns a pillager outpost Pillager outpost doesn’t destroy the landscape Pillager Outpost has randomized loot Pillager Outpost also comes with a pillager captain How to craft pillager outpost : Requires 7 Planks, 1 Chest, 1 Bow End City Boat End City Boat [3d Item] Spawns an End City Boat Structure Spawning End City Boat doesn’t destroy landscape! End City Boat Structure has a Randomized Loot! Also Comes With An Elytra and 2 instant health potions! How to craft End City Boat : Requires 7 Endstone, 1 Ender Pearl, and 1 Chorus Fruit Ancient City Ancient City [3D Item] Spawns the middle of the Ancient City structure.
