Spawning the Ancient City doesn’t destroy the landscape! How to craft : Requires 8 Cobbled Deepslate and 1 Sculk Catalyst To Craft. This addon doesn’t use player.json Make sure you activated the Experimental Gameplay. mcaddon: – mcaddon: –

91.name: Kittys Builds: 375 Structures Addon
91.author: Kitty Shizz
91.description: Kittys Builds: 375 Structures Addon (1.21, 1.20) lets you spawn over 300 pre-built structures instantly for MCPE/Bedrock! Whether you’re too lazy to build a home, castle, or spawn, this pack has you covered. 16 different spawn points 16 unique home designs 16 decorative statues 16 epic arenas Best of all, there’s no need for a player.json file, and it works seamlessly even in survival mode! Spawn builds out of Kitty Mobile! You can get Kittys Mobile in Creative or you can make Kittys Mobile in any crafting table! Survival requirements: 4x Oak Planks 1x Iron Ingot 1x Gold Ingot Crafting Table Layout: Spawn Any Builds You Like From the Menu: Pack Includes 80 Builds: Make sure you turn on the Experimental Gameplay. mcaddon: – mcaddon:

92.name: Kraftoid’s Modern Furniture Addon
92.author: Kraftoid
92.description: There is an abundance of modern furniture available, including sofas, tables, and decorations, as well as expert-level gaming setups with monitors and headsets with Kraftoid’s Modern Furniture Addon (1.19). The selection is constantly updated with new items. It’s craft-able with an easy and accessible recipe plus new experimental Custom Blocks! It’s not only for Creative but also for Survival mode too! This furniture pack contains more than 40 pieces of furniture, and will be added and updated regularly! Craftable for survival & custom blocks. List of Furniture: Bathtub Bench Cabinet Camera Chair Counter Gaming desktop Plants (including mini-sized plants and tall plants) Fridges (with inventory) Gaming chair Laptop Light panels Microphones Mini Sofa  – comes with 16 Minecraft colors Monitors (including widescreen and vertical monitors) Oven Modern 3D paintings Modern Bed Shelves (including a high shelf and a wall shelf) Shower Sink Sofa (seats for five players) – comes with 16 Minecraft colors Stool Telescope Television Toilet Wall Clock Computer accessories (including headsets and keyboard & mouse) Tables (including center tables, big and mini tables) Lamps (including modern table lamps, reading lamps, and a full lamp) Console with VR headset Table Download both the behavior and resource pack from the given links above. To install, simply click & open the downloaded files. Make sure to activate the pack before joining any world. Activating the resource pack will activate behavior pack as well (if both are present in the game). Open any world. – –

93.name: Elingo’s Mini Blocks Addon
93.author: Captain_Elingo
93.description: Elingo’s Mini Blocks Addon (1.19) adds 260+ Mini Blocks in Minecraft making it possible to enhance the level of detail in your builds. With this addon, you have access to a diverse range of useful Mini Blocks to bring life to your worlds. Features: Here is a Brick wall that uses Mini Bricks to look more destroyed. You can place the mini cobblestone block on the cobblestone walls, to make it look more detailed. Here are the Mini TNT blocks. They are only for decoration and will not explode. Mini Melon Mini Target Block Mini Hay Block Mini Cactus Mini Block Crafter Recipe You can turn the normal blocks into Mini versions of them by placing them in the Mini Block Crafter. The special Mini Blocks can be obtained in the stonecutter with one iron ingot. 1.17 Mini Blocks You can get all Mini Blocks in the creative menu Make sure you activate all the Experimental Gameplay Options. – –

94.name: Super Mario Blocks Addon
94.author: DouguinYT
94.description: Super Mario Blocks Addon (1.19) adds Mario grass block, Mario dirt block, P switch block, Top mushroom block, Pipe, Mario Vines, etc from the Super Mario game into Minecraft. This is only the first version so only a few blocks were added and it will be improved in the following updates. Mario Grass Block: it’s a block of grass in the style of super mario world Mario dirt block: Just a block of dirt in the style of super Mario world P swit block: This block is interactive, when you jump on it it is pressed and it turns into a closed P block P swit block: When you press the P button it will transform into this block Mario stone block: It’s a stone block in the style of super mario world Pow block: If you know super Mario world you know what a pow block is, basically it’s dynamite, but this function will arrive in the next updates Top mushroom block: Can be placed above mushroom block: Spike Block: This block is interactive when you step on it will take approximately 3 hearts to damage Empty block: This block is a decorative block inspired by Super Mario world Donkey kong bar block: This is Donkey Kong Iron Bar, inspired by a classic 80s game Pipe: This structure is made up of 8 blocks: cano 1,cano2,cano3,cano4,cano4,cano6,cano7 e cano8 Mario vines: In this block, the author just changed the texture of twisted vines and weeping vines All blocks: Make sure you activated all the Experimental Gameplay Options. mcaddon: –

95.name: Vine Covered Fences Addon
95.author: JayCubTruth
95.description: Vine Covered Fences Addon (1.20, 1.19) allows you to craft vine-covered fences! A simple vine and fence on a crafting table will do the trick. They come in every wood type. Mobs can not cross them, but players can. With this addon, players are able to craft vine-covered fences! A simple vine and fence on a crafting table will do the trick. They come in every wood type. Mobs cannot cross them, but players can. Perfect for so many aesthetics including overgrown, vineyards, fairy forests, the list goes on and on! The game can always use more plant options for sure. V = Vine F=Fence Fence Types: Oak Spruce Birch Dark Oak Acacia Jungle Mangrove Warped Crimson Make sure you activated these “Experimental Gameplay”. mcaddon: – mcaddon: –

96.name: Rustic Agriculture Addon
96.author: ITz_DaKs
96.description: Rustic Agriculture Addon (1.20, 1.19) is a Minecraft Java mod that is now in the process of adapting to Minecraft Bedrock. That is, it is a package that contains what you need to be able to use the items in an improved way; among them are those of agriculture, decoration, and alchemy. All content is in a medieval theme. For now, it is in the beta phase, therefore this addon may change. Wildberry Almanac Ironberry Wooden Stake Fertile Soil Rope Knot Chili Pepper Tomato Grapes Olives Tallow Beeswax Apiculture Apiary With this apiary you can get honeycomb through bees, unfortunately, it is not the same as java so you will only get 4 honey for 1 bee Beehive This beehive does not work like the vanilla one, you will find it in trees around the world and if you break them you will get bees (item), honeycomb, and the possibility of a vanilla bee coming out. Cabinet Ironwood Door Olive Door Fences And Fence Gates Tables You can connect tables now. Pot Lanterns Candles Chains Chandelier Gargoyle Painted Planks Clay Wall Stones Slate Pillar Andesite Diorite Granite Stone Wood Tables Liquid Barrel Chairs Iron lattice Wooden Lantern Drying Basin Crushing Tub Brewing barrel Turn on these Experiments to run this addon. UI Pack: – – UI Pack (Optional): –

97.name: Rustic Decorations Addon
97.author: Salas
97.description: Rustic Decorations Addon (1.20) is a spin-off of Rustic Agriculture. Many players have expressed interest in having the decoration section as a separate entity. This allows for more customization options to be added to each section. For instance, this version includes two additional variants of tables and one more variant of chairs. Users can now choose their favorite part of the addon. Moreover, this addon addresses a significant issue that arose with version 1.20.40 on mobile devices. Rustic Agriculture is incompatible with these devices. Rustic Decorations has already been tested on a mobile device and works flawlessly. Cabinet This new block is an alternative to the vanilla chest. You can put it in all directions. It can only be opened from the front and you can put another one on top to form a double cabinet! The regular cabinet has the same space as a chest and the double cabinet has the same space as a double chest. Pot For now, it is only decorative All terracotta variants Lanterns A new light source that comes in 2 variants: Iron (Vanilla) Gold (Vanilla) Candles The new light source comes in 2 variants: Iron (Vanilla) Gold (Vanilla) Chains The copper chains have the same properties as the copper, you can use an axe to deoxidize and become to wax Chandelier New decorative block that comes in 3 variants: Iron (Vanilla) Gold (Vanilla) Gargoyle Just a decorative block Painted Planks New colorful planks to decorate your world Clay Wall If you sneak and place Clay Wall Diag it will change its orientation Plank Tables 12 new tables with 10 vanilla woods Log Tables 12 new tables with 10 vanilla woods Stripped Tables 12 new tables with 10 vanilla woods Barrel This barrel is just decorative, if at some point a component to store things in blocks comes out, this barrel will have that function. Wooden Lanterns A variant lantern can be put on the floor, walls, and roofs. Plank Chairs These chairs are functional and are in all types of wood Log Chairs These chairs are functional and are in all types of wood. Iron Lattice The iron lattice is a decorative block. It will connect to adjacent lattice blocks and solid blocks. Using leaves on a lattice block will give the lattice a leafy cover. Make sure you turn on the Experimental Gameplay. – –

98.name: Walkways Addon
98.author: Gravel Studios
98.description: Are you tired of using slabs or pathblocks to create walkways in your world? Do you find them too dull or unattractive? This addon is here to help! Walkways Addon (1.20) provides 25 wooden walkways that can be connected to each other with ease. Simply place them in your world and they will automatically connect on all four sides, allowing for endless creativity in how you use them. You can even turn the walkways into platforms to connect them together. Say goodbye to stepping on grass and hello to a more polished look for your world! All walkway types automatically connect to each other no matter the type. The walkways are made using slabs made of their respective materials. Oak Planks Walkway Acacia Planks Walkway Crimson Planks Walkway Dark Oak Planks Walkway Jungle Planks Walkway Spruce Planks Walkway Warped Planks Walkway Birch Planks Walkway Cobblestone Walkway Stone Walkway Granite Walkway Andesite Walkway Diorite Walkway Brick Walkway Mossy Cobblestone Blackstone Walkway Sandstone Walkway Red Sandstone Stonebrick Walkway Mossy Stonebrick Walkway Cracked Stonebrick Walkway (Made with regular block btw) Smooth Stone Walkway Polished Blackstone Walkway Polished Blackstone Bricks Walkway Make sure you activate all experimental features except the “Next Major Update” toggle. mcaddon: –

99.name: Blockz+ Addon
99.author: JayCubTruth
99.description: Tired of only having blocks, stairs, and slabs? ​Blockz+ Addon (1.20, 1.19) (Blockz Plus) gives you 25 brand-new shapes that can be crafted in almost every material and rotated to face any direction! It also features vertical slabs, concrete stairs/slabs, vertical carpets, and diagonal iron bars! 25 Shapes 139 Materials Use Any Resource / Texture Pack New “Wrench” to Easily Rotate Blocks RTX Compatible Smaller File Size 1. Place a block into a stonecutter to obtain the Blockz+ shapes. 2. To craft the Blockz+ Wrench, place three iron ingots into a crafting table. 3. To rotate a shape, simply right-click while holding a wrench. You can hold it in either hand. Keep right-clicking until it is facing the direction that you want. 4. Alternatively if you do not want to use the wrench, you can right-click with an empty hand while crouching. In addition to the shapes below, it also features a vertical carpet, called “Tapestry”, as well as diagonal iron bars. Round Corner Slant Curve Bit 1/4 1/2 3/4 Arch Y Triangle Studs Right L Left L Point Pillar Angle Rod Sheet Curve Corner Curve Bend Round Corner Round Bend Angle Corner Angle Bend Warped Stem Crimson Stem Oak Planks Birch Planks Spruce Planks Jungle Planks Acacia Planks Dark Oak Planks Mangrove Planks Warped Planks Crimson Planks Oak Wood Birch Wood Spruce Wood Jungle Wood Acacia Wood Dark Oak Wood Mangrove Wood Nether Wart Warped Wart Oak Leaves Birch Leaves Spruce Leaves Jungle Leaves Acacia Leaves Flowered Azalea Leaves Dark Oak Leaves Mangrove Leaves Red Concrete Orange Concrete Yellow Concrete Lime Concrete​​ Sea Lantern Sculk Prismarine Bricks Prismarine Polished Blackstone Brick End Stone Cobblestone​ Mossy Stone Brick​ Dark Prismarine Bricks Amethyst Green Concrete Cyan Concrete Light Blue Concrete Blue Concrete Purple Concrete Magenta Concrete Pink Concrete Brown Concrete Black Concrete Gray Concrete Light Gray Concrete White Concrete Red Wool Orange Wool Yellow Wool Lime Wool Green Wool Cyan Wool Light Blue Wool Blue Wool Purple Wool Magenta Wool Pink Wool Brown Wool Black Wool Gray Wool Light Gray Wool White Wool Glass Red Stained Glass Orange Stained Glass Yellow Stained Glass​​ Stone Brick Stone Mossy Cobblestone Polished Granite Polished Andesite Polished Diorite​ Ice Dirt Deepslate Tile Lime Stained Glass Green Stained Glass Cyan Stained Glass Light Blue Stained Glass Blue Stained Glass Purple Stained Glass Magenta Stained Glass Pink Stained Glass Brown Stained Glass Black Stained Glass Gray Stained Glass Light Gray Stained Glass White Stained Glass Moss Glowstone Cut Copper Oxidized Cut Copper Weathered Cut Copper Exposed Cut Copper Quartz Smooth Quartz Nether Brick Deepslate Brick Smooth Red Sandstone Smooth Sandstone Cobbled Deepslate Shroomlight Blackstone Mud Brick Smooth Stone Verdant Froglight Ochre Froglight Pearlescent Froglight​ Granite Andesite Diorite Red Nether Brick Purpur​ Honeycomb​ Plus three additional secret materials Diamond Block Netherite Block Emerald Block Gold Block Redstone Block Lapis Lazuli Block Iron Block Coal Block Red Mushroom Block Brown Mushroom Block Double-click the “Blockz Plus Addon” file and it should automatically open and import to Minecraft. You must make sure that “Holiday Creator Features” are turned on or it will not work! You can find the holiday creator features settings in the “game” section of your world if you scroll down. Once that’s done you are ready to go! mcaddon: – mcaddon: –

100.name: Diagonal Walls and Fences Addon
100.author: Amon28, Dewdimpple
100.description: Diagonal Walls and Fences Addon (1.20) introduces a new type of fences and walls to your Minecraft world. Unlike the vanilla fences and walls, these ones are diagonal in shape. They are crafted using the same amount of ingredients as their vanilla counterparts but with a modified recipe. The custom diagonal fences connect to each other like regular fences, but diagonally. Example of a fence recipe: Diagonal Oak Fence Example of a wall recipe: Diagonal Stonebrick Wall You can also find the fences in the creative inventory in the Fences and Walls. Comparison: Players can jump up these fences but mobs can’t. Make sure you turn on the Experimental Gameplay. mcaddon: –

101.name: Minecraft 1.21 Concept Addon
101.author: Flappyguy
101.description: Are you a fan of the latest Minecraft 1.21 update? If so, you might be interested in this concept addon. Minecraft 1.21 Concept Addon (1.20) adds the new Minecraft 1.21 blocks to MCPE/Bedrock early. This addon adds 14 new things that you can find in the new update, and these are the Copper Bulbs, Copper Grates, Copper Doors/Trapdoors, The Crafter, and the new variation of Tuff Blocks! How to get it? You can only get these blocks through commands for now. Just type (/function newupdate) to get all the new blocks quickly! mcaddon: –

102.name: SmokeyStack’s Better Bedrock Addon
102.author: SmokeyStack
102.description: SmokeyStack’s Better Bedrock Addon (1.20) is a Minecraft Bedrock enhancement project that draws inspiration from various mods and modpacks. This mod aims to enrich the gaming experience by introducing new features, refining vanilla features, and more. Honey Blocks SmokeyStack’s Better Bedrock adds a new set of honey-related blocks! Honeycomb Bricks Honeycomb Tiles Solidified Honey Smooth Honeycomb Along with slab variants of the above Aquatic Update SmokeyStack’s Better Bedrock adds new set of blocks related to underwater! Searocket Beachgrass New Family of Scute Blocks Scute Armour Miscellaneous Scented Candles Mini Blocks Mobs SmokeyStack’s Better Bedrock adds new mobs and tweaks vanilla ones! Make sure you turn on the Experimental Gameplay. mcaddon: –

103.name: Better Vanilla Addon
103.author: GoodFlay
103.description: As beautiful as the world of Minecraft is, it can become repetitive and tedious over time. While developers update some biomes, many are left untouched. That’s where the Better Vanilla addon comes in. Better Vanilla Addon (1.19) focuses on updating specific biomes to make the Minecraft world even more stunning. One of the biomes that the Better Vanilla add-on enhances is the Dunes biome, composed of arid sand. Unfortunately, due to a Minecraft bug, creating entirely new biomes is impossible. Instead, existing biomes are replaced. In this case, the Dunes biome replaces the desert biome. This addon is a Bedrock port of Environmental Mod for Java Edition by TeamAbnormals. Arid sand: It makes up the dune biome Red arid sand. Spawns at the bottom of rivers and seas are generated in the dune biome: Arid sandstone, red arid sandstone. Made from 4 blocks of sand: Arid sandstone bricks and red arid sandstone bricks: Cut arid sandstone and cut red arid sandstone: Chiseled arid sandstone and chiseled red arid sandstone: Yucca flower: New blocks from terracotta – terracotta bricks; new block – chiseled bricks. This addon is compatible with other addons for mobs and structures in the desert. Make sure you activated the Experimental Gameplay. mcaddon: –

104.name: Spectrite Addon
104.author: JaarXD
104.description: Spectrite Addon (1.19) adds new fresh ore, as well as vibrantly colored tools that will present a challenge to acquire in survival mode. Additionally, two new types of armor, blocks, and weapons with unique abilities are included among other features. All of these items can be obtained in survival mode. This addon adds four variants of the Specrite ore saying, which will appear in different dimensions of the game. This mineral may appear in layers 26-0, with a rarity equal to diamond This mineral may appear in layers 0 to the lowest, with a rarity equal to diamond. Ore that appears anywhere in the nether, but is very rare to find. This mineral abounds in the End, it will be found scattered everywhere with a fairly low iteration. This item is what you get when you chop one of these Spectrite ores. To get the gem, you will have to cook the raw Specrite: Weapons and tools These are diamond tools and conjoined spectrite, it could be said that it is an alloy. These tools are twice as powerful as diamond tools. Elaboration: First, we need the Diamond wand to make these objects. Diamond Spectrite Sword Diamond Spectrite Pickaxe Diamond Spectrite axe Diamond Spectrite Shovel These tools may be necessary if you don’t have a lot of Spectrite material. It’s a pretty decent option. These are the most important and useful tools of the addon. For obvious reasons, they are more expensive to perform. They are twice as strong and slightly stronger than Diamond tools. And they have unique abilities. Elaboration: For this preparation, we need the pure Specrite rod. Spectrite Sword Damage: 12 Ability: Features a sweep that reaches multiple entities in a row Spectrite Pickaxe Ability: With this pick, you can mine 3×3 blocks for more efficient mining Spectrite axe Ability: With this axe, you can cut down a complete tree just by removing the lower trunk. Spectrite Shovel (No skill at the moment) Super Spectrite Sword Damage: 16 Hability: This sword works like Spectrite’s pure sword, but has the ability to summon lightning for each hit on an entity. Spectrite Armor This is the main armor of the add-on, which will have double the durability and protection of a Diamond armor. Also adds a resistance effect. Similar to vanilla armor. Spectrite blocks These blocks are for decoration only. You can make them on a crafting table. Spectrite Glass Identification of special objects. The special items have very colorful characters: Steel tools Tools double the resistance of iron tools and one more point of damage: Elaboration: First, we need their respective ingot. In this way, this and the other remaining tools of the ingot are made Steel armor Each piece of this armor has two more points of protection than iron pieces and twice the durability of iron armor. Elaboration: This armor and the other remaining pieces are made in this way. Rose Gold This mineral is added as another extra to the addon. Elaboration: Rose blocks Thanks to this mineral you will have new decoration blocks for your decorations. Make sure you activated the Experimental Gameplay. – –

105.name: New Year’s Decorations Addon
105.author: Agaast
105.description: The New Year is almost here, and it’s time to start decorating! Add some magic to your home with these New Year’s decorations. New Year’s Decorations Addon (1.20) includes 17 new blocks that can be used to enhance the look of your home, both inside and out. The best part? You can make all of these decorations in survival mode! The addon features a variety of decorations, including decorative socks, animated garlands, snowmen, gifts, Christmas trees, and a New Year’s wreath. While most of these blocks can be crafted, some decorations require you to rename an armor stand. mcaddon: –

106.name: Freddycraft Legacy Addon
106.author: Xenodev
106.description: Are you a fan of Five Nights at Freddy’s? If so, we have something in common! Freddycraft Legacy Addon (1.20) is an MCPE/Bedrock mod that adds many statues of Five Nights at Freddy’s (FNAF) animatronics to Minecraft. Currently, all animatronics in the addon are statues, and they will remain so for the foreseeable future. If you’re interested in exploring more addons that combine FNAF and Minecraft, you might want to check out the following addons: ArathNido’s FNAF Addon Five Nights At Freddy’s Addon FNAF Multiverse Addon FNAF’s Decorations Addon mcaddon: –

107.name: More Slabs Addon
107.author: StylaxGaming35
107.description: More Slabs Addon (1.20) introduces over 40 new slab types to MCPE/Bedrock, expanding your creative possibilities. Created by StylaxGaming35, this add-on includes slabs made from various materials such as sand, dirt, gravel, and all wool colors, allowing for more diverse and intricate designs. Some of the slabs you can expect to find include Diamond Block Slab, End Stone Slab, Lime Glass Slab, Glass Slab, Honey Block Slab, Slime Slab, Blue Wool Slab, Redstone Block Slab, and Orange Wool Slab, among others. The Slime Slab even retains the bouncy properties of a full slime block, adding a fun element to your builds. Some Images Of The Slabs: Diamond Block Slab End Stone Slab Lime Glass Slab Glass Slab Honey Block Slab Slime Slab Blue Wool Slab Redstone Block Slab Orange Wool Slab Make sure you activated the Experimental Gameplay. – –

108.name: Charm BE Addon
108.author: ZhyuRo - Kun
108.description: Charm BE Addon (1.20, 1.19) introduces a wealth of new features to the Minecraft Bedrock Edition, aimed at enhancing the game’s depth and providing more diverse gameplay opportunities. Inspired by the popular Quark Mod for Java Edition , Charm BE brings an array of enhancements to the game that blends seamlessly with Minecraft’s original content. This add-on introduces a host of additions spanning from new types of blocks, to various functional items, to diverse entities. For builders, the extended range of blocks and materials provides more possibilities for construction and decoration. Adventurers will enjoy exploring new biomes, encountering unique creatures, and discovering intriguing artifacts. The add-on also introduces a variety of changes that are aimed at improving the quality of life, including various tweaks to the game’s UI and mechanics. Their extra behaviors besides compact blocks… Gunpowder Block Highly Flammable & Dissolves into the air upon contact with water Sugar Block Dissolves into the air upon contact with water Rotten Flesh Block Converts Any Soil on top of it into Podzol & Converts the block itself into Dirt if placed beside water Maybe you need those blocks (?) Ender Pearl Block If Fed to Silverfish, it’ll be Transformed into Endermite Guarantee is better than chances… Cut Iron & Smooth Glowstone Because there’s Cut Copper & Smooth on eyes… Coral Sea Lanterns More colors to choose from! Cave Spider has a chance to drop Cobweb & Able to spawn in Deepslate Level Husk has a chance to drop Sand & Able to spawn Underground [Under the desert] Stray has a chance to drop Blue Ice & Able to spawn Underground [Under snowy biomes] Vindicators can spawn in Roofed Forest Chicken can be Sheared for feather, it has a cooldown for the next shearing No Friendly Fire to Tamed Animals Villager follows Emerald Block Tweaked Trades: Cartographer & Wandering Trader has a chance to Sell Buried Treasure/Ocean Monument/Woodland Mansion Locator Map Tool Smith is Able to Sell Lantern Butcher & Leather Workers can Buy Rotten Flesh for Emeralds respectively New Enchantments: Copper & Netherite Nugget Just more nuggets… Tools: Bat in a Bucket Interact with the item to release the bat & Gain Night Vision for a short duration to see in the dark Obtained by Catching a Bat with a Bucket Potion of Hogsbane Scare away Hoglin upon drinking this potion Available as Splash & Lingering too… Glowball Snowball but place Temporary Light Source on impact Charged Emerald Throwable emerald that Summons Lightning on impact Can be found in Dungeon Shapeless Recipe for Bread & Paper Clay, Quartz & Snow Block into an item Warped Roots = Cyan Dye & Yellow + Blue Dye = Green Dye Craftable Gilded Blackstone Raw Ore Blocks into Smelt Ore Blocks in Blast Furnace Craftable Trident 16-item Max Stack for Stews, Potions & Enchantment Books Clear Spyglass Scope Cactus Water [Purified Water Bottle if Integrated with Tough As Bedrock] Craft Dispenser with Any Condition-Bow [Reduced Durability/Enchanted] Example: [3 Nuggets x 8 Ingots] Increased Result item Amount when Recycling [3 Nuggets x 1 Ingot] & More Recyclable Items [Bucket, Cauldron, Compass, Hopper, Iron Door/Bars/Trapdoor, Minecart, Rails, Shears, Clock & even Golden Apple] Retextured Suspicious Soup Coffee Gives Strength, Speed & Haste for 15 Seconds Available as Splash & Lingering too… Flavored Cakes Cakes give potion effects when eaten… Example recipe, for the Fire Resistance one It just brewing, but with cakes instead of bottles… Poison Potion from Poisonous Potato A mundane Potion is Required & Long mundane Potion can be used to obtain Longer Poison Potion Abandoned Crate Naturally Generated in Underground Pat Pet! Spore Blossom can be Duplicated with Bone Meal Rabbit, Slime & Magma Cube are Immune to Fall Damage The villager will Always be infected when infected by Zombie Villager in Any Difficulties 8 Logs = 4 Chests Coral & Charcoal can be crafted into Dyes The cookie recipe is now Shapeless Vex that spawned by Evoker only has 1 Minute before despawn Clay is able to generate underground Andesite, Diorite & Granite generations have been Tweaked What’s the [No Ticks.json]? This version is made for performance purposes This version is for anyone who experiences performance issues while playing this addon But if you want the new enchantments to be working, stay and download the normal version… Normal: – No-Ticks.json: –

109.name: Medics Addon
109.author: mintedmedic
109.description: Medics Addon (1.20, 1.19) is a comprehensive Minecraft modification that introduces a variety of new elements, many of which are designed to enhance PvP and multiplayer experiences. This mod is not only about adding new items but also about improving the quality of life in the game. For instance, it introduces auto tree chopping, vein miner, and simplified crafting recipes. 18 Blocks 183 Items 295 Recipe Changes/Additions Dynamic light sources Vein miner for trees and ores, compatible with Forested Trees Changed Sculk Difficulty Many more minor changes are included though don’t really require much explaining to figure out. Workbench: The majority of recipes in this mod are here. Pretty much the normal crafting table but for modded items. Uncrafting Table: Used to break apart damaged or unwanted items for their resources. Splicer: Used to craft mob eggs, soul-based weapons, and a few other nature items that usually need shears/silk touch. This addon doesn’t use player.json so this should work with most mods. – –

110.name: Better Glass Addon
110.author: profeplaysminecraft
110.description: Better Glass Addon (1.19) gives you THREE amazing types of glass. You can choose bordered glass with no glare or borderless glass with a glare. And the newest update adds GLOW GLASS that shines bright! ALL are perfect for decoration. All colors of glass are included. The default glass has borders. You can change it to borderless by crafting it on the table. You can also change it back to bordered by crafting it again. To make the glow glass, just add glowstone dust to the borderless glass! Make sure you activated the Experimental Gameplay. mcaddon: –

111.name: Armor Expansion Addon
111.author: X3ro
111.description: Armor Expansion Addon (1.19) is a revamped version of the old armor expansion, with a fresh design for items, blocks, armor and skills. This addon introduces many new armors that grant unique effects when you wear the full set. In this addon, you can find precious armors that you can use. But first, we need to craft a new table from this armor. The Armor table it’s when you gonna craft this new and interesting armor. You can find this new table in the inventory (Items section). This new design from the armor table makes the block more vanilla-friendly This new table has a custom UI Well, now that we know how to make the armor table, let’s see what armor we can make: This armor’s an important piece from the craft of the other armor in the new Armor Expansion. This armor has low protection, any parts of the armor just give you one of protection for part This armor is made of coal it’s easy to obtain first than the rest of the armor (Except wood from the mechanics of the addon) Armor Features: The entire set of the armor gives you 8 armor protection When you’re moving, you can emit light around you If you sneak, you can melt raw ores, but only if you have one of xp This Armor has a special ability linked with the player Armor Features: The Lapis armor gives 11 armor protection Once you have the complete set, the effects with the armor will be linked with your xp bar, if you have the next xp, you will obtain the next effects: Level 5- Speed I Level 10- Speed II Level 15- Speed II, Jump Boost I Level 20- Speed II, Jump Boost II Level 25- Speed II, Jump boost II, Resistance I Level 30- Speed II, Jump boost II, Resistance II Level 50- Speed IV, Jump boost IV, Resistance IV Level 100- Speed IV, Jump boost IV, Resistance IV, Slow falling IV The Redstone armor it’s the shiniest armor from the addon Armor Features: The Redstone set gives 12 armor protection Once you have the Redstone set, you will have Speed II Only you can see if the armor has an enchantment when it’s in your inventory This armor glows in the dark When you’re closer to a repeater or another Redstone-like materials, you can activate it The quartz Armor it’s the only armor (at the moment) that you need nether materials from obtain Armor Features: The quartz armor gives 13 armor protection When you have equipped the entire set, you will obtain an extra heart bar The amethyst armor has a bright color that makes you attractive to other players Armor Features: The amethyst set gives 15 armor protection You obtain five extra hearts When you receive damage, the armor spread amethyst crystals that inflicts three of damage to all entities around a radius of three This armor it’s overrated by the villagers Armor Features: This armor gives 15 armor protection Once you have the armor, you will have a village hero This armor it’s different from the rest of the other armor Armor features: This armor gives 15 armor protection Once you have the armor, this will give you resistance 4 and slowness To difference from the other armor, you need to craft the turtle armor on a crafting table in the next way: This armor has special protection for the players Armor Features: This armor gives you 22 armor protection (11 armor bar) This armor gives you 12 knockback protection When you have the armor, once you sneak the armor will give you resistance 10, slowness 10, and weakness 10 Wooden Armor: If you want to craft the wooden armor, you need to make it on the crafting table Armor Prints The armor prints it’s a new item to craft the armor. This item can be crafted in the new armor table. The other armors The rest of armor needs the last-seen items to be crafted These are just the basic armors from the addon. But we have more things to see. Prismarine Armor: This armor makes you the king of the sea Armor Features: This armor gives you 17 armor protection once you have the armor, you will be able to swing really faster If you receive damage, you will apply poison to the most certain in the area Ice Armor: this freezy armor has some unique habilities Armor Features: This armor has 8 armor protection You cran create ice paths in the water You can apply slowness if you thrown snowballs The snowballs has a chance to stop mobs in their position Springtrap Armor: He always comes back Armor Features: The first time you wear the armor, this will kill you After you die, the armor gives you all its abilities You will respawn in the same place you wear the armor You will obtain two additional heart bars You will obtain the next effects: Speed IV, Strength V, and Jump Boost IV Gives 11 armor protection Once you wear the armor, you can’t unequip that You have a 75% chance to avoid the death Special Armor Recipes: Guardian Spike You can obtain the spikes killng elder guardians Spring Prints This prints allows you to create the springtrap armor You can find them in villages with armorer houses Winter Prints This prints allows you to create the ice armor You can find them in igloos and snow villages Craftable prints Once you obtain the prints, you can create copies of the prints in the armor table Make sure you activated the Experimental Gameplay. mcaddon: –

To begin with, you will need to craft the Factory Crate Block. You can craft the Factory Crate Block as shown below. 4 planks 5 cobblestone Once you have crafted the Factory Crate Block, you may place it inside the stone cutter to craft all the other types of blocks. All blocks can be broken instantly using the steel pickaxe, which can be crafted as shown below. 1 iron pickaxe 1 charcoal Make sure you activated the Experimental Gameplay. – –

113.name: Better Guns Addon
113.author: SyKoSoFi
113.description: Do you want to spice up your Minecraft world with some new weapons? Then you should try Better Guns Addon (1.18+) which adds four different firearms to the game. You can craft and use them in survival mode, and they are compatible with other addons. You can also play with your friends and have fun shooting each other like in Counter-Strike. This addon is not finished yet, and more weapons will be added in the future. But for now, you can enjoy these four new firearms and see how they change your Minecraft experience. 1. Rifle 2. Shotgun 3. Pistol 4. Semi-automatic rifle FAMAS Everything is very simple! First, the player needs to craft a special constructor of parts for weapons. The next step is to craft a forge for weapons. After you have already crafted the weapon, for use, namely for shooting, press the right mouse button. To check the remaining ammunition press shift. In order for the player to reload his weapon, you just need to hold the ammunition in off-hand, and when there are no cartridges in the weapon magazine, press shift + right-click. Make sure you activated the Experimental Gameplay Settings. mcaddon: –

114.name: BONY162 Furniture Addon
114.author: B0NY162
114.description: BONY162 Furniture Addon (1.20, 1.19) is a comprehensive furniture addon for Minecraft, offering over 190 different types of functional furniture to enhance your world. This addon, which requires version 1.19.40 or higher to function correctly, includes a wide range of items such as chairs, couches, TVs, lamps, stoves, toasters, and many more. Blocks with inventory slots: clicking on any of these blocks will allow you to access their inventory. 1. Kitchen Cabinet 2. Drawer 3. Trash cans 4. Refrigerator – Chairs/Couch: You can click on any of the chairs or couches and you will be able to sit on them – TV: You can interact with the TVs and change their channels, there are 6 different channels available – Toaster: You can interact with the toaster by holding a piece of bread in your hand, this will add toast to it, if you click on it again it will cook the toast. – Plates: Small plates can be stacked by interacting with it using another plate, You can add a cooked chicken to the big plates, clicking on it again will eat the chicken. -Lamps: Lamps can be turned on and off by clicking on them. -Boom Box: Clicking on the boom box will start playing a song, to stop the music click on it again. -Gumball Machine: You can interact with the gumball machine using a mine coin and it will drop gumballs with special effects -Books: Interacting with a book with another book will allow you to stack them up to 5 books high Survival: -To obtain any of this furniture in survival you have to find a wandering trader, they will trade all the furniture between 1-5 emeralds Creative: -You can also obtain all the furniture in the creative inventory New furniture: -Papers   -Phone   -Piggy Bank   -Wet floor sign   -Toilet Paper   -Dart Board   -Toothbrush   -Printer   -Cereal box   Arcade machine   -Cat Tower -Bench(Can change wood type by interacting with hammer)     -Blinds     -Security Camera -Tray     -Soda Cup     -Service Bell     -Lights -Tea Kettle     -Cooking Pot     -Pan     -Cutting Board -Kitchen Utensils     – Knives -Work Bench     -Exit Signs(3)     -Power Outlet     -Doorbell -Posters: There are 5 poster blocks available and the image can be switched using the hammer -Food Items/Blocks(9) All items/blocks can be eaten and placed in the small plate -Sandwich/ Hamburger/ Egg/ Hotdog/ Sausage/ Cupcake/ Pizza/ Apple/ Donuts -Chair 7   -Curtains   -Salt & Pepper -Wood Crate   -Weights -You can change the color of some of the furniture(Couches and chairs) by interacting with it using normal Minecraft dye, all sixteen colors can be used Make sure you activated the Experimental Gameplay. – –

115.name: Device Addon
115.author: Adarshgamer Live
115.description: Do you want to add some electronic devices to your Minecraft world? If so, you might want to try the Device Addon. Device Addon (1.20, 1.19) addon adds working printer, laptop, PC, chair, and more to the game. It is similar to MrCrayfish’s Furniture Mod, but for MCPE. The Device Addon allows you to interact with various devices in the game. You can print out pictures, documents, or maps using the printer. Using a laptop or PC, you can browse the web, play games, or watch videos. You can also sit on a chair and relax. Make sure you turn on the Experimental Gameplay. mcaddon: –

116.name: Chisel Addon
116.author: AUTOMATIC_MAIDEN, Rhodox, SilverWolf77
116.description: The Chisel Mod is a very popular decoration mod used frequently on the Java edition but the Bedrock Edition has not had access to it, until now. That’s right the author has figured out a way to bring chisel to bedrock edition and it uses one of the brand new blocks the stone cutter! In the Java version, a chisel was added to the game. In the case of the pocket version, a new block appears in the game – a stone cutter. The main function of Chisel Addon (1.19) is to improve the appearance of the blocks. After processing the blocks with a chisel, the blocks are suitable for decorating structures, interiors, and structures. In the future, the developers promise to add to this list and include even more blocks. All wood planks All concrete colors Stone Cobblestone Brick Diorite Andesite Granite Chisel Basalt Nether Update Basalt Limestone Marble Endstone PurPur Prismarine Glowstone (yes it still gives off the light!) Obsidian Lava Cobble Magma Blocks Coal and Charcoal Packed Ice Quartz Diamond Emerald Lapis Dirt Iron Gold Honeycomb Red and Yellow Sandstone Redstone Red and Normal NetherBrick Netherrack Terracotta (Just the basic block no colors) Factory Block Laboratory Block Paper Block Warped and Crimson Planks Glass Bookshelves Crafting table for all wood types Marble, limestone, and basalt were transferred from the PC version of the mod to the pocket version. Decorative blocks will naturally generate in the game. Limestone – underground in swamps, marble – in extreme mountains, basalt – at level 20 and below. Don’t worry about already created worlds – new blocks are obtained by crafting. Marble Limestone Basalt Lava Cobble Lava cobble is obtainable by crafting cobblestone surrounding a bucket of lava. Factory Laboratory Paper New variant blocks allow for connected textures for blocks already in Chisel. Blocks with light blue names have variants! Current blocks with Connected Texture Variants: Laboratory Factory Andesite Granite Diorite Basalt Bricks Cobblestone Stone Endstone PurPur Limestone Marble Glowstone All concrete colors To craft simply place Chisel block back in the stone-cutter and variants will pop up if it has any! Updated trim blocks now rotate depending on which block face they are placed on! Crafting is super simple as well! Simply take one of the blocks that is currently implemented and just put it in the stone cutter. All the blocks it can craft will be displayed for you to choose! Then to craft back into base material place the chiseled block back in the stone cutter! To make alternate wood-type crafting tables place a crafting table in the crafting grid beside the wood type you want it to match. Make sure the block is beside the crafting table. Will most likely make this a shapeless recipe in a later update. Chisel Addon: – Slab Expansion Pack: – (Requires Chisel Addon installed)

117.name: World’s Best Building Addon
117.author: JayCubTruth
117.description: World’s Best Building Addon (1.19) contains a whopping 7,928 new blocks in total! Among them, you will find 25 distinct shapes made of each material that can be rotated. Additionally, it introduces new elements like Concrete Stairs and Slabs, Vertical Carpet, Gold and Copper Bars, Diagonal Fences, Vine Covered Fences, Red Nether Brick Fences, Copper and Gold Chains, New Colorful Torches, Torches of Every Wood Type, New Colorful lanterns, and 144 fresh hues of wood planks and fences. In this addon, you’ll discover an impressive collection of 7,928 new blocks. Among them, you can craft 25 fresh shapes using nearly any material, and you have the freedom to rotate them in any direction using the new wrench tool. Additionally, you can enjoy 144 new shades of wood planks and colorful fences. But that’s not all: Concrete Stairs and Slabs Vertical Carpet (Called Tapestry) Gold and Copper Bars Diagonal Metal Bars Metal Bars with Vertical/Horizontal Texture Copper Bars Actually Oxidize Diagonal Fences Vine Covered Fences Red Nether Brick Fence Copper and Gold Chains Chains actually connect, similar to fences. Copper chains actually oxidize Diagonal Chains 16 New Colorful Torches Torches of Every Wood Type Torchlight level is adjustable 48 New Colorful lanterns Lanterns come in gold, copper, or iron The Lantern Light level is adjustable Adds copper nugget and red nether brick 1. Place a block into a stonecutter to obtain the shapes. 2. To craft the Wrench, place three iron ingots into a crafting table. 3. To rotate a shape, simply right-click while holding a wrench. You can hold it in either hand. Keep right-clicking until it is facing the direction that you want. 4. Alternatively if you do not want to use the wrench, you can right click with an empty hand while crouching. You obtain the new planks by surrounding any color of dye with wood in a crafting table like the image below. ​Each wood type produces a different shade of color. Some wood types are bright and some are dull! The new shapes are obtained using a stonecutter. Craft the Wrench by placing 3 iron ingots into a crafting table diagonally. ​You can rotate shapes by right-clicking them with the wrench in EITHER HAND. Alternatively, you may right-click it with an empty hand + crouch to rotate the block. You can also craft fences, fence gates, slabs, and stairs (using the vanilla recipes) 1. There are two ways to craft a colorful torch. The first way is to place a dye above a coal and stick. 2. The second way is to simply put a dye above an existing torch. This way is much less efficient. 3. You can adjust their light level anywhere between 1 to 15 by simply crouching and right clicking with an empty hand. 4. If a torch does not appear correct when placed, try using the Torch II version of that torch by simply placing the torch into a crafting slot. Torch II behaves a little bit more like fences in the sense that they will “connect” to anything near them. 1. To craft a lantern, simply surround a colorful torch with either gold nuggets, copper nuggets, or iron nuggets. 2. You can adjust the light level by right clicking while crouching with an empty hand. 3. It’s possible to make hanging lanterns. Just be sure to LOOK STRAIGHT UP when placing them. 1. To craft different wood-type torches, simply place a single wooden plank below the stick and coal in the crafting grid. ​2. You can adjust their light level anywhere between 1 to 15 by simply crouching and right clicking with an empty hand. 3. If a torch does not appear correct when placed, try using the Torch II version of that torch by simply placing the torch into a crafting slot. Torch II behave a little bit more like fences in the sense that they will “connect” to anything near them. 1. You are now able to craft copper and gold bars. 2. Placing them into a crafting slot allows you to craft the diagonal version. 3. You can also rotate the texture to be either vertical or horizontal by crouching and right clicking with an empty hand. 4. The copper bars will oxidize very quickly. To stop them from oxidizing, you must combine them with honeycomb in a crafting grid to wax them. 1. You are now able to craft chains out of iron, gold, or copper. 2. These chains will connect like fences with an additional Y dimension. They actually attach unlike vanilla chains. 3. You can also make diagonal chains by putting the chain into a crafting slot. 4. The copper chains will oxidize very fast. You can wax them by placing honeycomb above them in a crafting grid. 1. The OG Vanilla fences are now labeled “OLD” since they do not connect very well with the new fences. 2. The NEW fences will look like this: 3. You can make diagonal fences by placing a fence into a crafting slot. 4. You can also make “Vine Covered Fences” by placing vines on top of fence in a crafting grid. 5. Additionally there is now a “Red Nether Brick Fence”. To craft red nether brick combine nether brick with nether wart. Place 2 wool above one another in a crafting grid. 1. You can craft concrete stairs and slabs with a stone cutter. 2. Or you can craft them on a crafting table. Make sure you activated the Experimental Gameplay: “Holiday Creator Features”, “Upcoming Creator Features”, and “Molang Features”. Warning: This is a MASSIVE addon, and may not work on low-end devices. mcaddon: –

118.name: FurniDeco Addon
118.author: kaoeutsu
118.description: Do you love building and decorating in Minecraft? Do you wish you had more furniture options to make your creations more lively and realistic? If you answered yes, then you will love FurniDeco Addon (1.20, 1.19), a Minecraft Bedrock addon that adds 25 pieces of functional, decorative, and unique-looking furniture that fit with the vanilla style. With more than 80 variants in total, FurniDeco gives you endless options to furnish and decorate your builds! 25 Unique pieces of furniture & decorations, up to 80+ variants Fully customizable Interactive and functional It fits with the Minecraft Vanilla feel Craft-able in survival mode Uses blocks Furniture Grades To keep different kinds of furniture organized, FurniDeco divides them into Furniture Grades, each grade houses furniture of a single theme. Currently, the addon has only one grade. ➔ The Rustic Grade Rustic and country-themed furniture with a cozy vintage feel. Interactivity and Functionality One of the major goals FurniDeco aims to achieve is creating furniture that’s not only decorative but is also useful! Customization The Paint Brush lets you conveniently and instantly paint specific parts of a furniture piece. The Carpentry Table The Carpentry Table makes it super easy to obtain furniture in survival mode by just crafting it! All you have to do is pop in the materials required and voila, you’ve got yourself a neat Rustic Sofa! Make sure you turn on the Experimental Gameplay. mcaddon: –

119.name: Furniture o’ Modern Addon
119.author: XLite
119.description: Step up your Minecraft world’s interior design game with Furniture o’ Modern Addon (or XLites Modern Furniture). Furniture o’ Modern Addon (1.20, 1.19) features over 50 high-quality furniture and building blocks, this addon boasts high-resolution textures and models that are sure to enhance your survival living spaces. Whether you’re building a modern cityscape or simply want to spruce up your in-game home, XLites Modern Furniture provides the perfect collection of furniture and blocks to create the ambiance you desire. So, get ready to take your Minecraft world to the next level with XLites Modern Furniture! This addon comes with over 50+ different furniture and blocks, to play & build with! The Furniture allows you to make Furniture Crates. Furniture Crates can then be used in a stonecutter to create Furniture. All Available Furniture: Modular Sofa This Dynamic Piece of modern furniture is able to be modularly combined with other Sofa’s when placed side by side in order to be extended the sofa size and make it dynamic to fit any room! Television This Modern Television is able to be turned on and off and initially will only play static, place an antenna to the top of the TV to connect it to Station Services. The Television Pairs well with any furniture in any room Square Centre Coffe Table This Generic Wooden Piece of Furniture pairs well with most other furniture suitable for most living room designs Modern Coffee Table The Modern Coffee Table is a simple yet elegant piece of furniture that pairs well with a black-and-white styled living room Coffee Table This Regular Coffee Table can be interacted with to open the drawers Wooden Tables Coming in all the Wood-Type Variants and a generic variant this piece of dining room Furniture is able to bring any dining room build together Diningroom Chair A Versatile dining room chair that’s able to be dynamically changed via the Paintbrush which changes the color of this chair. Refrigerator This Generic Refrigerator pairs well with most if not all other Kitchen Furniture and can be interacted with to open the doors of both the fridge and freezer section Oven An Electric Oven is able to be interacted with to open the doors. This Piece of Furniture Pairs nicely with any kitchen design Kitchen Counters Coming In 4 Separate Variants: Regular Counter, Counter with Draws, Corner Counter, and the Counter with sink This piece of Furniture blends a completes a kitchen together Modern Night Stand A Modern Nightstand to place next to your bed. This Furniture Piece can add that little bit of detail to any bedroom or any room in general Toilet: A Dynamic Toilet actually able to be used and interacted with. A necessary furniture component to any bathroom Bathtub A Generic bathtub useful furniture piece for any bathroom Sink A Bathroom Sink able to be interacted with to turn on the taps Bathroom Mirror A Furniture Piece used in bathrooms Miscellaneous Furniture is furniture that may not necessarily fit a room type, they can typically be used fairly universally in all rooms Currently All The Available Block: To begin with, you will need the Furniture Table . To craft the Furniture Table , you will need the items shown below: 5 Iron Ingots 3 Wooden Slabs 1 Leather Once inside the Furniture Table, You’ll be able to make a multitude of Items. The Main Things to create Furniture are Blueprints and then Furniture Crates. Once you have made your furniture crate take it to the stone cutter to create Furniture! This addon is survival-compatible. Make sure you activate all the following Experimental Gameplay: – – – – Test Map: –

120.name: Elingo’s End Update Addon
120.author: Captain_Elingo
120.description: Elingo’s End Update Addon (1.20, 1.19) transforms the empty End dimension into a purple forest. Additionally, 4 new ores named Enderite Ore, Darkium Ore, End Diamond Ore, and End Iron Ore are introduced in the End dimension. These ores can be utilized to create armor and tools that are more durable and robust than netherite. Let’s begin, to get started you’ll need at least a diamond pickaxe to mine the Enderite ore. When mined, the Enderite ore will drop raw Enderite, which has to be smelted to get one Enderite ingot. You can also find Diamond ore and Iron ore. The End berry bushes spawn randomly around the place and can only be farmed using Enderite shears. End Fruits can be found hanging from End Trees, here are the different stages. Here are some of the structures added for now: End Well End Ruin End House You can also get stripped end logs by right-clicking the logs with any axes. Crying End Tree End Tear Can only be obtained by Crying end leaves End Fruit Soup Cracked End Bricks Polished End Stone Polished End Stone Slabs Polished End Stone Stairs Mossy End Bricks Mossy End Brick Slab Mossy End Brick Stairs End Planks End Wood Slabs End Wood Stairs End Door End Trapdoor You can also create farms and paths on the end grass block. Enderite Shears All new ores in this addon: Enderite Ore Darkium Ore End Diamond Ore End Iron Ore Make sure you activated all the following Experimental Gameplay Options: – – – –

121.name: Bedrock Barricades Pack Addon
121.author: TheVeis
121.description: Many people, while building abandoned houses or other structures, used ordinary signs, it looked normal, but not pretty enough. Today you will be able to decorate your buildings in abundance, with Bedrock Barricades Pack Addon (1.19), they will look much better. If you are one of those who have been looking for such a modification for a long time, then you have found it! In this mod, there are not many blocks yet, but they are still enough to create something beautiful. Wooden crates (8 types) Wooden spikes (8 types) Short boards for doors or windows Long boards, for windows or doors Iron barricade Barbed wire (cobweb, will be renamed later) Iron barrels (2 colors) Concrete barricade Obstacles Green and Yellow Barrels Road Bars (barricade) Workbench and Crafts To craft blocks, you need to place the blueprint in the workbench slot Workbench: Blueprints: You can craft Blueprints only in the new Workbench. Items can be placed in any slot. Make sure you activated the “Experimental Features”. – – Model Fixer: –

122.name: Expanded Fences Addon
122.author: SilverWolf77
122.description: If you want more options for your fences, you might like Expanded Fences Addon (1.19) that adds two new fence variants for each wood type. You can now have fences with log or stripped log posts that match the texture of the wood. This addon is simple and vanilla friendly, and it works well with any texture pack that changes the wood textures. These new fence posts connect to many of the vanilla blocks you would expect as well as vanilla fence blocks and gates. An added perk to these fences is unlike vanilla fences, they are one block tall and are able to be jumped over by the player. Mixing and matching is 100% possible between the fences and can be used to create some pretty cool-looking animal pens. The log textures also open the possibility to create some pretty cool natural builds as well. All the crafting recipes for the fences are found within the crafting table in the game just like any other block. They follow the same recipe structure as vanilla fences just replacing the planks with either log or stripped log. Make sure you activated the Experimental Gameplay. mcaddon: –

123.name: Colorful Blocks Addon
123.author: EndXenoc MCPE
123.description: Colorful Blocks Addon (1.20, 1.19) adds many blocks with the 16 colors of the game, the blocks can be obtained in creative mode and survival mode. This addon improves all boards: now you can paint the boards in the desired shades, and now you can paint the boards in the desired shades. This table is used to create all the blocks that this addon adds. To get this block in survival you need dyes and wood. All these blocks can be tinted. Stairs have all corner states. If you touch a block on the side, the state of the inverted stairs is placed Slabs can now be turned into a whole block by tapping up or down. Vertical slabs can now be turned into a full block by tapping on the sides. Fence gates change state when walls are near them. Make sure you activated “Holiday Creator Features” and “Molang Features”. – – – – 3D Doors: –

124.name: Modern Blocks Addon
124.author: Vechrozilator
124.description: Transform your world into a modern wonderland by constructing and designing contemporary structures such as houses, buildings, offices, bedrooms, kitchens, wardrobes, and more with the use of these innovative decorative modern blocks. Craft exquisite modern furniture with various styles, incorporate unique tile patterns with numerous variations, and pave your roads to perfection with all the necessary tools and resources! Modern Blocks Addon (1.20, 1.19) introduces over 1000 modern blocks to the game, including modern bookshelves, cabinets, drawers, tiles, and 3D block furniture. The majority of the blocks have 16 different colors, as well as wooden blocks that come in various wood types. In addition, the customizable tiles enable you to add a diverse range of patterns using Tile Pattern and much more! There are also tools in this addon used to destroy certain blocks, hence it’s not yet possible to destroy custom blocks faster in survival using vanilla tools so these tools were made. Plastic Axe – used to destroy the plastic type of blocks faster Wood Saw – used to destroy the wood type of blocks faster including vanilla blocks Sledgehammer – used to destroy the stone type of blocks and tiles faster including vanilla blocks Tiles are one of the key components used in the construction industry for building interior and exterior floors, footpaths, swimming pools, walls, partitions, and roofs. There are different Tiles added in the game and each has its own unique properties, textures, and uses. There are 260 different tiles added in the game and each has a slabs type. Tiles have 16 different colors and each can add 5 different patterns, there are also other types of Tiles: Porcelain Tiles which has a rough texture good for flooring outdoor; Wooden Tile which has a wood texture; Checkered Tiles which have 16 different colors; Pool Tiles and Bathroom Tiles Here are some example builds using Tiles: This pool is made with pool tile and a pool liner on the border of the pool It looks like the more realistic pool, right? There are hundreds of blocks you can use as decoration, building structures, designing and etc. Most decorative blocks are made with liquid plastics, liquid plastic is made when crude oil is smelted in a blast furnace. Hence Chemistry Table in the game isn’t craftable so you can’t get crude oil in survival, so the author will add a recipe for them. The recipes are the same in the addon, the author was also created called Uncraftable. There’s also an alternative way to produce liquid plastic, using Plastic Extractor you can produce it. A plastic Extractor can be used to extract liquid plastic from the ground to produce liquid plastic, it can only place on nature blocks that you can find in world layer except for ores. One of the most things liquid plastic can make are Plastic Blocks, there are different plastic blocks below. We also have furniture blocks that are used for designing interior structures such as offices, kitchens, wardrobes, schools and etc. We have 3d furniture as well which isn’t only useful for decoration, but serve some functions as well, some of the blocks have functions and other will have a function soon. Are you tired of our painting as our decoration? We have a new picture frame, one is standing and the other is hanging on the wall. These picture frames have no picture yet by default, you are free to choose what pictures you can install on them. Just choose any available pictures. Here’s an example built using a wooden drawer together with a picture frame and other vanilla blocks. There are blocks too that are made for kitchens such as countertops, countertops with sinks, cabinets, and drawers are included. We also have a fridge, microwave oven, cooking range, etc. which currently has no function yet, however, the water dispenser is now functional this work together with a water container, and you can learn how it works after trying it. Our modern blocks aren’t complete without a decoration block for building cities, say no more to alternative blocks you use in building roads, we have a road block for that, there are different varieties of roadblocks that you could need in building city highways or roads. This isn’t only about roadblocks, there are other blocks too such as caution blocks, traffic cone, and any city-related blocks. All blocks and items can be found in your creative inventory, hence they’re in creative inventory in survival you can able to see them in your recipe book and thus you don’t have to memorize every block’s recipe. If the highlights discussion isn’t enough for you, we have Modern Blocks Guide, this is a guide that is made for this addon, it is another pack so you have to download and install it too if you need it. It modified the ‘How to Play’ UI and make it a guide. This guide provides all things you need in this addon, just read the guide and you’re ready to go. Here’s what it looks like. You have to enable the following experiments in world settings to make it work. Holiday Creator Features Upcoming Creator Features Molang Features Download both the behavior pack and resource pack and install them both. – – Guide (Optional): – mcaddon: – – – Guide (Optional): – mcaddon: –

125.name: Holiday Decors Addon
125.author: Hirx's
125.description: Have you ever wished for an addon that adds decorations based on popular real-life festivities? Well, your dream has come true! Holiday Decors Addon (1.20) is designed to add decorations for popular festive events such as Halloween, Christmas, Thanksgiving, Saint Patrick’s Day, Valentine’s Day, Day of the Dead, and more. Every popular holiday event will be added this year! Halloween: Day of the dead: Make sure you turn on the Experimental Gameplay. mcaddon: –

126.name: Item Pedestal Addon
126.author: Amon28
126.description: Item Pedestal Addon (1.20, 1.19) adds a new block to the game similar to how an item frameworks but fancier. You could display your items here and show them off. To use the item pedestal block just place it down and like an item, the frame holds an item and interacts with it, be sure to point directly at the top of the pedestal. You could also make the pedestal glow by using glowstone dust, just interact with it using a glowstone dust. Both of the pedestals have a sword on them however the item on the Glowing Pedestal is still visible in the darkness. When you place an item on the pedestal it will follow wherever you are looking. It accepts different kinds of stone. Make sure you activated all the following “Experimental Settings”. mcaddon: – mcaddon: –

127.name: Mob Trophies Addon
127.author: TheBestGamerEver
127.description: Have you ever wanted to showcase the tough mobs that you’ve conquered in Minecraft in a unique and glamorous way? If so, you might be interested in this addon! Mob Trophies Addon (1.20) introduces gold trophies of certain mobs that you can craft using 3 gold blocks, a specific item associated with that mob, and a new soul item that the depicted mob can drop. This addon features trophies for 8 different mobs, including Evoker, Piglin Brute, Elder Guardian, Iron Golem, Ravager, Warden, Ender Dragon, and Wither. Each mob has its own soul and trophy item. However, obtaining these souls can be challenging as they only drop in quantities of 1 and are not affected by the looting enchantment. EVOKER TROPHY: *Item needed: Emerald *25% chance for soul to drop on death PIGLIN BRUTE TROPHY: *Item needed: Gilded Blackstone *5% chance for soul to drop on death ELDER GUARDIAN TROPHY: *Item needed: Prismarine Shard *33% chance for soul to drop on death IRON GOLEM TROPHY: *Item needed: Iron Ingot *33% chance for soul to drop on death *Iron Golems created by players will never drop a soul, only naturally spawned ones RAVAGER TROPHY: *Item needed: Saddle *50% chance for soul to drop on death WARDEN TROPHY: *Item needed: Echo Shard *20% chance for soul to drop on death ENDER DRAGON TROPHY: *Item needed: Dragon Breath *Guaranteed chance to drop a soul on death WITHER TROPHY: *Item needed: Netherite Ingot *Guaranteed chance to drop a soul on death Make sure you turn on the Experimental Gameplay. – –

128.name: Spooky Decorations Addon
128.author: ITMG
128.description: Spooky Decorations Addon (1.20, 1.19) provides a variety of Halloween-themed decorations to help you create a spooky atmosphere in your Minecraft worlds. The mod includes over 25 different decorations, including 12 Jack-o’-lanterns, 2 paper lanterns, scarecrows, many coffin variants, a wreath, wooden barricades, mini pumpkins, skulls and skull candles, candies, gravestones and crosses, signs, and much more. With this mod, you can add fun Halloween decorations to your world and make it perfect for the season! – –

129.name: Kamii’s Efficient Door Addon
129.author: kamii
129.description: Do you want to open two doors at once instead of one? Kamii’s Efficient Door Addon (1.20, 1.19) lets you do that with any vanilla door. Efficient Door is a simple script that improves how you interact with doors. If you want to open only one door, just sneak. Make sure you turn on the Beta APIs. mcpack: – Kamii’s Door Addon

130.name: Fancy Furniture Addon
130.author: mno
130.description: Attention everyone! Let’s do a quick quiz. Can you name (a) Fancy and (b) Furniture? If you said “Fancy Furniture,” you are correct! Excellent job! As a reward, you can download this Fancy Furniture Addon (1.19). In fact, everyone is welcome to download it, no matter your level of expertise. Now, let’s give a warm welcome to our new salesman, Sven. He travels through birch forests with his moose, selling the best Fancy Furniture around (at least until version 4 is released). This furniture includes (and is limited to): BBQ! Yep, time for a good old backyard barbecue out on the deck. You do have a deck, right..? Beach Camp Stove! For when you get a case of the Munchies after swimming. TV. Two “channels”! Laptop, you can’t play Minecraft on it, just yet. Coffee Machine. My favorite addon to Minecraft, ever, ever, ever. Coffee is here. Milkshake Maker. Three flavors of shakes! Old-style Jukebox – built a tavern and need a real jukebox..? This is for you. Some great country tracks by The Caffeine Creek Band and JuliusH. Outdoor speakers, loaded with awesome tunes from Patrick de Arteaga; see patrickdearteaga.com Bar stools Reclining lounge chairs (let’s be lazy) Bookshelves Pedestal fans (to keep your desert houses nice and cool) Office chairs (you want a red one, trust me) Lamps Coffee tables Sets of Drawers Washing machines Beach umbrellas and towels Sleeping bags Tents Beach Tents! Even better than normal tents, Withers can’t bust into these. Sun lounges Outdoor chair Still more to come….. And his moose! Find Sven in Birch Forests and Meadows. Bring your emeralds! You’re going to need them. Most are available from your friendly local Sven. Some are also craftable. Beach Tent Craft one like this: Place the completed tent down, and it will look like this: Interact with the box and a tent will pop up (there’s a variety of colors). The arrows indicate the direction the tent will be in. Interact with the box again and the tent will pack itself up. Destroy it and it will drop its spawn egg. Easy! Camp Stove Crafting recipe looks a lot like this: Place it down and get ready for a feast. Place in some planks and set it ablaze with a Flint and Steel. Then interact with it to ‘cook’ your food. Beach Umbrella Place it down and interact with it to expand/contract it. Comes in a variety of colors. To craft one: You can chop it up and move it (it will drop its spawn egg). Beach Towels and Sleeping Bags Beach towel crafting recipe: Place them down and interact to sit on them. No sleeping in these sleeping bags, unfortunately. We should call them sitting bags, maybe. Mona Lisa What beach trip is complete without a Mona Lisa? See if you can afford one! BBQ Light it with a flint and steel (obviously). Put it out with a flint and steel (what?). Or wait for it to turn off itself. TV Turn it on with a flint-and-steel (what?). Change the channel by interacting (two channels!). Turn it off with a flint-and-steel. Outdoor Speaker As with the jukebox, to move them, chop them up and they drop a spawn egg. To make the speakers play music, just interact with it. To stop them, same deal, just interact with it. Fan To turn it on and off, just interact with it. Jukebox To make it play, you need a Good Coin! To make a Good Coin, follow the recipe below. Once you have a Good Coin, hold it and interact with the jukebox. After a second or two, the music will start. If you want to stop the music, interact while holding redstone. If you want to move them, just chop ’em up and they will drop a spawn egg. Milkshake Maker Once you’ve made a plain milkshake (see crafting recipes below), interact with the Maker, and you can make one of three varieties: They all have different effects. You’ll always get at least health boost with a berry shake, jump boost and fire resistance with a honey shake, and speed with a chocolate shake. Coffee Machine Grab a pod (recipe below) a cup (recipe below) and a coffee machine (you’ll need to find a Sven that has them in stock). You may get a variety of effects, the speed at least – just like in real life! How to brew a coffee: Milkshake Glass: Plain Milkshake (first step for flavored shakes), makes eight: Stool: Coffee Table: Coffee Pod (4): Coffee Cup: Good Coin (32): Hope you enjoy it! mcaddon: –

131.name: The Lost World Addon
131.author: vlucid_
131.description: The Lost World Addon (1.20) brings prehistoric creatures to life in the world of Minecraft Bedrock Edition. It expands the game’s ecosystem by introducing a variety of dinosaurs, decorations, and items, adding an exciting and immersive element to your gameplay. The addon includes a variety of dinosaurs such as the Indoraptor, Tylosaurus, Mosasaurus, Compsognathus, Spinosaurus, Tyrannosaurus Rex, Velociraptor, Triceratops, Pachycephalosaurus, Indominus Rex, Giganotosaurus, Gallimimus, Dilophosaurus, Carnotaurus, and Brachiosaurus. The addon includes a variety of dinosaurs such as the Indoraptor, Tylosaurus, Mosasaurus, Compsognathus, Spinosaurus, Tyrannosaurus Rex, Velociraptor, Triceratops, Pachycephalosaurus, Indominus Rex, Giganotosaurus, Gallimimus, Dilophosaurus, Carnotaurus, and Brachiosaurus. There are a few blocks added to this addon which can be for decoration or to create your very own dinosaur! Many different items for many different reasons, some can be used for the processing of creating a dinosaur. DNA and egg items can be used for creating dinosaurs, and the wrench can be used to remove the dinosaur forge. Wrench Recipe: In addition to the dinosaurs, the addon also introduces a few blocks for decoration or to create your dinosaur. It also includes many different items for various purposes, some of which can be used for the processing of creating a dinosaur. The addon also introduces a dinosaur processing system and an Amber ore, which is necessary when creating dinosaurs. You can find it in ravines or caves, although it is rare. These dinosaur processing blocks can be used to create your very own dinosaurs: Recipes for dinosaur processing blocks: DNA Sequencer: -1x iron sword -3x iron blocks -3x obsidian blocks Egg Incubator: – 1xhay block – 5x iron blocks – 3x white stained glass blocks Amber ore & where to find it: Amber is necessary when creating dinosaurs, you can find it in ravines or caves(rare). Make sure you activated the Experimental Gameplay. mcaddon: –

132.name: Better Cherry Blossom Biome Addon
132.author: Mr. Mastery
132.description: While the new cherry blossom biome in Minecraft 1.20 is impressive, do you feel like it could be further enhanced? Look no further than this addon. Better Cherry Blossom Biome Addon (1.19) introduces 3 new types of wood, additional items, and a fresh mob to the game. This addon is still in beta. Furthermore, the Cherry Blossom Biome does not generate in this beta. This addon will be updated to add new features to the generation of the Cherry Grove biome once Minecraft 1.20 releases. Cherry Woodset Dark Cherry Woodset Golden Cherry Woodset The Blossom Muncher (Right now all this mob does is walk around the biome, but more functionality is coming soon!) Cherry Gold Cherry Cherry Pit Make sure to have all experimental settings turned on for this pack to work properly! – –

133.name: Forested Trees Addon
133.author: Laiffoo
133.description: Bored of Oak, Birch, or Spruce? Well, Fear not! Forested Trees Addon (1.20, 1.19) adds 8 new Wood Types spawning around the World! And in the future, there will be more Wood Types! So hope you enjoy it! Every wood type has the following: Slabs Stairs Trapdoors All Wood Recipes 3 Different Trees Saplings ->Leaves that decay like normal leaves Logs/Stripped Logs (Also Wood) Fence and Fence gate Cherry and Ebony have a new Fruit with them! Let’s begin: Cherry Cherry Wood is found in Birch Forests, it’s pretty common and isn’t that tall! It’s Pink-Purplish and also highly flammable, wouldn’t recommend for the it Nether! The Cherry Leaves will decay and they drop Cherries instead of Apples Blue Mahoe Blue Mahoe Wood spawns in Taiga forests and isn’t that Tall. It drops Apples like normal trees and the color of the Wood is… Well, Blue! Ebony Ebony is found in Dark Oak Forests and is pretty thick. It’s Dark and drops a new type of fruit! Ebony Persimmon will give regeneration once consumed! Keep in mind it needs a 2×2 sapling area to grow! Similar to dark oak! Ebony is a little fire resistance and explosion resistance! Greenheart Greenheart is found in Jungle and is Green! It’s just a bit fire and Explosion resistance It has a thick and thin Variant, keep in mind it needs a 2×2 sapling area to grow! Similar to dark oak! Peltogyne Peltogyne will only spawn in flower Forests and Meadows! It’s really tall and the color is purple. Peltogyne is highly explosion and Fire resistance The saplings also need a 2×2 like Dark oak to grow! This Addon only adds 5 new Tree/Wood types but it will add more in the Future! Installation Note: Turn on all Experimental Gameplay Features. – – – –

134.name: Honey And Bears Addon
134.author: RabanoMay
134.description: Honey And Bears Addon (1.19) expands on the theme of honey and introduces additional items like foods and blocks, more flower varieties, and the inclusion of several new animals, such as grizzly bears, lions, hyenas, zebras, toucans, muddy pigs, skeleton wolves, capybaras, and crows. This addon is translated into English, Spanish and. in Portuguese. The missing bear in Minecraft vanilla. This bear is more aggressive with its surroundings than the other bears, it attacks the monsters around it. Can be breed with Salmon, Honey bottles, Honeycomb, Sweet Berries, Honey Berries, and Big Honey Bottles. On death has a chance to drop Honeycomb or Salmon. Spawns in flower forests and taiga. It has 2 variants, whose difference is the snout. The toucan, extracted from Minecraft dungeons, is one of the pets of this add-on, it has 10 life, it can be tamed with any type of seeds, can be cured with apples, and flies, and appears in the jungles. It has 2 variants, whose difference is the beak and the tail. The Capybaras, are the friendliest creature in the world and a very cute pet. Can be tamed with apples and golden apples, heals with the same items, and has 10 health in the wild and 20 when tamed. Appears on plains and swamps. The crow, is a wild, non-tamable creature that flies around the world, has 10 health, and appears in swamps, savannahs, and deserts. In the future, it will have more uses! Extracted from Minecraft Earth, the skeleton wolf is an enemy that only appears at night, it can be a baby or an adult and it dies by sunlight. A pig exclusive to the mangrove swamp, works just like the pig, its biggest change is its drop, where it can drop a mangrove propagule. The lion is the leading creature of the savanna, it has 30 health, and 6 damage, and is very curious, which makes it steal items on the ground, so be careful not to die with your armor near it, because it can equip it and become very powerful, they appear in packs. Zebras are wild animals that are scattered across the savanna, they are always alert not to be hunted by hyenas or lions, and they cannot be tamed or controlled, but you can ride them. You can breed them like horses. The hyena is a distrustful but lethal creature, it attacks larger creatures than itself, but if a lion appears, it prefers to flee, also it does not like to be close to the player or villagers. But despite that, you can attract them with food, and they are big fans of honey, and you can breed them. An expelled villager wanders the world with stolen items and garbage he finds, trying to sell them to survive. He was kicked out of his village for two reasons: because he used to be a nitwit and for being a thief, as he used to take things from some villagers. He can be found in the plains biome. The large bottle is the larger version of the glass bottle. The honey bottle is crafted with honey and several large empty bottles, it also works as a food, it has 10 nutrition and works like milk. Crystallized honey is crafted by cooking the honeycomb in a furnace or smoker. The crystallized honey block is crafted with 9 crystallized honey items. Crystallized honey item has 4 nutrition. Added 5 flowers that only spawn in the flower forest and meadow. These are the buttercup, dianthus, crocus, pink clover, and white clover.
