Dried tallgrass is a plant that appears in the savanna biome, and can only be obtained using shears. The 5 added foods are honey apple, honey beef, honey bread, honey mutton, and honey berries. Honey beef has 12 nutrition, honey apple has 8 nutrition, honey bread has 9 nutrition, honey mutton has 10 nutrition and honeyberries has 6 of nutrition, honey soup has 8 nutrition and works like milk. The fried egg is a food that can be obtained in the furnace or campfire and provides 5 nutrition. The Honey Brick and Chiseled Honey Brick are the decorations for the add-on. There are 3 new uses for basalt, turn it into one of these 3 decorative blocks: basalt brick, cracked basalt brick, and chiseled basalt brick. In caves, there is a new type of stone, limestone. This can be polished and turned into a brick. In the savanna there are many new blocks, among them are silt and dried silt, useful for decoration. A block generates in the savanna biome, the dried mud, and its function is decorative. Make sure you activated the Experimental Gameplay. mcaddon: –

135.name: Kamii’s Door Addon
135.author: kamii
135.description: Kamii’s Door Addon (1.20, 1.19) is a refreshing addition to Minecraft PE that brings a new level of customization and security to your in-game homes. If you’re tired of the standard vanilla doors, this addon is a must-try. It introduces more doors in a vanilla style, making it suitable for survival mode gameplay. One of the most impressive features of this addon is the variety of new doors it introduces. From stone doors to quartz doors, the addon provides a range of options that can match any architectural style you’re aiming for in your Minecraft builds. The crafting process for these doors is straightforward and uses regular door patterns, making it easy to integrate into your gameplay. Another standout feature is the lock and lock pick system. This feature allows you to secure your in-game homes more effectively, adding a layer of realism and strategy to the game. However, it’s worth noting that the chances of breaking in with a lock pick are low, which can be a challenge if you’re on the wrong side of the door. The addon also offers compatibility with the efficient door script, allowing you to interact with two connected doors at the same time. This feature enhances the user experience and makes door interactions more intuitive. You can create new doors such as stone doors and the same quartz doors with regular door patterns or tall doors by using the crafting table You can make chiseled doors by using stonecutter: You can lock your house with a lock and break it in with your lock, but the chances are low You can use the lock by sneaking and right click on the door and hit to interact This addon also has support with an efficient door script. with the efficient door, you can interact with two connected doors at the same time Make sure you activate the Experimental Gameplay. – – Kamii’s Efficient Door Addon Kamii’s UI Queue Addon Kamii’s Script Configuration Addon – –

136.name: Furnished+ Addon
136.author: ArathNidoGamer
136.description: Furnished+ Addon (1.19) enhances the interior of your home, facilitates storytelling and role-playing games, and offers a variety of decorative options. The addon includes solid decorations, decorations with lighting, and interactive elements. You will be able to make decorations such as tables, chairs, and other furniture from different types of wood, for that you need planks of any type of wood and place them on the stone cutter. You can sit in the chairs and interact with them. In this addon decorative flags are added, for the moment only 20 flags were added. To make flags you must make the white flag from the crafting table and place the white flag in the stone cutter to make a flag from those available. ​From the work table, you can make a random furniture block, there are two types of blocks, one is for normal decorations and the others are decorations with lighting. With these blocks, you can create other furniture and decorations from the stone cutter. With the bottle you can interact with it if you have a glass cup in your main hand, it will give you a glass, and consuming it will give you regeneration and dizziness. With the popcorn machine, you can interact with it if you have a bag of popcorn in your main hand, it will give you a bag of popcorn that serves as food. Make sure you activated the Experimental Gameplay. – – mcaddon: –

137.name: Johnrasc Addon Adventure Addon
137.author: TUTEL_
137.description: If you are looking for a way to spice up your Minecraft world, you might want to try this addon. Johnrasc Addon Adventure Addon (1.20) combines the features of 3 Mini-AddOns: Gloomy Update, Bony Update, and Random Update, and adds even more new things. You will find new armor sets, tools, blocks, mobs, and structures to explore and enjoy. 169 Blocks including custom models 31 Items 40 Armor Equipment 66 Tools 7 Throwable Items 12 Foods 15 Potions 31 Mobs 75 Structures This addon is not finished yet, and it will be updated in the future. Make sure you turn on the Experimental Gameplay. mcaddon: – Zip: –

138.name: Trial Spawner Concept Addon
138.author: ITz_DaKs
138.description: Trial Spawner Concept Addon (1.20) implements the Trial Spawner along with other blocks announced at Minecraft Live 2023. It provides an example of how these blocks would look and function in the game. Additionally, it generates a small structure in the caves, which is a miniature version of the Trial Chambers. This addon adds: Copper Bulb, Exposed Copper Bulb, Weathered Copper Bulb, Oxidized Copper Bulb. Copper Vent, Copper grate. Tuff bricks, Tuff chiseled. Trial Spawner The objective of this addon is that they can test what is new that will be added to the game in the future and players can give an early opinion. Trial Spawner This new spawner is a little closer to what this block could be in the future. Its functionality is based on the number of players who are nearby, the minimum being 1 and the maximum being 5. The fewer players are nearby, the number of enemies will be lower, while if the maximum number of players are around, the maximum number of enemies will be generated. Once all the monsters have been generated, the Trial Spawner will drop the prize. This prize varies depending on the number of players, the more players the more prize. This prize contains diamonds and emeralds. Once the prize is awarded, the Trial Spawner will go into cooldown for several minutes, so you can leave and come back later to get more prizes. The smoke above indicates that it is in cooldown. Also, the Trial Spawner only works if it has moss or ice around it. If it has moss it indicates that slimes will be generated and if it has ice it indicates strays. If you want to try level 5 just run this command 4 times after placing the trial spawner: /tag @s remove trial_spawner The more players, the longer it takes to start. Copper Bulb The copper bulb is a lighting block, it oxidizes which means its light level will disappear. For this, you must deoxidize it with an axe or use a honeycomb to wax it. This block is generated in the new structure, you should bring an axe to see. Copper Vent The copper vent is just a decorative block Copper Grate The copper grate is a decorative block but one that allows light to pass through and see through. Tuff Bricks Tuff bricks is a new use for the tuff block. It is a great decorative block that will be generated in the trial chambers. Chiseled Tuff Bricks The chiseled tuff bricks are a decorative block that will complement the decorations with the tuff bricks. Polished Tuff The polished tuff is a decorative block that will complement the decorations with the tuff bricks and chiseled tuff bricks Make sure you turn on the Experimental Gameplay. – –

139.name: Bonsai Tree Addon
139.author: Unknown Mcpe
139.description: With Bonsai Tree Addon (1.20, 1.19), you can cultivate a diverse collection of bonsai trees in your virtual world. These miniature marvels are a sight to behold and each requires unique care. Elevate your Minecraft landscaping with the enchanting charm of Bonsai trees in this immersive addon. How to set-up the bonsai: BONSAI POT BONSAI TREES – –

140.name: Remon Furniture Addon
140.author: Creative Karis
140.description: Remon Furniture Addon (1.20, 1.19) adds more than 400 pieces of modern and functional furniture and more than 16 beautiful and attractive colors. You can furnish your home in the way you want, and believe me, you will love it. Finally, now you can enjoy the new modern furniture, which comes with more than 400 functional and realistic pieces of furniture with realistic sound effects. You can cook, sit, watch TV, eat, and more. All the furniture is functional and certainly not completed yet. There will be more updates. You will see below how to use the furniture. It has high accuracy and distinctive and non-repetitive designs. All furniture is functional. All furniture has realistic sound effects. All furniture is block that does not contain an entity. The way to get the furniture is very easy: How to get decoration: How to get decoration: The book: You can put more than one book in the same block at the moment no sounds will be added soon Laptop: On a laptop, you can open it, turn it on, and then close it, just click on the laptop Air conditioner: An air conditioner that you can operate via the air conditioner remote control, you can raise the degree of cold, and it makes a sound The clock: You can set the time 10 seconds 20 seconds 30 seconds When the time expires it will sound like a ring tone You have to press stop Fan: Turn on the fan, you must use the plug, it beeps, there is speed 1 and speed 2, you can turn it off TV: The TV screen can be changed to 3 channels. There is an audio channel that plays a song. You can turn on the TV using the remote control. Light: Well to turn on the light you have to bring the light plug you can turn it on and off Wardrobe: A wardrobe that you can open or close makes a sound Paint Art: You can just click to shoot them down Curtain: You can change the colors of the curtains to 16 colors by dyeing the colors. Just hold the dye you want and press the curtain. You also have a connection. You can make curtains of the size you need. Bed, sofa, desk, wardrobe, and chair: Well, you can change the colors by dyeing the bed, the sofa, the office chair and the office, and you can also open the office closure. Move away by 2 blocks to dye the chair and sofa. Come closer by 2 blocks to sit. You can also store in the closet. Help screen: The help screen helps you know how to interact with the furniture Gas and oven: Oven or gas, you can cook and cook different dishes that contain sound and timer effects Cake cooking: First, you must hold the cake dough, then click on the oven to open, then insert the dough and then close the oven, it will take 15 seconds to cook, a sound will appear when finished, open the oven and then take out the cake ready to eat Eggs: To cook the eggs first, you have to bring the pan, then put it on the gas, then bring an egg and press the frying pan, it will take 7 seconds, then press to get the egg plate Egg bowl: You can eat eggs by clicking on the plate. The hunger will be completely filled. Also, you should pay attention if you leave the eggs for more than 35 seconds, they will become cold, and if you eat them, they will cause you nausea for 30 seconds. You can reheat them in the microwave. Cake: You can eat the cake by pressing the cake in batches, you will get full health on every piece you eat Toaster: You can toast the bread first, you have to put the bread in the toaster, then press and wait 5 seconds and then press to get the toasted bread Food sector: You can use it to cut the orange pieces, fetch the orange, and press it, it will take 5 seconds with the slicing sounds, then press to get the orange pieces. Blender: Through the blender, you can make orange juice. First, you have to open the blender, then bring the orange pieces and put them in the blender, then close it, wait 6 seconds, then press to pour the juice. Wait 5 seconds. You can drink a cup of juice by clicking on it. You will get acceleration for a while. 50 seconds, sorry, forgot to take a picture of the juice glass Microwave: You can use the microwave to heat the egg dish, first, you must open the microwave door, then put the frozen dish, then close it, wait 6 seconds, it will constantly ring when finished Kitchen chimney: The kitchen chimney has a connection that you can make the size you want Storage and chair: You can use cabinets for storage and also you can sit on chairs and change their color to 16 colors and the table has a connection Shower: You can turn on and off the water has animation Toilet: Press to open, then press to sit, you will take a stool, then go down the toilet and press to clean Bathtub: Press to fill with water Wait 9 seconds and then you can sit in the bathtub after filling Faucet: You can turn it on and off Installation Note: Very important: You must apply the update blocks in order to work, otherwise only update blocks will appear. You must activate the Experimental Options, otherwise, the furniture will not appear. Update blocks: (1.19.20 and above required) – –

141.name: More Mob Heads Addon
141.author: MrSPiRfor1
141.description: For Minecraft enthusiasts seeking to enhance their gameplay experience, More Mob Heads Addon (1.20, 1.19) offers an intriguing proposition. With the introduction of the new piglin head in Minecraft 1.20, this addon takes the concept a step further, adding eight unique types of mob heads to the game. The addition of these mob heads brings a new layer of excitement to the gameplay. The hunt for these mob heads can be a thrilling and rewarding experience. Each mob head serves as a trophy, a testament to the adventures and battles in the Minecraft world. One of the standout aspects of this addon is the potential for the decorative use of mob heads. These heads can be used to embellish the Minecraft world, adding a unique flair to buildings and landscapes. Whether the aim is to create a themed area or showcase a collection of mob heads, this addon provides the perfect decorative elements. This addon Added 8 new different types of mob heads in Minecraft: 2 Warden Head 3 Ravager Head 4 Ghast Head 5 Panda Head 6 Villager Head 7 Blaze Head 8 Husk Head Make sure you activate the Experimental Gameplay. mcaddon: –

142.name: Household Furniture Addon
142.author: DogDee5
142.description: Transform your Minecraft Bedrock Edition world into a cozy haven with Household Furniture Addon (1.20)! Elevate your virtual living space with a stunning array of meticulously crafted furnishings, from plush sofas to elegant dining tables. Immerse yourself in the world of interior design as you customize your in-game home with a touch of virtual luxury. Whether you’re aiming for a modern chic vibe or a rustic charm, this addon is your passport to a world where pixelated furniture becomes a key player in your Minecraft adventures. Redefine your in-game living experience and make your virtual house feel like a true home! – –

143.name: Portal Gun Addon
143.author: Amon28
143.description: Are you a fan of the portal gun in Java? Do you want to experience it in Bedrock? With Portal Gun Addon (1.20) for Minecraft Bedrock, you can now wield the power of instantaneous travel with your very own portal gun, inspired by the legendary video game ‘Portal’. This addon brings the iconic portal gun to your Minecraft realm, allowing you to create interconnected portals that defy all the rules of physics. No more tedious treks across vast terrains – simply shoot, connect, and step through to arrive at your destination in an instant. The portal gun is quite easy to craft, and you can even get it in survival mode using vanilla Minecraft items. Added 8 new things for map makers to use, these are all uncraftable. The Cubes (block and entity) Can be picked up by portal guns Big and Small Button Small button act like a button and big button requires the player or cube to get on top of it Barrier Blocks (Only portals can go through) Portable and Non-Portable surface blocks For this to work set up a repeating command block and put “function creator”. This will make all other blocks non-portalable. Cube Dropper (Cube Tube) Once activated it will drop a cube Big Door Once unlocked it will open when a player is nearby If u want to remove these blocks you can break the block in the middle or go near them and use “/event entity @e[r=2] despawn” Demo Map This map will teach you how each of these new blocks works and the map has also test rooms. There are 3 different kinds of portal guns the portal model will depend on what portal gun you use. Normal Portal Gun with Book: 1x Ender Eye 6x Obsidian 2x Iron Ingot Potato Portal Gun: This portal gun has every functionality of a normal portal gun. It also plays voice lines of potato Glados. 1x Normal Portal Gun 1x Potato Rick and Morty Portal Gun: 6x Iron Ingot 2x Glass 1x Ender Eye When you craft the portal gun it will be BLUE by default when firing the portal gun it will switch to ORANGE. You can freely switch what color of the portal to shoot by CROUCHING and SHOOTING the portal gun. You can see on the portal gun what portal color it would shoot. How can I pick up blocks? Hold a portal gun in your hand (can be any color) (except for the Rick and Morty portal gun) Look directly down and shoot and it will convert your portal gun into a gravity gun. Shoot whatever blocks you want to pick up How can I place the block? Put the floating block somewhere you want to place. Use the gravity gun again to place the block. To convert it to the portal gun again shoot directly down. Shoot directly up using your portal gun. To remove the black hole switch to the blackhole portal gun again and sneak and shoot. Anything that gets close to the black hole will get sucked in and killed including you and your items. The author has also added a page on How to play for the portal gun so you can have an easy guide on how to use the portal gun and how to craft it. Settings>How To Play>Scroll to the bottom Subpacks: Has 3 settings, Portal gun + Gravity Gun, Gravity Gun Only, and Portal Gun Only. Make sure you active the following Experimental Gameplay: mcaddon: – Demo Map: –

144.name: Elingo’s World Edit Addon
144.author: Captain_Elingo
144.description: Elingo’s World Edit Addon (1.20) is a mod that simplifies terrain building in Minecraft. The addon provides tools that allow you to add and remove terrain with just a few clicks. You can also adjust the distance, size, and shape of the terrain. Currently, the addon supports 8 different blocks that you can use to build your custom terrain. It is a great tool for those who want to build their Minecraft world with ease. These blocks can be used to build terrain: Grass Dirt Sandstone Cobblestone Stone Netherrack End Stone Air (only works in the eraser mode) The buttons and their uses: The Shape button This button changes the shape from sphere to cube, and vice versa. The Size button This button lets you decide what the size of the cube or sphere should be. The Distance button This distance changes and displays the distance between you and the object. The Mode button This button switches back and forth between these modes: Builder Mode Eraser Mode The Exit button This is the button you press when you want to disable the world editor. Usage Note: 1. When you enable the editor by entering this command “/function start_editor” all the items in your hotbar will be replaced with the items of this add-on, so it’s recommended to have an empty hotbar before enabling the editor. 2. There will be a ball or block that shows you the center of whatever you are placing there when you hold the Builder tools or Eraser tools. 3. For the Builder tool to work, you have to make sure you’ve done all of the things listed below: Hold the hammer. Right-click the hammer so that it displays “Hammer [On]” Have the block you want to build with in the hotbar slot between the brown and red buttons. – –

145.name: EnchantEase Modern Furniture Addon
145.author: issamoh Creations
145.description: Revamp your Minecraft world with the EnchantEase Modern Furniture Addon! EnchantEase Modern Furniture Addon (1.20) will transform your humble abode into a stylish oasis filled with sleek and customizable furniture pieces. Elevate your living space with a touch of contemporary elegance. Chic Seating Arrangements : Dive into comfort with an array of stylish sofas, cozy armchairs, and trendy bean bags. Mix and match colors to create the perfect seating arrangement for your virtual living space. Futuristic Tables : Upgrade your dining area or coffee nook with futuristic tables, ranging from minimalist designs to high-tech glass surfaces. Craft the perfect setting for in-game gatherings with friends! Customization Galore : EnchantEase Modern Furniture is all about personalization. Modify the colors, materials, and sizes of each furniture piece to match your unique style. Create a Minecraft home that reflects your personality and stands out in the blocky universe! Function: Remove furniture: Rotate furniture: – –

146.name: Lance Furniture Addon
146.author: LancelotF
146.description: Lance Furniture Addon (1.20, 1.19) adds some useful decoration to your Minecraft world. A fridge, coffeemaker, toaster, microwave and more. The furniture actually works and it’s easy to use with its new redesigned textures they will surely fit well in your house. Add a modern and realistic touch to your house with our modern looking furniture, some of the furniture actually works. This add-on is still work in progress. Coffee maker: Interact with cocoa beans first to load the coffee maker with coffee. Then, make a mug with one quartz mineral and interact with the coffee maker. Your cup will fill with coffee and then enjoy your coffee. Microwave: Interact with the microwave using raw beef. The microwave will cook it in around 3 seconds, and give you a microwaved steak, which fills 3,5 food. Toaster: First, craft sliced bread. Just make it with one normal bread on your inventory. Then, place it on the toaster. Simple toast. Ceiling Fan: The ceiling fan has a light that you can turn on by right clicking, and you can turn the fan on and off by crouching and right clicking on it. Portable Speaker: You can actually play music on it! Place it wherever you want and long-tap on it to go to the next song, or crouch and long tap on it to go to the previous one. Please note that you need to download the song packs in order to get it working. You can download them clicking here (https://minecraftworldsmaker.jimdofree.com/). The page needs some improvements so please be patient. TV (With 4 channels): The TV uses the most complex command/animation system to work. Currently since it can have bugs, it does not have a crafting recipe. But if you need it that much, just take it out of the creative inventory and place it. Can display up to 4 beautiful TV channels. Waffle Maker: Security Cameras: This new and complex security camera system will allow you to place security cameras and use them. Just place up to 20 cameras where you want, then use the camera monitor to check them. Once you are into camera mode, right click/press the next camera button to move between cameras. Jump or move to get out of the camera testing. To craft the furniture first you need an furniture table. The crafting is simple. Note: You need stainless steel ingots to craft this. Then just place the furniture table wherever you would like in your world. Now craft some blueprints to use the furniture table: Couch: Imac (Pro, Mini): Toaster: Fridge: Microwave: Coffee Maker: Gaming Chair (DXRacer, Corsair): Minebook Pro: Small Table: Ceiling Fan: JBL Flip Speaker: Waffle Maker: Once you have the blueprint for your piece of furniture just interact with the furniture table to get it. – mcaddon: –

147.name: monoDeco Furniture Addon
147.author: monorogu
147.description: monoDeco Furniture Addon (1.20) is a mod/addon for Minecraft Pocket Edition (MCPE) that adds a variety of furniture items to the game, such as chairs, tables, and lamps. The Special Cafe’s Update is an update to the mod that adds new furniture items specifically designed for cafes and restaurants, such as coffee machines, bar stools, and counters. Don’t forget to delete old addons version and then import with new addons version. Make sure you turn on the Experimental Gameplay. – –

148.name: The FAYE Garden Decorations Pack Addon
148.author: The FAYE Project
148.description: The FAYE Garden Decorations Pack Addon (1.20, 1.19) is an addon series designed for Minecraft Bedrock Edition enthusiasts. The first installment in the series is called the Faye Garden, which features the ‘Faye Garden Decorations’ addon. This addon offers 29 decorative items that can be incorporated into your Minecraft world. The FAYE Project aims to bring enchantment and wonder to your gameplay experience by introducing new decorations, accessories, mobs, and more. To locate pack items in your world, you have three options. The first is to access your commands bar and use the tag name ‘faye’ to obtain the items: The second method is to use a crafting table: The third method is to simply open your creative inventory and locate the nature section. You could also scroll directly to the bottom of the search tab for easy access: The decorations catalog: Make sure you turn on the Experimental Gameplay. – –

149.name: More Furniture Addon
149.author: XLite
149.description: More Furniture Addon (1.20) boasts 50+ high-quality furniture and building blocks adorned with high-resolution textures and models. Elevate your worlds and survival living spaces with this remarkable addition. With over 50 unique furniture pieces and blocks, you’ll have ample options to play and build. Brace yourself, because your in-game furniture building skills are about to reach the next level! Furniture Table The Furniture allows you to make Furniture Crates! Furniture Crates can then be used in a stonecutter to create Furniture Modular Sofa Television Square Centre Coffee Table Modern Coffee Table Coffee Table Wooden Table Dinning room Chair Refrigerator Oven Kitchen Counters Bedroom Furniture Toilet Bathtub Sink Bathroom Mirror Desk Lamp Numberless Clock Circular Bookshelf Books Bottles Phone Factory Wall Light Triune Wooden Floor Lamp Gaming Keyboard Teddy Bear Wall Lamp Ceiling Light Plastic Chair Plastic Table To begin with, you will need the Furniture table To craft the Furniture Table you will need the Items Shown Below: 5 Iron Ingots 3 Wooden Slabs 1 Leather Once inside the Furniture Table, you’ll be able to make a multitude of Categorized Furniture Crates. To make these Categorized Furniture Crates you will need an empty furniture crate and an Empty Blueprint . The empty furniture crate and blueprint can be crafted in the crafting table. Once you have Made your furniture crate take it to the stone cutter to create Furniture! Make sure you turn on the Experimental Gameplay. – – Test Map: –

150.name: Fluffy Carpets Addon
150.author: Agaast
150.description: Tired of mundane and lackluster floors in your structures? Fear not! Introducing plush decorative carpets for your Minecraft realm. Fluffy Carpets Addon (1.20) adds 16 standard designs and 7 fresh, one-of-a-kind patterns, these carpets will add a touch of whimsy to your abode. Craft them with care and incorporate them into your survival adventures! Make sure you turn on the Experimental Gameplay. mcaddon: –

151.name: Wallpaper Decoration Addon
151.author: Agaast
151.description: Are your home walls feeling lackluster? Fear not! This add-on is here to remedy that situation. Wallpaper Decoration Addon (1.20) introduces 16 fresh wallpapers for your Minecraft buildings. These wallpapers are not just for show—they can be crafted and utilized in survival mode. Discover a world of creativity as you adorn your interior with this delightful collection of wallpapers. Whether you’re building a cozy cottage or a grand castle, these 16 new designs will breathe life into your virtual abode. So go ahead, craft, decorate, and make your Minecraft home truly your own! Make sure you turn on the Experimental Gameplay. mcaddon: –

152.name: Creator Packs Addon
152.author: LPaicen
152.description: Creator Packs Addon (1.20) introduces 59 fresh vertical slabs into Minecraft, with each one mirroring a vanilla slab! Throughout development, efforts were made to closely align these vertical slabs with the features of their vanilla counterparts. Although certain features remain unattainable due to API limitations, they should still suffice for construction purposes. The goal is to enhance the building experience in the game by providing more versatile vertical slab options. The vanilla-cut copper slabs have many features, and I also simulated these features in the vertical slabs. These cut copper vertical slabs will oxidize (very slowly), and players can use honeycomb to prevent them from oxidizing further or use an axe to remove wax or rust. But they cannot use dispensers to wax them, nor can they be struck by lightning to remove rust. The crafting of vertical slabs is very simple, just place 3 ingredients in a vertical column in the crafting table slot, and each 3 ingredients can make 6 vertical slabs. For stone materials, you can also use a stonecutter to cut them into vertical slabs. In addition, you can also use the /function command to get vertical slabs. Each vertical slab has four orientations: east, south, west, and north, and their collision boxes are half a block in size, but due to API restrictions, blocks like torches can still be placed on top of them. Also, these vertical slabs can be waterlogged. If you add a resource pack, the textures of these vertical slabs will also change accordingly. Buildings with Vertical Slabs: Make sure you turn on the Experimental Gameplay. mcaddon: –

153.name: Collapsed Blocks Addon
153.author: Trotamundos872
153.description: Collapsed Blocks Addon (1.20, 1.19) lets you create rubble versions of brick blocks for both creative and survival modes. You can use these blocks to make realistic ruins and abandoned buildings that fit the Minecraft style. To get the blocks, you need to cut a stone brick block with a stone cutter. You will get 2 rubble blocks for each stone brick block. The addon also has a new update that adds 10 more blocks with deepslate variants. All the blocks: News blocks: Creative: To be able to acquire it in creative it can be acquired as in survival but even so if you write in the chat / give @p f:ruina# (change # to a number from 1-13). For example:  / give @p f:ruina1 Survival: In survival, you can acquire it by putting a block of stone bricks in a stone cutter. Here are some examples of how to use it: Make sure you activated the Experimental Gameplay. – – Block – Geo Fixer (Required) – –

154.name: Furnilla Addon
154.author: Infinite Addons
154.description: Are you tired of using furniture and decorations that don’t match your favorite texture pack? Look no further than Furnilla Addon! This addon introduces new furniture, bathtubs, consoles, lamps, and even a fish tank to Minecraft. You can decorate your home with unique objects that no other addon provides. Furnilla Addon (1.20) uses mostly existing Minecraft textures and recycles them organically to create decorations with similar designs. You can use furniture, tables, chairs, flowerpots, fans, consoles, and even video games to decorate your home. One of the most impressive features of Furnilla is its animations and interactions, which add a touch of realism to your Minecraft world. mcaddon: –

155.name: Props and Furnitures Addon
155.author: RMPlaysMC YT
155.description: Props and Furnitures Addon (1.20) introduces more than 200 pieces of furniture. The latest version includes interactive items like chairs, ovens, and televisions. Whether you’re creating a bustling city or setting up role-play scenarios, this addon offers a diverse collection of over 200 furnishings to experiment with and place in your world. Small Table Drawers Chairs and It has lots of variants Oven Grocery Stand Cabinets Television Washing Area Classroom chairs Lights Glass Windows Crafting Recipe: Just go to the inventory tab and choose crate then get a stonecutter and use it to get some furniture. Make sure you turn on the Experimental Gameplay: Holiday Creator Features. Upcoming Creator Features. Experimental Molang Features. – –

156.name: MeoWhy Furniture Addon
156.author: MeoWhenOF
156.description: MeoWhy Furniture Addon (1.20, 1.19) gives you more than +150 furniture options, such as chairs, sofas, tables, kitchen items, garden items, pots, food, and more. The author will keep updating it to restore the models that were broken by the update! You can easily craft everything on a crafting table. Crafting table configuration: Make sure you activated the “Holiday Creator Features” Setting. – – – –

157.name: Cat Decorations Furni Addon
157.author: strikex4
157.description: Cat Decorations Furni Addon (1.20) is an ultimate furniture addon for Minecraft that infuses your virtual world with a delightful touch of feline charm! Within the cozy confines of your in-game interiors, you’ll discover an array of adorable furniture pieces meticulously designed for both aesthetic appeal and practical functionality. Picture yourself sinking into a perfectly comfortable armchair, its surface adorned with playful paw prints. Alternatively, imagine snuggling up for a nap in a fluffy cat-themed bed, complete with soft cushions and paw-shaped pillows. For literary enthusiasts, there’s a charming bookshelf featuring whimsical cat motifs, perfect for organizing your literary treasures. And when it’s time to get down to business, look no further than the sleek cat-shaped desk, tailor-made for your Minecraft workstation. – –

158.name: Vanilla Furniture Addon
158.author: El_MiniCap
158.description: Vanilla Furniture Addon (1.20) provides an unparalleled decorating experience for both classic and modern Minecraft players. By utilizing items from your inventory as decorative elements, you can personalize your buildings to your liking, infusing them with a unique touch. With Vanilla Furniture, imagine having all the objects and items from Minecraft transformed into 3D decorative blocks. This allows you to add elegance and style without relying on extravagant elements like televisions or armchairs. Our mission is to preserve Minecraft’s original beauty while offering players more options to decorate and customize their worlds. Bring your structures to life with Vanilla Furniture and create an environment that’s truly one-of-a-kind! Note: To get each of the decorations, remember to place the object you want in the stone cutter. Buckets: Swords: Pickaxe: Axe: Hoe: Shovel: Extra weapon & shield: Make sure you turn on the “Holiday Creator features” and “Upcoming Creator features”. mcaddon: –

159.name: Endcraft Remastered Addon
159.author: Laiffoo
159.description: If you are a fan of Minecraft PE, you probably know that the End is the final dimension in the game, where you can face the Ender Dragon and explore the mysterious End Cities. But you may also agree that the End is not very exciting, as it is mostly a barren wasteland of purple islands and chorus plants. Even Mojang, the developer of Minecraft, admits that the End needs some improvement. That’s why a talented modder named [your name] has created Endcraft Remastered, an addon that will transform the End into a more diverse and dynamic place. Endcraft Remastered Addon (1.20) adds new biomes, structures, mobs, items, and features to the End, making it more fun and challenging to explore. The First ore is Tungsten! It is pretty common and can be used as an iron for the end! The Next Ore is Alexandrite! It is pretty much the End version of diamonds Those are all the ores for now, but soon there will be more! So stay tuned! Now we go to the Warp Logs. The Warp logs will spawn in a new End Biome and are not that special. The Leaves are called Warplight and drop Warpcane and Warpfruits, the Warpcane is like Sugar cane for the end! And now is the Wasted Cactus! This Cactus only damages you in the overworld and spawns in a new End Biome as well! And also have Stone End Sand! First is the End Wastelands It is the most common Biome and is pretty empty. It only contains 3 new Blocks and is similar to Overworld deserts! Next is the Corrupted Ends It is a pretty common Biome and is filled with new Blocks and even a new Mushroom type. It is very dark and contains a new deadly Mob which you will learn more of later Last but not least is the Warp Ends It is pretty rare and contains a lot of blocks It is very big as well First is the End Slime, a pretty annoying mob that drops slime. Spawns all around the end! Second of all is the shulk. It is pretty much the wish.com version of a Slime and a shulker. Next is the Warpman! It is a new and Stronger Enderman which drops a better Ender Pearl! Last is the Corruptmite. It is very strong and only spawns in the Corrupted Ends. If you see it, run We have the Chalked Endstone, which is pretty much the cobblestone for the End We also have End Caves! Beware of the traps! And that is about it! Hope you enjoy it and stay tuned for more! Make sure you turn on the Experimental Gameplay. – –

160.name: Medieval Furniture Addon
160.author: EndXenoc MCPE
160.description: Do you want to decorate your medieval houses but you can’t do it with the game blocks? Medieval Furniture Addon (1.20, 1.19) adds many new blocks with 3D models to create epic decorations. This addon is support resource pack now. This addon adds many new blocks with all types of wood and is compatible with resource packs. All the 3D models were created by the author. With these blocks, they can decorate many places in their medieval houses. To get the blocks in creative you have to use the command /function medieval_house . And the next house will be generated with all the blocks inside. Make sure you activated the following “Experimental Settings”: – – Geo Fixer: – (Required) Test Map: – – – Test Map: –

161.name: MrCrayFish Furniture Addon
161.author: EndXenoc MCPE
161.description: MrCrayFish Furniture Addon (1.20) serves as an unofficial adaptation of the original Minecraft Java mod. This delightful extension enhances your gaming journey by introducing an array of furniture options, each crafted from various types of wood and available in a spectrum of colors. All the blocks that were added in this first version are those that are available in the original mod for 1.20.1. Tables Coffee Tables (Large & Short) Chairs Park Bench Sofas Fence Fence Gate Hedge Blinds Grill: You can place up to 4 items, all items are turned over with the help of the spatula. When smoke particles come out, it is already cooked. The items that can be placed are the following: Fridge Cabinet Crate Make sure you turn on the Experimental Gameplay. – –

162.name: SimplySoCute Hats Addon
162.author: SimplyMiPriiYT
162.description: Unlock 15 charming new wearables in Minecraft with SimplySoCute Hats Addon (1.20). This addon results from collaborating with Simjue, an exceptionally skilled Minecraft addon developer. We’ve poured extra effort and attention into crafting this addon, and we’re eagerly anticipating your experience with it! To craft the items in-game, follow these steps: Use an oak log with a stone cutter to unlock all 15 wearables. Alternatively, you can find these items at the bottom of your creative inventory or through the commands bar using the catalog names. Make sure you active both the resource pack & behavior pack. mcaddon: – – –

163.name: Wolf Forever Addon
163.author: SPARTAN1171346
163.description: Wolf Forever Addon (1.20, 1.19) enables you to enhance your interaction with wolves and venture into hazardous areas without risking their safety. Additionally, it offers 22 kennel models for your wolf to rest in. Using the golden bone will significantly boost your wolf’s strength. There are 22 models of houses for wolves where they will recover their health and be safe from any attack. They can be made on the crafting table. Simply place the house in the place you want, you will have the option to rotate it 45 ° when you like the position, just crouch down and press “place” and the house will be ready to be used You can switch between the hostile mode or the peaceful mode of your wolf. Crouch down and you will see the button [hostile][peaceful] green means it is activated and red means it is deactivated. While your wolf is tamed it will be immortal: when it has health = 0 your wolf will remain unconscious, come close to cure it so that it continues to accompany you The following items can be used on tamed and crouching wolves: Golden bone: it is made with gold and a bone and it is used to make your wolf more powerful. Adds regeneration, fire resistance, and stamina for 10 minutes. Release wolf: it is made with a bone and a stick, it is used to release your wolf if you think you have too many Warning: Hostile/peaceful mode will not work on wolves that have been tamed before installing this addon, but releasing the wolf and re-taming it fixes it. Make sure you activate the Experimental Gameplay. mcaddon: – – –

164.name: Furniture 3D Pack Addon
164.author: Arthur156
164.description: If you are tired of making furniture in Minecraft from steps, signs, hatches, or something else and you want real furniture, then this mod is for you. With this addon, you can make a beautiful and realistic interior in your house in Minecraft. Furniture 3D Pack Addon (1.20, 1.19) includes 84 new items in total, including armchairs from all types of wool, sofas from all types of wool, chairs from all types of wood, tables from all types of wood, and bedside tables from all types of wood. All items from this addon can be crafted and obtained in survival mode. Make sure you activated the “Experimental Gameplay” in order to run this addon. mcaddon: – mcaddon: –

165.name: CMC Furniture Addon
165.author: TEAM CUBITOS MC
165.description: CMC Furniture Addon (1.20, 1.19) adds various pieces of furniture that you can use to decorate your worlds or builds. You can also find various interactive furniture to have a better experience. Download this addon and start decorating your worlds! You can get the furniture in 2 different ways, either by invoking the seller with the command: /summon cmc:seller so he can sell you the different furniture or with this command: /function cmc_furniture To get all the furniture. This is the list of furniture included in this addon and its specifications: Black Laptop (Interactive: “You can turn it on and off”) White laptop (Interactive: “You can turn it on and off”) Wooden desk Refrigerator (Interactive: “You can open, close, and store items”) Air conditioner Television (Interactive: “Watch 3 different channels”) Wooden table Table Wooden chair (Interactive: “You can sit down”) Black wooden chair (Interactive: “You can sit down”) Sofa (Interactive: “You can paint it in 3 different colors: red, blue, black, gray, and white”) Lamp (Interactive: “Turn it on or off”) Organizer Coffee table Room table Gamer chair (Interactive: “You can sit down and you can paint it in any color”) Sink (Interactive: “Turn the faucet on or off”) Tub Towel Toilet paper Short mirror Long mirror Shower (Interactive: “Open or close”) Toilet Trash can Stove (Interactive: “Turn it on or off”) Microwave (Cooks raw foods such as chicken, fish, salmon, veal, steak, lamb, and rabbit. “just click on the microwave with the food in your hand and wait” ) Brown kitchen cabinet Stove hood Brown kitchen cabinet 2 White kitchen cabinet 2 Brown sink (Interactive: “Turn the faucet on or off”) White sink (Interactive: “Turn the faucet on or off”) Bar stool (Interactive: “You can sit down”) Ceiling lamp (Interactive: “Turn it on or off”) Ceiling lamp 2 (Interactive: “Turn it on or off”) White kitchen cabinet Floor Toaster Plate (Can place: cooked food, cookie or bread”) Glass tumbler (Can hold: Water, Lava, Milk, or cocoa) Wall-mounted TV (Interactive: “View 3 different channels”) Computer (Interactive: “Display 3 images with RGB light on keyboard”) Make sure you activated the “Holiday Creator Features”. mcaddon: – mcaddon: –

166.name: Workshops Galore Addon
166.author: Rogue Diablo
166.description: Workshops Galore Addon (1.20, 1.19) was inspired by Minecraft’s 1.14 Update which added new professions and new blocks with their own functions. The creator of the addon is obligated to disclose a few disclaimers. Secondly, the addon is intended initially for creative players and the blocks cannot be crafted by them at the moment. The creator apologizes for these issues that cannot be resolved as of now, but they want everyone to know that they care a lot about the quality of this addon and only want what’s best. As the name implies, this addon adds new decorative with many different types. The meat of it all is, of course, the new workbenches. The addon adds new detailed workbenches so you can spice up your interiors. As well as that, new different never before seen blocks before. And even new variations of preexisting blocks. This addon and some of its features are also inspired by a lot of Java Mods like Suplimentaries and Farmer’s Delight. Make sure you activate the Experimental Gameplay. mcpack: – – –

167.name: Craftopia Furniture Addon
167.author: Trotamundos872
167.description: If you want to spice up your Minecraft Bedrock adventures, you should try the Craftopia Furniture modpack, a complete collection of three different mods – Pet Furniture, Feudal Furniture, and Modern Furniture. Craftopia Furniture Addon (1.20) adds more than 1200 blocks to your game, each carefully designed to fit the vanilla style while giving you more building options. The Craftopia Furniture Modpack in a nutshell: Craftopia Furniture modpack is a great choice for Minecraft Bedrock players who love variety in design. By combining Pet Furniture, Feudal Furniture, and Modern Furniture mods, this modpack lets you use new blocks that match the vanilla world. Whether you’re making a medieval fortress, a modern tower, or a snug cabin, the Craftopia Furniture modpack boosts your creativity. Creative: You can easily acquire the addon in creative mode by typing “/give @p f:” “/give @p pf:” “/give @p ff:” in the chat, which will display a list of available furniture items for you to choose from. Survival: In survival mode, you can obtain the addon by placing a clay ball in a stone cutter. Once you have a box of the desired furniture theme, you can then use the stone cutter to craft the furniture item. This adds an exciting element of resource gathering and crafting to enhance your gameplay experience in Minecraft. Make sure you turn on the “Holiday Creator Features” in the Experimental Gameplay. – –

168.name: Dusty Decorations Addon
168.author: batemaid_rip
168.description: Dusty Decorations Addon is a fork of Dusty Decorations Mod that was originally developed for the Java edition of Minecraft by flint_mischiff. Dusty Decorations Addon (1.20) provides players with the exciting opportunity to enhance their worlds by adding over 65 new decorative blocks. And guess what? It’s now available for Bedrock Edition as well! Whether you’re looking to spruce up your cozy cottage, create an elaborate castle, or simply add some flair to your builds, Dusty Decorations has got you covered. From vibrant colors to intricate designs, this addon promises to elevate your Minecraft experience. So go ahead, unleash your creativity, and transform your worlds with Dusty Decorations! Make sure you turn on the Experimental Gameplay. mcaddon: –

169.name: Dexten’s Chiselry Addon
169.author: DextenMods
169.description: Dexten’s Chiselry Addon (1.20, 1.19) adds a variety of new block designs to the game, enhancing the player’s ability to decorate their environment. This mod introduces 13 new plank models, 19 new cobblestone models, 10 new glass models, and 19 new stone models, totaling 249 blocks. The mod also introduces new wood types, Bamboo and Cherry, and two new items: a Chisel, which is used to create the new block designs, and a Hammer, which can break the new blocks instantly. The mod also provides new recipes, allowing players to use the stone cutter for more ease. This will serve to create the new designs of the blocks. This will serve to break the new blocks instantly. You just have to put any plank in the “Stone Cutter” and that’s it! – –

170.name: Ramadan Craft Addon
170.author: GU Studios
170.description: Ramadan Craft Addon (1.20) introduces a variety of new content related to Ramadan like Ramadan lanterns, decorations, and much more. Please read the detailed features section below for more information. Man & Women: Men will now track and attack zombies & villagers Men will not be damaged by player attacks Men will Donate to charity boxes Men will now speak when interacting with All Man variants have the same chance of spawning Men will spawn on their own Young NPCs will have a different message than adult NPCs All female varieties have the same chance of spawning Women can spawn on their own & can be found in groups of two. Women will now follow men around Women will run from zombies & villagers Women will no longer take damage when attacked Women will now speak when interacting with Palm Wood: Palm Wood Stairs now connect like vanilla stairs Palm Stairs now act like stairs when walking on them Palm logs now rotate the same as Minecraft logs Retextured palm planks & palm wood blocks Retextured palm logs to match the new plank texture Added Palm Boat Added Palm Chest Boat Added Palm Door Added Palm trap Droor Added Palm Fence Added Palm Fence Gate New Blocks: Added a ceiling fan that can be turned on and off Added a wall fan that turns and can be turned on and off Added a Faucet that functions Added a Charity Box for Donations Added a Shoe Stand that has storage Added a Mat that rolls up Added an ornament block to decorate the mask Food: Updated Khoshaf Cup’s texture Updated Konafa’s texture Updated Baked Konafa’s texture Updated Atayef’s texture Updated Baked Atayef’s texture Updated Sambosa’s texture Updated Baked Sambosa’s texture Structures: Updated the message to be 64×64 blocks Added a new shop to buy all the new blocks from. Updated House structure to feature the new palm wood blocks House structures will now have a random couple of rc People Increased palm generation a bit UI: Updated the UI to the latest GU UI version Added Ramadan Crafter’s tutorial screen Added Structures tutorial screen Make sure you turn on the Experimental Gameplay. – –

171.name: MrCrayfish’s Furniture Addon
171.author: MrCrayfish, Pupy200mine
171.description: MrCrayfish’s Furniture Addon (1.20, 1.19) is a Bedrock Edition port of the famous MrCrayfish’s Furniture for Java Edition. This a decoration addon that adds several pieces of furniture to your game, like cabinets, and kitchen-themed furniture, in a vanilla-like and modern style. You can interact with some of the furniture for more realism. The mod is in contest evolution, and more pieces of furniture will be added in the future! Includes sofas, tables, lamps, cabinets, coolers, chairs, and much more! Modern chairs, sofas, bar stools, and sofas are fully functional, which means you can sit on them Cabinets, bedside cabinets, kitchen cabinets, and counter drawers are also functional. the ceiling lights and lamps can generate light. Wood and wool curtains can be opened or closed. And many more that there are and that will be added! Make sure you activated all “Experimentals Functions”. Download the GeoFixer and Sonic Bug addon . Place the GeoFixer addon on top of the Texture Packs. MrCrayfish’s Furniture Mod – – World Test with All Blocks: – – –

172.name: Exotic Furniture Addon
172.author: Hansma
172.description: Transform your Minecraft world into a luxurious haven with Exotic Furniture Addon (1.20)! Enhance your virtual living spaces with many exquisite pieces of furniture, adding both style and functionality to your builds. Dining Chair : Host a luxurious dinner party with these elegant chairs, perfect for any dining room. Bed : Unwind in comfort with a brand new bed design, crafted for a restful night’s sleep. Couch : Lounge in style with a comfy couch, ideal for relaxing in your living room or socializing with friends. Volleyball Net : Set up the ultimate beach party with a functional volleyball net! Challenge your friends to a thrilling game. Screen : Divide your space or add a touch of privacy with a decorative screen. Armchair : Sink into a plush armchair, perfect for curling up with a good book or enjoying a cup of tea. Chair : Add extra seating to any room with a simple yet stylish chair. Pool Chair : Relax by the pool in style with a comfortable and luxurious pool chair.Dining Chair: Host a luxurious dinner party with these elegant chairs, perfect for any dining room. Bed : Unwind in comfort with a brand new bed design, crafted for a restful night’s sleep. Couch : Lounge in style with a comfy couch, ideal for relaxing in your living room or socializing with friends. Volleyball Net : Set up the ultimate beach party with a functional volleyball net! Challenge your friends to a thrilling game. Screen : Divide your space or add a touch of privacy with a decorative screen. Armchair : Sink into a plush armchair, perfect for curling up with a good book or enjoying a cup of tea. Chair : Add extra seating to any room with a simple yet stylish chair. Pool Chair : Relax by the pool in style with a comfortable and luxurious pool chair. – –

173.name: Sofa & Couch Furnitures Addon
173.author: Hansma
173.description: Spruce Up Your Builds with Sofas & Couches! Sofa & Couch Furnitures Addon (1.20) introduces two delightful furniture sets to your Minecraft world, perfect for creating cozy living spaces. Enhance your virtual home with the luxurious Comfy Chair Couch and the cozy Small Sofa. The Comfy Chair Couch : Relax in style with this plush couch and matching chair. Small Sofa : Add a touch of comfort to smaller rooms with this compact sofa. Surprise Colors : Each time you spawn a sofa or couch, it will appear in a random, vibrant color! Sit Back and Unwind : Both furniture sets are fully functional, allowing players to take a seat and relax after a long day of adventuring. Make sure you turn on the Experimental Gameplay. mcaddon: –

174.name: Furniture Kraft Addon
174.author: Creative Karis
174.description: Welcome to the future of home decor with Furniture Kraft Addon (1.21, 1.20). This addon’s innovative pieces provide everything you need for a convenient and enjoyable lifestyle. You can dine, hydrate, and enhance your health, speed, and strength. Enjoy a wide array of TV channels, relax with a refreshing shower, savor a cup of coffee, and furnish your kitchen to perfection. Customize your space with furniture that changes to any of 16 colors using our color spray. Create your own gaming room equipped with computers and much more, awaiting your discovery. Make sure you turn on the Experimental Gameplay. – – – –

175.name: Lamps & Lanterns Addon
175.author: NicoTheKid
175.description: Lamps and lanterns are the most atmospheric decorations for any building in Minecraft. Lamps & Lanterns Addon (1.21, 1.20) brings more additional light blocks that can be crafted and used as a decoration for your build. This mod contains Wooden Lamps, Copper lanterns, and other varieties of light sources. (There are some of the light sources and the recipes, discover the rest yourself) Amethyst Lamp Quartz Lamp Copper Lamp Exposed Copper Lamp Weathered Copper Lamp Oxidized Copper Lamp Wooden Oak Lamp Wooden Spruce Lamp Copper Lanterns Exposed Copper Lanterns Weathered Copper Lanterns Oxidized Copper Lanterns Stone Lanterns Cobblestone Lanterns Remove the old file before installing the new version. Make sure you activated all the following “Experimental Settings”: – – – – Server: – – – Server: –

176.name: Decorpack Craft Addon
176.author: Creative Karis
176.description: If you’re looking to spruce up your builds with more variety, this addon is perfect for you. Decorpack Craft Addon (1.21, 1.20) introduces over 207 craftable block types, including sleek panels, elegant columns, versatile stair blocks, and the innovative cladding block that enhances your building’s exterior without altering the interior design. In order to get the blocks in Survival mode, you must bring a stone cutter and a stone and insert the stone into the stone cutter and it will show you all the blocks. The cladding block helps you change the external appearance of the building. For example, you want to build a room from the inside in red, but it will appear to the building in its external appearance and spoil the matter. However, with the cladding block, you will hide the external appearance in a smaller area than the regular block. Many blocks will be added in the upcoming updates. Make sure you turn on the Experimental Gameplay. – –

177.name: Feudal Furniture Addon
177.author: Trotamundos872
177.description: If you want medieval furniture that is easy and elegant, look no further! Feudal Furniture Addon (1.21, 1.20) has what you need, with over 360 furniture items that have a simple and original Minecraft style. Like other mods of its same collection, Feudal Furniture is created from clay, with them you can create a variety of boxes that will contain the furniture you need, the boxes will be different depending on the type of wood you want and if you want a miscellaneous decoration you will also find a box for it! This add-on is specialized to decorate medieval areas such as ruined castles, huge cities, medieval farms, and rustic houses. These are some of the most important blocks: Tables Desks Banks Boards Ladders Rung stairs Supports Boxes Decorations Picnic tables Survival: Clay is needed, you have to introduce it in a stonecutter and many variants of boxes will come out, each one has all the versions of a type of wooden furniture, depending on what type of wood you choose from the box, you can create furniture of a type of wood or other. Creative: There are 2 ways, the main one is by going to the creative menu and looking at the bottom in the decoration section and the other way is with commands, you would have to enter the following in the chat /give @p ff: (select the block or put their name). If you don’t have inspiration, check these photos and enjoy the mod. Enable Experiment Holiday Creator Features for the plugin to work! – – – – Test Map: – – – Test Map: –

178.name: monoDeco Plus Furniture Addon
178.author: monorogu
178.description: monoDeco Plus Furniture Addon (1.21, 1.20) enhances your Minecraft Bedrock Experience with Exquisite Aesthetic Furniture! Are you prepared to elevate your Minecraft Bedrock Edition to a realm of contemporary elegance? Look no further than monoDeco Plus, a meticulously crafted mod project designed for the discerning player who craves sophistication and exclusivity. monoDeco Plus is dedicated to MCPE, focusing exclusively on infusing a touch of modernity and elegance into your virtual living spaces. Immerse yourself in the unique aesthetics that define monoDeco, and witness the seamless integration of contemporary furniture into your Minecraft world. Make sure you turn on the Experimental Gameplay. – – – –

179.name: Easy Bonsai Addon
179.author: Amon28
179.description: If you want to save time and effort in growing trees and crops in your world, you might like this addon. Easy Bonsai Addon (1.21, 1.20) gives you new blocks that let you harvest wood, leaves, and more. The new and improved bonsai addon! These are no longer entities but blocks. The author has also changed the texture and model to fit its plant counterpart. Every 30 seconds it will drop logs and leaves. Using Enriched Bone Meal on the bonsais will speed up the drops from 30 seconds to 15 seconds. Enriched Bonemeal Bonsai Pots Bonsai Crops Sheared Bonsai Crops Sheared Bonsais won’t produce anything, it would just be for decorations This addon can work on both mobile (MCPE), Windows 10, and other devices. You need to turn on Beta APIs. mcaddon: – mcaddon: – – – mcaddon: –

180.name: Keys & Crates Addon
180.author: NicoTheKid
180.description: NicoTheKid’s Keys & Crates Addon (1.21, 1.20) adds a different type of crate that generates naturally in your world and by using the Keys and other equipment, Crates will drop random loot from a low-tier to a high-tier item. Wooden Crates Wooden crates are the most common crates you can find all overworld. A wooden crate doesn’t need any key to loot, you just need an axe to destroy the crate and then the loots will drop. Wooden Crate drops random common items. Wooden Oak Crate Wooden Spruce Crate Wooden Birch Crate Wooden Jungle Crate Wooden Acacia Crate Wooden Dark Oak Crate Wooden Mangrove Crate (Crates are not storage blocks like chests and barrels.) Copper Crate Copper Crate drops random low-tier items. Use Copper Crate Key to loot. Iron Crate Iron Crate drops iron equipment & random medium-tier items. Use Iron Crate Key to loot. Golden Crate Golden Crate drops golden equipment & random medium-tier items. Use Golden Crate Key to loot. Diamond Crate Diamond Crate drops diamond equipment & random high-tier items. Use Diamond Crate Key to loot. Creative Category Copper Crate Key Use to open or loot the Copper Crate. Iron Crate Key Use to open or loot the Iron Crate. Golden Crate Key Use to open or loot the Golden Crate. Diamond Crate Key Use to open or loot the Diamond Crate. Crates Trader Passive Mob Spawn in random biome of overworld. Health: 26 Drop: Emerald. Crates Trader avoid monster type mobs. Wooden Oak Crate Pile (6 variants) Generate in Plains, Forest, Extreme Hills, & Mushroom Island Wooden Spruce Crate Pile (6 variants) Generate in Taiga, Groove, & Snowy Beach. Wooden Birch Crate Pile (6 variants) Generate in Birch Forest, Flower Forest, Meadow, & Tundra. Wooden Jungle Crate Pile (6 variants) Generate in Jungle. Wooden Acacia Crate Pile (6 variants) Generate in Savanna, & Badlands. Wooden Dark Oak Crate Pile (6 variants) Generate in Roofed Forest, & Swamp. Wooden Mangrove Crate Pile (6 variants) Generate in Swampland, & Mangrove Swamp. Generate in all underground. Copper Crate Iron Crate Golden Crate Diamond Crate Make sure you turn on the Experimental Gameplay. – – – – Server Pack: –

181.name: Vanilla Wooden Chairs Addon
181.author: EddieWorkshop
181.description: Do you think Minecraft should have chairs? If so, you’re in luck! Vanilla Wooden Chairs Addon (1.21, 1.20) offers a variety of chairs in different wood types, including iron, copper, and bamboo. The best part is that this addon does not require any experimental features. If you’re looking for more furniture options, you might want to check out MrCrayfish’s More Furniture Addon . This mod introduces support for modded wood types from popular mods and adds new variants of tables, chairs, coffee tables, cabinets, bedside cabinets, desks, desk cabinets, blinds, upgraded fences, upgraded gates, crates, park benches, mailboxes, kitchen sinks, and more. This addon does not require any Experimental Gameplay. mcaddon: – mcaddon: –

182.name: Blossom Decorations CIT Addon
182.author: BlossomCraft
182.description: In this initial release of Blossom Decorations CIT Addon (1.21), the focus was on crafting decorations inspired by the talented Melanie Martinez. We hope you’ll find these additions both useful and enjoyable. Here’s what the addon includes: Over 36 unique types of decorations These can be found on helmets within your inventory To utilize these decorations, start with an armor stand as your base. The stand will remain invisible and can float, defying gravity, allowing you to position it at any height without fear of falling. Keep in mind that this is a straightforward first version and not yet official. Consider it a foundation for future updates. Make sure you turn on the Experimental Gameplay. mcaddon: –

183.name: Droplight Addon
183.author: Mia.
183.description: Do you want to upgrade your items? Do you want the items to look more luxurious and special, or do you want to divide the items into individual ranks? This add-on will allow you to do the above problems. Droplight Addon (1.21) enhances the item-dropping experience by adding sound effects, visual effects, and customizable features. Key features include custom sounds for item drops, visual effects like beams of light, and sparkles for rare items when a mob is killed or items drop. Make sure you turn on the Experimental Gameplay. mcaddon: –

184.name: The FAYE Kitchen Clutter Set Addon
184.author: The FAYE Project
184.description: Enhance your Minecraft abode with our brand-new Kitchen Clutter Set! The FAYE Kitchen Clutter Set Addon (1.21) includes 15 essential items that will breathe life and functionality into your in-game kitchen. From adorable cooking utensils to chic countertop decorations, this set has it all. Accessing the pack in-game (Bedrock): To locate the blocks in-game, scroll to the construction section of your creative inventory or search for the models in the commands bar. Make sure that both packs are enabled, along with experimental gameplay options! – –

185.name: Double Doors Addon
185.author: TsranunaPogazu
185.description: Elevate your Minecraft experience by adding support for the behavior of double doors. With Double Doors Addon (1.21, 1.20), you can enhance your builds and create stunning entrances with realistic door interactions. Download now and elevate your entryway! In Minecraft, doors can only be opened individually, making double doors un-immersive and awkward. However, with this addon, doors can open simultaneously, providing a more realistic and aesthetically pleasing experience. Double Doors is a Minecraft addon that modifies the behavior of doors in the game. The addon enhances the game by introducing the functional behavior of double doors. Adds realistic double-door interaction to the game. Supports all door types, including the company of other door types. Opening a double door while sneaking will only open one of the doors and will be very quiet, improving the sneaky experience. Also works on singular doors! Make sure you turn on the Beta APIs on the Experimental Gameplay. mcaddon: – mcpack: –

186.name: Complement Doors Addon
186.author: EndXenoc MCPE
186.description: Complement Doors Addon (1.21, 1.20) incorporates over 180 doors with various styles and all types of wood found in the game. Additionally, this addon includes the Minecraft Vanilla doors, now available with other types of wood. This is an addon that adds many wooden doors, it also adds the doors of Minecraft Vanilla but with different types of wood. To get the blocks you must first craft the new carpenter’s table: Carpenter’s Table: This block is used to craft all doors that this addon adds. Crafting: Doors: All doors are crafted as follows: Crafting: Doors with windows are made as follows. Crafting: You can create double-sided doors by placing one door next to another. To use this addon you must activate the experimental gameplay in the map settings. – – – – – –

187.name: DecoDrop Addon
187.author: EndXenoc MCPE
187.description: DecoDrop Addon (1.21, 1.20) enhances your virtual world by introducing 3D furniture and decorative items like radios, lamps, and clocks. This infusion of realism and enjoyment elevates your gaming experience. Dive into the exciting potential unlocked by DecoDrop! Moreover, DecoDrop introduces an extensive collection of furniture and decorative blocks, boasting over 90 new additions. With DecoDrop, you can customize your surroundings by incorporating items like: Chairs Tables Cabinets Clay blocks The best part? You have the creative freedom to dye these objects in any color you desire! Whether you’re designing cozy interiors or sprucing up your outdoor spaces, DecoDrop opens up a world of possibilities for your Minecraft adventures. For an even more comprehensive experience, consider exploring other mods from the Decoration Add-ons catalog, which offers additional categories to complement this delightful add-on. Happy decorating! You can interact with the following items, the vase can be filled with up to 11 items: Make sure you turn on the Experimental Gameplay. – – – –

188.name: Wilder World Addon
188.author: Alylica
188.description: Are you looking for a way to make Minecraft’s biomes more detailed? Do you want to add tons of new decorative and functional blocks? How about new animals to populate the world? If you answered yes to any of these questions, then Wilder World is the addon for you! And even if you didn’t answer yes, keep reading, you might still like what you see! Wilder World Addon (1.21, 1.20) is an addon that enhances existing biomes in the game by adding new generations, blocks, and mobs. Its main focus is on the Desert, Savanna, Badlands, and Jungle biomes, but many other biomes like the forests, swamps, and birch forests receive updates too! The addon introduces 5 new wood types, such as Azalea Wood, Palm Wood, and Willow Wood. Additionally, there are 10 new animals, 150+ blocks, and over 30 new items. While we cannot go into extensive detail about everything here, we can briefly show off the main features of the 4 focus biomes. There is so much content in this addon, that we strongly advise using the recipe book to see what’s new to craft (or just use the creative inventory). Deserts: The Main new features of the deserts are the new palm trees, one of the 5 new wood types, there are also new sand/sandstone blocks, and new types of grass and flowers, such as marram grass or small cacti, which drop fruit. Camels can also now be found anywhere in deserts. There are also 3 new animals! Meerkats love to interact with you, but don’t disturb them while they are asleep! If you feed one a spider’s eye, it might just give you something in return. Fennec Foxes are simple desert mobs, you can feed them prickly pears, and they may sleep underneath desert palms. Rattlesnakes are very dangerous if attacked, but when not angry, can shed their scales in the morning, letting you craft a poison-resistant chest plate or decorative blocks. Savannas: Savannas now include many new blocks, such as Dry and Wet Mud, dry mud can even make the new adobe bricks block! You can also find Baobab Trees, which have their very own wood type, keep in mind that to grow them you just place 9 saplings in a square. You can also find termites, which will feast on log blocks placed near their mounds, converting them into more termite nests, and allowing you to farm their drops. Savannas now also houses two unique mobs! Cheetahs love to hunt, attacking Ostriches and Chickens, and anything that attacks them first, they are incredibly quick, and you can feed them raw poultry to breed them. Ostriches can be bred with seeds, and drop a unique meat type when killed, they love to stick their heads in the ground, and when their eggs hatch, their shells can be brewed into a potion of resistance! Badlands: Badlands now feature the unique ‘Flowering Cactus’ which can be mined for lots of prickly pears, you can also find thorny roots which are dangerous to step through and tumbleweed stems, which can grow tumbleweeds for use as an item or through a dispenser! Additionally, all sand variants from the desert section carry over to red sand, you can also now make bricks out of terracotta! Make sure to watch out for tumbleweeds as they barrel through the badlands damaging anything in their way, a good punch will knock them over and render them useless! The Badlands also has 2 new mobs to see! Vultures love to inhabit the skies, flying circles and slyly following players, could it be a bad omen? Scorpions are quite dangerous, they come out at night and try and poison you, but their dropped poison sac can be used to make potions of decay! Jungles: Jungles now feature a lot of new plant life and blocks, for example, moss can be found on the surface, and mossy cobblestone can be found underground! you will also find more redstone ore in this biome Trees are far more common and larger than before, better emulating real-life rainforests, you can also find a new type of tree, the Banana Tree, which can drop bananas from its leaves! Other plants exist, like the luminous wild root, a descendant of the ancient pitcher plant Of course, new animals exist too! Poison Dart Frogs can be found in jungles, they can poison you when taking damage, but if fed a small magma cube they produce a unique froglight block based on their colour. Butterflies also spawn in any kind of jungle, they like flowers but mainly serve as ambient mobs. The Vanilla froglights are above, the new poison dart frog ones are below. The others: New Blocks of sugarcane and paper; Mushrooms mounted on the trees of roofed and birch forests! Fireflies and willow trees in the updated swamps, Cattails, Lavenders and many rose bushes.. 2 New Stone Types! Make sure you turn on the Experimental Gameplay. mcaddon: – mcaddon: –

189.name: Moor Doors Addon
189.author: HappyCannon
189.description: Moor Doors Addon (1.21) introduces a variety of vanilla-style doors to enhance your game experience. All vanilla doors now feature the “Basic” door style, resembling the oak door. Currently, only these “Basic”-styled doors are compatible with redstone. 90 new wood door styles Golden door Rough iron bar door This addon does not require any Experimental Gameplay. – –

190.name: FNAF’s Decorations Addon
190.author: Hirx's
190.description: Looking to recreate the FNAF 1/2 restaurant in Minecraft? Look no further than FNAF’s Decorations! FNAF’s Decorations Addon (1.21, 1.20) allows you to build the FNAF game restaurant in Minecraft Bedrock. It’s still in development, and some blocks are missing such as those from FNAF 2, 3, 4, etc. This addon adds a diverse range of blocks inspired by the FNAF 1/2 restaurant for decoration. And in the future, more blocks based on other FNAF 2, 3 restaurants, or even the house in 4 will be added. Note that this addon exclusively adds blocks, not entities or items. Make sure you have these experimental options enabled in your world to avoid bugs and performance issues: mcaddon: – mcaddon: – mcaddon: –

191.name: Mhafy’s Ship Addon
191.author: Mhafy.1016
191.description: Mhafy’s Ship Addon (1.21, 1.20) is an adventurous and immersive add-on that brings the thrill of maritime exploration to the game. If you’re a fan of sailing the high seas or exploring new waters, then this add-on will provide a remarkable experience. This add-on introduces a detailed and aesthetically pleasing ship into the Minecraft world. The ship is not just a static entity but a fully explorable and functional vessel complete with various sections such as the deck, cabins, and the helm. The intricacy of the ship’s design and the care taken in detailing the interiors are quite impressive, adding a whole new layer of realism and immersion to the game. Ships Wheel This item can be placed. Act as the core of the ship. This will make the ship comes to life and will able to move and control. Wheel Material item. Used to craft the ship wheel. Floating Point This item can be placed. This will be only placed in any location below the ship’s wheel. Otherwise, this won’t work. This will control how deep the ship will submerge. Seats Acacia Bamboo Bamboo mosaic Birch Cherry Crimson Dark oak Jungle Mangrove Oak Spruce Warped Cushions First, build your ship. The ship must contain only valid blocks on the list below. Current valid blocks: Planks (any type) Wool Block (any color) Crafting table Cartography table Fletching table Smithing table Furnace Blast furnace Smoker Bookshelf Loom Note block Glowstone Block Jukebox Redstone lamp Sea lantern Nether and Warped wart blocks Log / Wood (Stripped or not) Glass / Stained glass (any color) Pumpkin (Normal, Carved or lit) Moss Block Froglight (any type) Single Chest Barrel Fence Slabs Ladder Seats Stools Cushions Blocks must be connected (Otherwise the block will be skipped) The ship must contain more than 5 blocks and not over 512 blocks. Place your ship wheel anywhere in the ship. It is up to you. Tapping or right-clicking the ship wheel will start the process and all connected blocks will act as one. then the player will automatically mount the ship facing the wheel. All unconnected blocks will be skipped and left hanging. Sneak of jump to unmount the ship When unmounting the ship will automatically rotate according to its nearest angle facing (north, east, south, or west) Adding a floating point will control how deep the boat will submerge. You may add multiple Floating points but at least one is somewhere below the ship’s wheel. Make sure you turn on the Experimental Gameplay. – – – – – –
